2344  $placeholder = ' placeholder="'.$langs->trans("RefOrLabel").'"';
2345  if ($hidelabel == 2) {
2346  $out .= img_picto($langs->trans("Search"), 'search');
2347  }
2348  }
2349  $out .= '<input type="text" class="minwidth100" name="search_'.$htmlname.'" id="search_'.$htmlname.'" value="'.$selected_input_value.'"'.$placeholder.' '.(!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_SEARCH_AUTOFOCUS) ? 'autofocus' : '').' />';
2350  if ($hidelabel == 3) {
2351  $out .= img_picto($langs->trans("Search"), 'search');
2352  }
2353  } else {
2354  $out .= $this->select_produits_list($selected, $htmlname, $filtertype, $limit, $price_level, '', $status, $finished, 0, $socid, $showempty, $forcecombo, $morecss, $hidepriceinlabel, $warehouseStatus);
2355  }
2356 
2357  if (empty($nooutput)) {
2358  print $out;
2359  } else {
2360  return $out;
2361  }
2362  }
2363 
2364  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
2389  public function select_produits_list($selected = '', $htmlname = 'productid', $filtertype = '', $limit = 20, $price_level = 0, $filterkey = '', $status = 1, $finished = 2, $outputmode = 0, $socid = 0, $showempty = '1', $forcecombo = 0, $morecss = '', $hidepriceinlabel = 0, $warehouseStatus = '')
2390  {
2391  // phpcs:enable
2392  global $langs, $conf, $user, $db;
2393 
2394  $out = '';
2395  $outarray = array();
2396 
2397  // Units
2398  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_USE_UNITS)) {
2399  $langs->load('other');
2400  }
2401 
2402  $warehouseStatusArray = array();
2403  if (!empty($warehouseStatus)) {
2404  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/product/stock/class/entrepot.class.php';
2405  if (preg_match('/warehouseclosed/', $warehouseStatus)) {
2406  $warehouseStatusArray[] = Entrepot::STATUS_CLOSED;
2407  }
2408  if (preg_match('/warehouseopen/', $warehouseStatus)) {
2409  $warehouseStatusArray[] = Entrepot::STATUS_OPEN_ALL;
2410  }
2411  if (preg_match('/warehouseinternal/', $warehouseStatus)) {
2412  $warehouseStatusArray[] = Entrepot::STATUS_OPEN_INTERNAL;
2413  }
2414  }
2415 
2416  $selectFields = " p.rowid, p.ref, p.label, p.description, p.barcode, p.fk_country, p.fk_product_type, p.price, p.price_ttc, p.price_base_type, p.tva_tx, p.duration, p.fk_price_expression";
2417  if (count($warehouseStatusArray)) {
2418  $selectFieldsGrouped = ", sum(".$this->db->ifsql("e.statut IS NULL", "0", "ps.reel").") as stock"; // e.statut is null if there is no record in stock
2419  } else {
2420  $selectFieldsGrouped = ", ".$this->db->ifsql("p.stock IS NULL", 0, "p.stock")." AS stock";
2421  }
2422 
2423  $sql = "SELECT ";
2424  $sql .= $selectFields.$selectFieldsGrouped;
2425 
2426  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_SORT_BY_CATEGORY)) {
2427  //Product category
2428  $sql .= ", (SELECT ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."categorie_product.fk_categorie
2429  FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."categorie_product
2430  WHERE ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."categorie_product.fk_product=p.rowid
2431  LIMIT 1
2432  ) AS categorie_product_id ";
2433  }
2434 
2435  //Price by customer
2436  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_CUSTOMER_PRICES) && !empty($socid)) {
2437  $sql .= ', pcp.rowid as idprodcustprice, pcp.price as custprice, pcp.price_ttc as custprice_ttc,';
2438  $sql .= ' pcp.price_base_type as custprice_base_type, pcp.tva_tx as custtva_tx, pcp.ref_customer as custref';
2439  $selectFields .= ", idprodcustprice, custprice, custprice_ttc, custprice_base_type, custtva_tx, custref";
2440  }
2441  // Units
2442  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_USE_UNITS)) {
2443  $sql .= ", u.label as unit_long, u.short_label as unit_short, p.weight, p.weight_units, p.length, p.length_units, p.width, p.width_units, p.height, p.height_units, p.surface, p.surface_units, p.volume, p.volume_units";
2444  $selectFields .= ', unit_long, unit_short, p.weight, p.weight_units, p.length, p.length_units, p.width, p.width_units, p.height, p.height_units, p.surface, p.surface_units, p.volume, p.volume_units';
2445  }
2446 
2447  // Multilang : we add translation
2448  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_MULTILANGS)) {
2449  $sql .= ", pl.label as label_translated";
2450  $sql .= ", pl.description as description_translated";
2451  $selectFields .= ", label_translated";
2452  $selectFields .= ", description_translated";
2453  }
2454  // Price by quantity
2455  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_CUSTOMER_PRICES_BY_QTY) || !empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_CUSTOMER_PRICES_BY_QTY_MULTIPRICES)) {
2456  $sql .= ", (SELECT pp.rowid FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product_price as pp WHERE pp.fk_product = p.rowid";
2457  if ($price_level >= 1 && !empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_CUSTOMER_PRICES_BY_QTY_MULTIPRICES)) {
2458  $sql .= " AND price_level = ".((int) $price_level);
2459  }
2460  $sql .= " ORDER BY date_price";
2461  $sql .= " DESC LIMIT 1) as price_rowid";
2462  $sql .= ", (SELECT pp.price_by_qty FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product_price as pp WHERE pp.fk_product = p.rowid"; // price_by_qty is 1 if some prices by qty exists in subtable
2463  if ($price_level >= 1 && !empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_CUSTOMER_PRICES_BY_QTY_MULTIPRICES)) {
2464  $sql .= " AND price_level = ".((int) $price_level);
2465  }
2466  $sql .= " ORDER BY date_price";
2467  $sql .= " DESC LIMIT 1) as price_by_qty";
2468  $selectFields .= ", price_rowid, price_by_qty";
2469  }
2470  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product as p";
2471  if (count($warehouseStatusArray)) {
2472  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product_stock as ps on ps.fk_product = p.rowid";
2473  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."entrepot as e on ps.fk_entrepot = e.rowid AND e.entity IN (".getEntity('stock').")";
2474  $sql .= ' AND e.statut IN ('.$this->db->sanitize($this->db->escape(implode(',', $warehouseStatusArray))).')'; // Return line if product is inside the selected stock. If not, an empty line will be returned so we will count 0.
2475  }
2476 
2477  // include search in supplier ref
2478  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_SEARCH_PRODUCT_BY_FOURN_REF)) {
2479  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product_fournisseur_price as pfp ON p.rowid = pfp.fk_product";
2480  }
2481 
2482  //Price by customer
2483  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_CUSTOMER_PRICES) && !empty($socid)) {
2484  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product_customer_price as pcp ON pcp.fk_soc=".((int) $socid)." AND pcp.fk_product=p.rowid";
2485  }
2486  // Units
2487  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_USE_UNITS)) {
2488  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_units u ON u.rowid = p.fk_unit";
2489  }
2490  // Multilang : we add translation
2491  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_MULTILANGS)) {
2492  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product_lang as pl ON pl.fk_product = p.rowid ";
2493  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_TEXTS_IN_THIRDPARTY_LANGUAGE) && !empty($socid)) {
2494  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/societe/class/societe.class.php';
2495  $soc = new Societe($db);
2496  $result = $soc->fetch($socid);
2497  if ($result > 0 && !empty($soc->default_lang)) {
2498  $sql .= " AND pl.lang='" . $this->db->escape($soc->default_lang) . "'";
2499  } else {
2500  $sql .= " AND pl.lang='".$this->db->escape($langs->getDefaultLang())."'";
2501  }
2502  } else {
2503  $sql .= " AND pl.lang='".$this->db->escape($langs->getDefaultLang())."'";
2504  }
2505  }
2506 
2507  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_ATTRIBUTES_HIDECHILD)) {
2508  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product_attribute_combination pac ON pac.fk_product_child = p.rowid";
2509  }
2510 
2511  $sql .= ' WHERE p.entity IN ('.getEntity('product').')';
2512 
2513  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_ATTRIBUTES_HIDECHILD)) {
2514  $sql .= " AND pac.rowid IS NULL";
2515  }
2516 
2517  if ($finished == 0) {
2518  $sql .= " AND p.finished = ".((int) $finished);
2519  } elseif ($finished == 1) {
2520  $sql .= " AND p.finished = ".((int) $finished);
2521  if ($status >= 0) {
2522  $sql .= " AND p.tosell = ".((int) $status);
2523  }
2524  } elseif ($status >= 0) {
2525  $sql .= " AND p.tosell = ".((int) $status);
2526  }
2527  // Filter by product type
2528  if (strval($filtertype) != '') {
2529  $sql .= " AND p.fk_product_type = ".((int) $filtertype);
2530  } elseif (empty($conf->product->enabled)) { // when product module is disabled, show services only
2531  $sql .= " AND p.fk_product_type = 1";
2532  } elseif (empty($conf->service->enabled)) { // when service module is disabled, show products only
2533  $sql .= " AND p.fk_product_type = 0";
2534  }
2535  // Add criteria on ref/label
2536  if ($filterkey != '') {
2537  $sql .= ' AND (';
2538  $prefix = empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_DONOTSEARCH_ANYWHERE) ? '%' : ''; // Can use index if PRODUCT_DONOTSEARCH_ANYWHERE is on
2539  // For natural search
2540  $scrit = explode(' ', $filterkey);
2541  $i = 0;
2542  if (count($scrit) > 1) {
2543  $sql .= "(";
2544  }
2545  foreach ($scrit as $crit) {
2546  if ($i > 0) {
2547  $sql .= " AND ";
2548  }
2549  $sql .= "(p.ref LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$crit)."%' OR p.label LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$crit)."%'";
2550  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_MULTILANGS)) {
2551  $sql .= " OR pl.label LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$crit)."%'";
2552  }
2553  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_CUSTOMER_PRICES) && ! empty($socid)) {
2554  $sql .= " OR pcp.ref_customer LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$crit)."%'";
2555  }
2556  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_AJAX_SEARCH_ON_DESCRIPTION)) {
2557  $sql .= " OR p.description LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$crit)."%'";
2558  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_MULTILANGS)) {
2559  $sql .= " OR pl.description LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$crit)."%'";
2560  }
2561  }
2562  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_SEARCH_PRODUCT_BY_FOURN_REF)) {
2563  $sql .= " OR pfp.ref_fourn LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$crit)."%'";
2564  }
2565  $sql .= ")";
2566  $i++;
2567  }
2568  if (count($scrit) > 1) {
2569  $sql .= ")";
2570  }
2571  if (!empty($conf->barcode->enabled)) {
2572  $sql .= " OR p.barcode LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$filterkey)."%'";
2573  }
2574  $sql .= ')';
2575  }
2576  if (count($warehouseStatusArray)) {
2577  $sql .= " GROUP BY ".$selectFields;
2578  }
2579 
2580  //Sort by category
2581  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_SORT_BY_CATEGORY)) {
2582  $sql .= " ORDER BY categorie_product_id ";
2583  //ASC OR DESC order
2584  ($conf->global->PRODUCT_SORT_BY_CATEGORY == 1) ? $sql .= "ASC" : $sql .= "DESC";
2585  } else {
2586  $sql .= $this->db->order("p.ref");
2587  }
2588 
2589  $sql .= $this->db->plimit($limit, 0);
2590 
2591  // Build output string
2592  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::select_produits_list search products", LOG_DEBUG);
2593  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
2594  if ($result) {
2595  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/product/class/product.class.php';
2596  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/product/dynamic_price/class/price_parser.class.php';
2597  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/product.lib.php';
2598 
2599  $num = $this->db->num_rows($result);
2600 
2601  $events = null;
2602 
2603  if (!$forcecombo) {
2604  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/ajax.lib.php';
2605  $out .= ajax_combobox($htmlname, $events, $conf->global->PRODUIT_USE_SEARCH_TO_SELECT);
2606  }
2607 
2608  $out .= '<select class="flat'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" name="'.$htmlname.'" id="'.$htmlname.'">';
2609 
2610  $textifempty = '';
2611  // Do not use textifempty = ' ' or '&nbsp;' here, or search on key will search on ' key'.
2612  //if (! empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) || $forcecombo) $textifempty='';
2613  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_USE_SEARCH_TO_SELECT)) {
2614  if ($showempty && !is_numeric($showempty)) {
2615  $textifempty = $langs->trans($showempty);
2616  } else {
2617  $textifempty .= $langs->trans("All");
2618  }
2619  } else {
2620  if ($showempty && !is_numeric($showempty)) {
2621  $textifempty = $langs->trans($showempty);
2622  }
2623  }
2624  if ($showempty) {
2625  $out .= '<option value="-1" selected>'.($textifempty ? $textifempty : '&nbsp;').'</option>';
2626  }
2627 
2628  $i = 0;
2629  while ($num && $i < $num) {
2630  $opt = '';
2631  $optJson = array();
2632  $objp = $this->db->fetch_object($result);
2633 
2634  if ((!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_CUSTOMER_PRICES_BY_QTY) || !empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_CUSTOMER_PRICES_BY_QTY_MULTIPRICES)) && !empty($objp->price_by_qty) && $objp->price_by_qty == 1) { // Price by quantity will return many prices for the same product
2635  $sql = "SELECT rowid, quantity, price, unitprice, remise_percent, remise, price_base_type";
2636  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product_price_by_qty";
2637  $sql .= " WHERE fk_product_price = ".((int) $objp->price_rowid);
2638  $sql .= " ORDER BY quantity ASC";
2639 
2640  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::select_produits_list search prices by qty", LOG_DEBUG);
2641  $result2 = $this->db->query($sql);
2642  if ($result2) {
2643  $nb_prices = $this->db->num_rows($result2);
2644  $j = 0;
2645  while ($nb_prices && $j < $nb_prices) {
2646  $objp2 = $this->db->fetch_object($result2);
2647 
2648  $objp->price_by_qty_rowid = $objp2->rowid;
2649  $objp->price_by_qty_price_base_type = $objp2->price_base_type;
2650  $objp->price_by_qty_quantity = $objp2->quantity;
2651  $objp->price_by_qty_unitprice = $objp2->unitprice;
2652  $objp->price_by_qty_remise_percent = $objp2->remise_percent;
2653  // For backward compatibility
2654  $objp->quantity = $objp2->quantity;
2655  $objp->price = $objp2->price;
2656  $objp->unitprice = $objp2->unitprice;
2657  $objp->remise_percent = $objp2->remise_percent;
2658  $objp->remise = $objp2->remise;
2659 
2660  $this->constructProductListOption($objp, $opt, $optJson, 0, $selected, $hidepriceinlabel, $filterkey);
2661 
2662  $j++;
2663 
2664  // Add new entry
2665  // "key" value of json key array is used by jQuery automatically as selected value
2666  // "label" value of json key array is used by jQuery automatically as text for combo box
2667  $out .= $opt;
2668  array_push($outarray, $optJson);
2669  }
2670  }
2671  } else {
2672  if (!empty($conf->dynamicprices->enabled) && !empty($objp->fk_price_expression)) {
2673  $price_product = new Product($this->db);
2674  $price_product->fetch($objp->rowid, '', '', 1);
2675  $priceparser = new PriceParser($this->db);
2676  $price_result = $priceparser->parseProduct($price_product);
2677  if ($price_result >= 0) {
2678  $objp->price = $price_result;
2679  $objp->unitprice = $price_result;
2680  //Calculate the VAT
2681  $objp->price_ttc = price2num($objp->price) * (1 + ($objp->tva_tx / 100));
2682  $objp->price_ttc = price2num($objp->price_ttc, 'MU');
2683  }
2684  }
2685 
2686  $this->constructProductListOption($objp, $opt, $optJson, $price_level, $selected, $hidepriceinlabel, $filterkey);
2687  // Add new entry
2688  // "key" value of json key array is used by jQuery automatically as selected value
2689  // "label" value of json key array is used by jQuery automatically as text for combo box
2690  $out .= $opt;
2691  array_push($outarray, $optJson);
2692  }
2693 
2694  $i++;
2695  }
2696 
2697  $out .= '</select>';
2698 
2699  $this->db->free($result);
2700 
2701  if (empty($outputmode)) {
2702  return $out;
2703  }
2704  return $outarray;
2705  } else {
2706  dol_print_error($db);
2707  }
2708  }
2709 
2724  protected function constructProductListOption(&$objp, &$opt, &$optJson, $price_level, $selected, $hidepriceinlabel = 0, $filterkey = '', $novirtualstock = 0)
2725  {
2726  global $langs, $conf, $user, $db;
2727 
2728  $outkey = '';
2729  $outval = '';
2730  $outref = '';
2731  $outlabel = '';
2732  $outlabel_translated = '';
2733  $outdesc = '';
2734  $outdesc_translated = '';
2735  $outbarcode = '';
2736  $outorigin = '';
2737  $outtype = '';
2738  $outprice_ht = '';
2739  $outprice_ttc = '';
2740  $outpricebasetype = '';
2741  $outtva_tx = '';
2742  $outqty = 1;
2743  $outdiscount = 0;
2744 
2745  $maxlengtharticle = (empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_MAX_LENGTH_COMBO) ? 48 : $conf->global->PRODUCT_MAX_LENGTH_COMBO);
2746 
2747  $label = $objp->label;
2748  if (!empty($objp->label_translated)) {
2749  $label = $objp->label_translated;
2750  }
2751  if (!empty($filterkey) && $filterkey != '') {
2752  $label = preg_replace('/('.preg_quote($filterkey, '/').')/i', '<strong>$1</strong>', $label, 1);
2753  }
2754 
2755  $outkey = $objp->rowid;
2756  $outref = $objp->ref;
2757  $outrefcust = empty($objp->custref) ? '' : $objp->custref;
2758  $outlabel = $objp->label;
2759  $outdesc = $objp->description;
2760  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_MULTILANGS)) {
2761  $outlabel_translated = $objp->label_translated;
2762  $outdesc_translated = $objp->description_translated;
2763  }
2764  $outbarcode = $objp->barcode;
2765  $outorigin = $objp->fk_country;
2766  $outpbq = empty($objp->price_by_qty_rowid) ? '' : $objp->price_by_qty_rowid;
2767 
2768  $outtype = $objp->fk_product_type;
2769  $outdurationvalue = $outtype == Product::TYPE_SERVICE ?substr($objp->duration, 0, dol_strlen($objp->duration) - 1) : '';
2770  $outdurationunit = $outtype == Product::TYPE_SERVICE ?substr($objp->duration, -1) : '';
2771 
2772  if ($outorigin && !empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_SHOW_ORIGIN_IN_COMBO)) {
2773  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/company.lib.php';
2774  }
2775 
2776  // Units
2777  $outvalUnits = '';
2778  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_USE_UNITS)) {
2779  if (!empty($objp->unit_short)) {
2780  $outvalUnits .= ' - '.$objp->unit_short;
2781  }
2782  }
2783  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_SHOW_DIMENSIONS_IN_COMBO)) {
2784  if (!empty($objp->weight) && $objp->weight_units !== null) {
2785  $unitToShow = showDimensionInBestUnit($objp->weight, $objp->weight_units, 'weight', $langs);
2786  $outvalUnits .= ' - '.$unitToShow;
2787  }
2788  if ((!empty($objp->length) || !empty($objp->width) || !empty($objp->height)) && $objp->length_units !== null) {
2789  $unitToShow = $objp->length.' x '.$objp->width.' x '.$objp->height.' '.measuringUnitString(0, 'size', $objp->length_units);
2790  $outvalUnits .= ' - '.$unitToShow;
2791  }
2792  if (!empty($objp->surface) && $objp->surface_units !== null) {
2793  $unitToShow = showDimensionInBestUnit($objp->surface, $objp->surface_units, 'surface', $langs);
2794  $outvalUnits .= ' - '.$unitToShow;
2795  }
2796  if (!empty($objp->volume) && $objp->volume_units !== null) {
2797  $unitToShow = showDimensionInBestUnit($objp->volume, $objp->volume_units, 'volume', $langs);
2798  $outvalUnits .= ' - '.$unitToShow;
2799  }
2800  }
2801  if ($outdurationvalue && $outdurationunit) {
2802  $da = array(
2803  'h' => $langs->trans('Hour'),
2804  'd' => $langs->trans('Day'),
2805  'w' => $langs->trans('Week'),
2806  'm' => $langs->trans('Month'),
2807  'y' => $langs->trans('Year')
2808  );
2809  if (isset($da[$outdurationunit])) {
2810  $outvalUnits .= ' - '.$outdurationvalue.' '.$langs->transnoentities($da[$outdurationunit].($outdurationvalue > 1 ? 's' : ''));
2811  }
2812  }
2813 
2814  $opt = '<option value="'.$objp->rowid.'"';
2815  $opt .= ($objp->rowid == $selected) ? ' selected' : '';
2816  if (!empty($objp->price_by_qty_rowid) && $objp->price_by_qty_rowid > 0) {
2817  $opt .= ' pbq="'.$objp->price_by_qty_rowid.'" data-pbq="'.$objp->price_by_qty_rowid.'" data-pbqup="'.$objp->price_by_qty_unitprice.'" data-pbqbase="'.$objp->price_by_qty_price_base_type.'" data-pbqqty="'.$objp->price_by_qty_quantity.'" data-pbqpercent="'.$objp->price_by_qty_remise_percent.'"';
2818  }
2819  if (!empty($conf->stock->enabled) && isset($objp->stock) && ($objp->fk_product_type == Product::TYPE_PRODUCT || !empty($conf->global->STOCK_SUPPORTS_SERVICES))) {
2820  if (!empty($user->rights->stock->lire)) {
2821  if ($objp->stock > 0) {
2822  $opt .= ' class="product_line_stock_ok"';
2823  } elseif ($objp->stock <= 0) {
2824  $opt .= ' class="product_line_stock_too_low"';
2825  }
2826  }
2827  }
2828  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_TEXTS_IN_THIRDPARTY_LANGUAGE)) {
2829  $opt .= ' data-labeltrans="'.$outlabel_translated.'"';
2830  $opt .= ' data-desctrans="'.dol_escape_htmltag($outdesc_translated).'"';
2831  }
2832  $opt .= '>';
2833  $opt .= $objp->ref;
2834  if (! empty($objp->custref)) {
2835  $opt.= ' (' . $objp->custref . ')';
2836  }
2837  if ($outbarcode) {
2838  $opt .= ' ('.$outbarcode.')';
2839  }
2840  $opt .= ' - '.dol_trunc($label, $maxlengtharticle);
2841  if ($outorigin && !empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_SHOW_ORIGIN_IN_COMBO)) {
2842  $opt .= ' ('.getCountry($outorigin, 1).')';
2843  }
2844 
2845  $objRef = $objp->ref;
2846  if (! empty($objp->custref)) {
2847  $objRef .= ' (' . $objp->custref . ')';
2848  }
2849  if (!empty($filterkey) && $filterkey != '') {
2850  $objRef = preg_replace('/('.preg_quote($filterkey, '/').')/i', '<strong>$1</strong>', $objRef, 1);
2851  }
2852  $outval .= $objRef;
2853  if ($outbarcode) {
2854  $outval .= ' ('.$outbarcode.')';
2855  }
2856  $outval .= ' - '.dol_trunc($label, $maxlengtharticle);
2857  if ($outorigin && !empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_SHOW_ORIGIN_IN_COMBO)) {
2858  $outval .= ' ('.getCountry($outorigin, 1).')';
2859  }
2860 
2861  // Units
2862  $opt .= $outvalUnits;
2863  $outval .= $outvalUnits;
2864 
2865  $found = 0;
2866 
2867  // Multiprice
2868  // If we need a particular price level (from 1 to 6)
2869  if (empty($hidepriceinlabel) && $price_level >= 1 && (!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_MULTIPRICES) || !empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_CUSTOMER_PRICES_BY_QTY_MULTIPRICES))) {
2870  $sql = "SELECT price, price_ttc, price_base_type, tva_tx";
2871  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product_price";
2872  $sql .= " WHERE fk_product = ".((int) $objp->rowid);
2873  $sql .= " AND entity IN (".getEntity('productprice').")";
2874  $sql .= " AND price_level = ".((int) $price_level);
2875  $sql .= " ORDER BY date_price DESC, rowid DESC"; // Warning DESC must be both on date_price and rowid.
2876  $sql .= " LIMIT 1";
2877 
2878  dol_syslog(get_class($this).'::constructProductListOption search price for product '.$objp->rowid.' AND level '.$price_level.'', LOG_DEBUG);
2879  $result2 = $this->db->query($sql);
2880  if ($result2) {
2881  $objp2 = $this->db->fetch_object($result2);
2882  if ($objp2) {
2883  $found = 1;
2884  if ($objp2->price_base_type == 'HT') {
2885  $opt .= ' - '.price($objp2->price, 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency).' '.$langs->trans("HT");
2886  $outval .= ' - '.price($objp2->price, 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency).' '.$langs->transnoentities("HT");
2887  } else {
2888  $opt .= ' - '.price($objp2->price_ttc, 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency).' '.$langs->trans("TTC");
2889  $outval .= ' - '.price($objp2->price_ttc, 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency).' '.$langs->transnoentities("TTC");
2890  }
2891  $outprice_ht = price($objp2->price);
2892  $outprice_ttc = price($objp2->price_ttc);
2893  $outpricebasetype = $objp2->price_base_type;
2894  $outtva_tx = $objp2->tva_tx;
2895  }
2896  } else {
2897  dol_print_error($this->db);
2898  }
2899  }
2900 
2901  // Price by quantity
2902  if (empty($hidepriceinlabel) && !empty($objp->quantity) && $objp->quantity >= 1 && (!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_CUSTOMER_PRICES_BY_QTY) || !empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_CUSTOMER_PRICES_BY_QTY_MULTIPRICES))) {
2903  $found = 1;
2904  $outqty = $objp->quantity;
2905  $outdiscount = $objp->remise_percent;
2906  if ($objp->quantity == 1) {
2907  $opt .= ' - '.price($objp->unitprice, 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/";
2908  $outval .= ' - '.price($objp->unitprice, 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/";
2909  $opt .= $langs->trans("Unit"); // Do not use strtolower because it breaks utf8 encoding
2910  $outval .= $langs->transnoentities("Unit");
2911  } else {
2912  $opt .= ' - '.price($objp->price, 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/".$objp->quantity;
2913  $outval .= ' - '.price($objp->price, 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/".$objp->quantity;
2914  $opt .= $langs->trans("Units"); // Do not use strtolower because it breaks utf8 encoding
2915  $outval .= $langs->transnoentities("Units");
2916  }
2917 
2918  $outprice_ht = price($objp->unitprice);
2919  $outprice_ttc = price($objp->unitprice * (1 + ($objp->tva_tx / 100)));
2920  $outpricebasetype = $objp->price_base_type;
2921  $outtva_tx = $objp->tva_tx;
2922  }
2923  if (empty($hidepriceinlabel) && !empty($objp->quantity) && $objp->quantity >= 1) {
2924  $opt .= " (".price($objp->unitprice, 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/".$langs->trans("Unit").")"; // Do not use strtolower because it breaks utf8 encoding
2925  $outval .= " (".price($objp->unitprice, 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/".$langs->transnoentities("Unit").")"; // Do not use strtolower because it breaks utf8 encoding
2926  }
2927  if (empty($hidepriceinlabel) && !empty($objp->remise_percent) && $objp->remise_percent >= 1) {
2928  $opt .= " - ".$langs->trans("Discount")." : ".vatrate($objp->remise_percent).' %';
2929  $outval .= " - ".$langs->transnoentities("Discount")." : ".vatrate($objp->remise_percent).' %';
2930  }
2931 
2932  // Price by customer
2933  if (empty($hidepriceinlabel) && !empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_CUSTOMER_PRICES)) {
2934  if (!empty($objp->idprodcustprice)) {
2935  $found = 1;
2936 
2937  if ($objp->custprice_base_type == 'HT') {
2938  $opt .= ' - '.price($objp->custprice, 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency).' '.$langs->trans("HT");
2939  $outval .= ' - '.price($objp->custprice, 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency).' '.$langs->transnoentities("HT");
2940  } else {
2941  $opt .= ' - '.price($objp->custprice_ttc, 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency).' '.$langs->trans("TTC");
2942  $outval .= ' - '.price($objp->custprice_ttc, 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency).' '.$langs->transnoentities("TTC");
2943  }
2944 
2945  $outprice_ht = price($objp->custprice);
2946  $outprice_ttc = price($objp->custprice_ttc);
2947  $outpricebasetype = $objp->custprice_base_type;
2948  $outtva_tx = $objp->custtva_tx;
2949  }
2950  }
2951 
2952  // If level no defined or multiprice not found, we used the default price
2953  if (empty($hidepriceinlabel) && !$found) {
2954  if ($objp->price_base_type == 'HT') {
2955  $opt .= ' - '.price($objp->price, 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency).' '.$langs->trans("HT");
2956  $outval .= ' - '.price($objp->price, 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency).' '.$langs->transnoentities("HT");
2957  } else {
2958  $opt .= ' - '.price($objp->price_ttc, 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency).' '.$langs->trans("TTC");
2959  $outval .= ' - '.price($objp->price_ttc, 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency).' '.$langs->transnoentities("TTC");
2960  }
2961  $outprice_ht = price($objp->price);
2962  $outprice_ttc = price($objp->price_ttc);
2963  $outpricebasetype = $objp->price_base_type;
2964  $outtva_tx = $objp->tva_tx;
2965  }
2966 
2967  if (!empty($conf->stock->enabled) && isset($objp->stock) && ($objp->fk_product_type == Product::TYPE_PRODUCT || !empty($conf->global->STOCK_SUPPORTS_SERVICES))) {
2968  if (!empty($user->rights->stock->lire)) {
2969  $opt .= ' - '.$langs->trans("Stock").': '.price(price2num($objp->stock, 'MS'));
2970 
2971  if ($objp->stock > 0) {
2972  $outval .= ' - <span class="product_line_stock_ok">';
2973  } elseif ($objp->stock <= 0) {
2974  $outval .= ' - <span class="product_line_stock_too_low">';
2975  }
2976  $outval .= $langs->transnoentities("Stock").': '.price(price2num($objp->stock, 'MS'));
2977  $outval .= '</span>';
2978  if (empty($novirtualstock) && !empty($conf->global->STOCK_SHOW_VIRTUAL_STOCK_IN_PRODUCTS_COMBO)) { // Warning, this option may slow down combo list generation
2979  $langs->load("stocks");
2980 
2981  $tmpproduct = new Product($this->db);
2982  $tmpproduct->fetch($objp->rowid, '', '', '', 1, 1, 1); // Load product without lang and prices arrays (we just need to make ->virtual_stock() after)
2983  $tmpproduct->load_virtual_stock();
2984  $virtualstock = $tmpproduct->stock_theorique;
2985 
2986  $opt .= ' - '.$langs->trans("VirtualStock").':'.$virtualstock;
2987 
2988  $outval .= ' - '.$langs->transnoentities("VirtualStock").':';
2989  if ($virtualstock > 0) {
2990  $outval .= '<span class="product_line_stock_ok">';
2991  } elseif ($virtualstock <= 0) {
2992  $outval .= '<span class="product_line_stock_too_low">';
2993  }
2994  $outval .= $virtualstock;
2995  $outval .= '</span>';
2996 
2997  unset($tmpproduct);
2998  }
2999  }
3000  }
3001 
3002  $opt .= "</option>\n";
3003  $optJson = array(
3004  'key'=>$outkey,
3005  'value'=>$outref,
3006  'label'=>$outval,
3007  'label2'=>$outlabel,
3008  'desc'=>$outdesc,
3009  'type'=>$outtype,
3010  'price_ht'=>price2num($outprice_ht),
3011  'price_ttc'=>price2num($outprice_ttc),
3012  'pricebasetype'=>$outpricebasetype,
3013  'tva_tx'=>$outtva_tx, 'qty'=>$outqty,
3014  'discount'=>$outdiscount,
3015  'duration_value'=>$outdurationvalue,
3016  'duration_unit'=>$outdurationunit,
3017  'pbq'=>$outpbq,
3018  'labeltrans'=>$outlabel_translated,
3019  'desctrans'=>$outdesc_translated,
3020  'ref_customer'=>$outrefcust
3021  );
3022  }
3023 
3024  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3040  public function select_produits_fournisseurs($socid, $selected = '', $htmlname = 'productid', $filtertype = '', $filtre = '', $ajaxoptions = array(), $hidelabel = 0, $alsoproductwithnosupplierprice = 0, $morecss = '', $placeholder = '')
3041  {
3042  // phpcs:enable
3043  global $langs, $conf;
3044  global $price_level, $status, $finished;
3045 
3046  if (!isset($status)) {
3047  $status = 1;
3048  }
3049 
3050  $selected_input_value = '';
3051  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) && !empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_USE_SEARCH_TO_SELECT)) {
3052  if ($selected > 0) {
3053  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/product/class/product.class.php';
3054  $producttmpselect = new Product($this->db);
3055  $producttmpselect->fetch($selected);
3056  $selected_input_value = $producttmpselect->ref;
3057  unset($producttmpselect);
3058  }
3059 
3060  // mode=2 means suppliers products
3061  $urloption = ($socid > 0 ? 'socid='.$socid.'&' : '').'htmlname='.$htmlname.'&outjson=1&price_level='.$price_level.'&type='.$filtertype.'&mode=2&status='.$status.'&finished='.$finished.'&alsoproductwithnosupplierprice='.$alsoproductwithnosupplierprice;
3062  print ajax_autocompleter($selected, $htmlname, DOL_URL_ROOT.'/product/ajax/products.php', $urloption, $conf->global->PRODUIT_USE_SEARCH_TO_SELECT, 0, $ajaxoptions);
3063  print ($hidelabel ? '' : $langs->trans("RefOrLabel").' : ').'<input type="text" class="minwidth300" name="search_'.$htmlname.'" id="search_'.$htmlname.'" value="'.$selected_input_value.'"'.($placeholder ? ' placeholder="'.$placeholder.'"' : '').'>';
3064  } else {
3065  print $this->select_produits_fournisseurs_list($socid, $selected, $htmlname, $filtertype, $filtre, '', $status, 0, 0, $alsoproductwithnosupplierprice, $morecss, 0, $placeholder);
3066  }
3067  }
3068 
3069  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3088  public function select_produits_fournisseurs_list($socid, $selected = '', $htmlname = 'productid', $filtertype = '', $filtre = '', $filterkey = '', $statut = -1, $outputmode = 0, $limit = 100, $alsoproductwithnosupplierprice = 0, $morecss = '', $showstockinlist = 0, $placeholder = '')
3089  {
3090  // phpcs:enable
3091  global $langs, $conf, $db, $user;
3092 
3093  $out = '';
3094  $outarray = array();
3095 
3096  $maxlengtharticle = (empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_MAX_LENGTH_COMBO) ? 48 : $conf->global->PRODUCT_MAX_LENGTH_COMBO);
3097 
3098  $langs->load('stocks');
3099  // Units
3100  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_USE_UNITS)) {
3101  $langs->load('other');
3102  }
3103 
3104  $sql = "SELECT p.rowid, p.ref, p.label, p.price, p.duration, p.fk_product_type, p.stock,";
3105  $sql .= " pfp.ref_fourn, pfp.rowid as idprodfournprice, pfp.price as fprice, pfp.quantity, pfp.remise_percent, pfp.remise, pfp.unitprice,";
3106  $sql .= " pfp.fk_supplier_price_expression, pfp.fk_product, pfp.tva_tx, pfp.fk_soc, s.nom as name,";
3107  $sql .= " pfp.supplier_reputation";
3108  // if we use supplier description of the products
3109  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_FOURN_TEXTS)) {
3110  $sql .= " ,pfp.desc_fourn as description";
3111  } else {
3112  $sql .= " ,p.description";
3113  }
3114  // Units
3115  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_USE_UNITS)) {
3116  $sql .= ", u.label as unit_long, u.short_label as unit_short, p.weight, p.weight_units, p.length, p.length_units, p.width, p.width_units, p.height, p.height_units, p.surface, p.surface_units, p.volume, p.volume_units";
3117  }
3118  if (!empty($conf->barcode->enabled)) {
3119  $sql .= ", pfp.barcode";
3120  }
3121  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product as p";
3122  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product_fournisseur_price as pfp ON ( p.rowid = pfp.fk_product AND pfp.entity IN (".getEntity('product').") )";
3123  if ($socid > 0) {
3124  $sql .= " AND pfp.fk_soc = ".((int) $socid);
3125  }
3126  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s ON pfp.fk_soc = s.rowid";
3127  // Units
3128  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_USE_UNITS)) {
3129  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_units u ON u.rowid = p.fk_unit";
3130  }
3131  $sql .= " WHERE p.entity IN (".getEntity('product').")";
3132  if ($statut != -1) {
3133  $sql .= " AND p.tobuy = ".((int) $statut);
3134  }
3135  if (strval($filtertype) != '') {
3136  $sql .= " AND p.fk_product_type = ".((int) $filtertype);
3137  }
3138  if (!empty($filtre)) {
3139  $sql .= " ".$filtre;
3140  }
3141  // Add criteria on ref/label
3142  if ($filterkey != '') {
3143  $sql .= ' AND (';
3144  $prefix = empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_DONOTSEARCH_ANYWHERE) ? '%' : ''; // Can use index if PRODUCT_DONOTSEARCH_ANYWHERE is on
3145  // For natural search
3146  $scrit = explode(' ', $filterkey);
3147  $i = 0;
3148  if (count($scrit) > 1) {
3149  $sql .= "(";
3150  }
3151  foreach ($scrit as $crit) {
3152  if ($i > 0) {
3153  $sql .= " AND ";
3154  }
3155  $sql .= "(pfp.ref_fourn LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$crit)."%' OR p.ref LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$crit)."%' OR p.label LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$crit)."%'";
3156  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_FOURN_TEXTS)) {
3157  $sql .= " OR pfp.desc_fourn LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$crit)."%'";
3158  }
3159  $sql .= ")";
3160  $i++;
3161  }
3162  if (count($scrit) > 1) {
3163  $sql .= ")";
3164  }
3165  if (!empty($conf->barcode->enabled)) {
3166  $sql .= " OR p.barcode LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$filterkey)."%'";
3167  $sql .= " OR pfp.barcode LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$filterkey)."%'";
3168  }
3169  $sql .= ')';
3170  }
3171  $sql .= " ORDER BY pfp.ref_fourn DESC, pfp.quantity ASC";
3172  $sql .= $this->db->plimit($limit, 0);
3173 
3174  // Build output string
3175 
3176  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::select_produits_fournisseurs_list", LOG_DEBUG);
3177  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
3178  if ($result) {
3179  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/product/dynamic_price/class/price_parser.class.php';
3180  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/product.lib.php';
3181 
3182  $num = $this->db->num_rows($result);
3183 
3184  //$out.='<select class="flat" id="select'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'">'; // remove select to have id same with combo and ajax
3185  $out .= '<select class="flat '.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" id="'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'">';
3186  if (!$selected) {
3187  $out .= '<option value="-1" selected>'.($placeholder ? $placeholder : '&nbsp;').'</option>';
3188  } else {
3189  $out .= '<option value="-1">'.($placeholder ? $placeholder : '&nbsp;').'</option>';
3190  }
3191 
3192  $i = 0;
3193  while ($i < $num) {
3194  $objp = $this->db->fetch_object($result);
3195 
3196  $outkey = $objp->idprodfournprice; // id in table of price
3197  if (!$outkey && $alsoproductwithnosupplierprice) {
3198  $outkey = 'idprod_'.$objp->rowid; // id of product
3199  }
3200 
3201  $outref = $objp->ref;
3202  $outval = '';
3203  $outbarcode = $objp->barcode;
3204  $outqty = 1;
3205  $outdiscount = 0;
3206  $outtype = $objp->fk_product_type;
3207  $outdurationvalue = $outtype == Product::TYPE_SERVICE ?substr($objp->duration, 0, dol_strlen($objp->duration) - 1) : '';
3208  $outdurationunit = $outtype == Product::TYPE_SERVICE ?substr($objp->duration, -1) : '';
3209 
3210  // Units
3211  $outvalUnits = '';
3212  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_USE_UNITS)) {
3213  if (!empty($objp->unit_short)) {
3214  $outvalUnits .= ' - '.$objp->unit_short;
3215  }
3216  if (!empty($objp->weight) && $objp->weight_units !== null) {
3217  $unitToShow = showDimensionInBestUnit($objp->weight, $objp->weight_units, 'weight', $langs);
3218  $outvalUnits .= ' - '.$unitToShow;
3219  }
3220  if ((!empty($objp->length) || !empty($objp->width) || !empty($objp->height)) && $objp->length_units !== null) {
3221  $unitToShow = $objp->length.' x '.$objp->width.' x '.$objp->height.' '.measuringUnitString(0, 'size', $objp->length_units);
3222  $outvalUnits .= ' - '.$unitToShow;
3223  }
3224  if (!empty($objp->surface) && $objp->surface_units !== null) {
3225  $unitToShow = showDimensionInBestUnit($objp->surface, $objp->surface_units, 'surface', $langs);
3226  $outvalUnits .= ' - '.$unitToShow;
3227  }
3228  if (!empty($objp->volume) && $objp->volume_units !== null) {
3229  $unitToShow = showDimensionInBestUnit($objp->volume, $objp->volume_units, 'volume', $langs);
3230  $outvalUnits .= ' - '.$unitToShow;
3231  }
3232  if ($outdurationvalue && $outdurationunit) {
3233  $da = array(
3234  'h' => $langs->trans('Hour'),
3235  'd' => $langs->trans('Day'),
3236  'w' => $langs->trans('Week'),
3237  'm' => $langs->trans('Month'),
3238  'y' => $langs->trans('Year')
3239  );
3240  if (isset($da[$outdurationunit])) {
3241  $outvalUnits .= ' - '.$outdurationvalue.' '.$langs->transnoentities($da[$outdurationunit].($outdurationvalue > 1 ? 's' : ''));
3242  }
3243  }
3244  }
3245 
3246  $objRef = $objp->ref;
3247  if ($filterkey && $filterkey != '') {
3248  $objRef = preg_replace('/('.preg_quote($filterkey, '/').')/i', '<strong>$1</strong>', $objRef, 1);
3249  }
3250  $objRefFourn = $objp->ref_fourn;
3251  if ($filterkey && $filterkey != '') {
3252  $objRefFourn = preg_replace('/('.preg_quote($filterkey, '/').')/i', '<strong>$1</strong>', $objRefFourn, 1);
3253  }
3254  $label = $objp->label;
3255  if ($filterkey && $filterkey != '') {
3256  $label = preg_replace('/('.preg_quote($filterkey, '/').')/i', '<strong>$1</strong>', $label, 1);
3257  }
3258 
3259  $optlabel = $objp->ref;
3260  if (!empty($objp->idprodfournprice) && ($objp->ref != $objp->ref_fourn)) {
3261  $optlabel .= ' <span class=\'opacitymedium\'>('.$objp->ref_fourn.')</span>';
3262  }
3263  if (!empty($conf->barcode->enabled) && !empty($objp->barcode)) {
3264  $optlabel .= ' ('.$outbarcode.')';
3265  }
3266  $optlabel .= ' - '.dol_trunc($label, $maxlengtharticle);
3267 
3268  $outvallabel = $objRef;
3269  if (!empty($objp->idprodfournprice) && ($objp->ref != $objp->ref_fourn)) {
3270  $outvallabel .= ' ('.$objRefFourn.')';
3271  }
3272  if (!empty($conf->barcode->enabled) && !empty($objp->barcode)) {
3273  $outvallabel .= ' ('.$outbarcode.')';
3274  }
3275  $outvallabel .= ' - '.dol_trunc($label, $maxlengtharticle);
3276 
3277  // Units
3278  $optlabel .= $outvalUnits;
3279  $outvallabel .= $outvalUnits;
3280 
3281  if (!empty($objp->idprodfournprice)) {
3282  $outqty = $objp->quantity;
3283  $outdiscount = $objp->remise_percent;
3284  if (!empty($conf->dynamicprices->enabled) && !empty($objp->fk_supplier_price_expression)) {
3285  $prod_supplier = new ProductFournisseur($this->db);
3286  $prod_supplier->product_fourn_price_id = $objp->idprodfournprice;
3287  $prod_supplier->id = $objp->fk_product;
3288  $prod_supplier->fourn_qty = $objp->quantity;
3289  $prod_supplier->fourn_tva_tx = $objp->tva_tx;
3290  $prod_supplier->fk_supplier_price_expression = $objp->fk_supplier_price_expression;
3291  $priceparser = new PriceParser($this->db);
3292  $price_result = $priceparser->parseProductSupplier($prod_supplier);
3293  if ($price_result >= 0) {
3294  $objp->fprice = $price_result;
3295  if ($objp->quantity >= 1) {
3296  $objp->unitprice = $objp->fprice / $objp->quantity; // Replace dynamically unitprice
3297  }
3298  }
3299  }
3300  if ($objp->quantity == 1) {
3301  $optlabel .= ' - '.price($objp->fprice * (!empty($conf->global->DISPLAY_DISCOUNTED_SUPPLIER_PRICE) ? (1 - $objp->remise_percent / 100) : 1), 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/";
3302  $outvallabel .= ' - '.price($objp->fprice * (!empty($conf->global->DISPLAY_DISCOUNTED_SUPPLIER_PRICE) ? (1 - $objp->remise_percent / 100) : 1), 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/";
3303  $optlabel .= $langs->trans("Unit"); // Do not use strtolower because it breaks utf8 encoding
3304  $outvallabel .= $langs->transnoentities("Unit");
3305  } else {
3306  $optlabel .= ' - '.price($objp->fprice * (!empty($conf->global->DISPLAY_DISCOUNTED_SUPPLIER_PRICE) ? (1 - $objp->remise_percent / 100) : 1), 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/".$objp->quantity;
3307  $outvallabel .= ' - '.price($objp->fprice * (!empty($conf->global->DISPLAY_DISCOUNTED_SUPPLIER_PRICE) ? (1 - $objp->remise_percent / 100) : 1), 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/".$objp->quantity;
3308  $optlabel .= ' '.$langs->trans("Units"); // Do not use strtolower because it breaks utf8 encoding
3309  $outvallabel .= ' '.$langs->transnoentities("Units");
3310  }
3311 
3312  if ($objp->quantity > 1) {
3313  $optlabel .= " (".price($objp->unitprice * (!empty($conf->global->DISPLAY_DISCOUNTED_SUPPLIER_PRICE) ? (1 - $objp->remise_percent / 100) : 1), 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/".$langs->trans("Unit").")"; // Do not use strtolower because it breaks utf8 encoding
3314  $outvallabel .= " (".price($objp->unitprice * (!empty($conf->global->DISPLAY_DISCOUNTED_SUPPLIER_PRICE) ? (1 - $objp->remise_percent / 100) : 1), 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/".$langs->transnoentities("Unit").")"; // Do not use strtolower because it breaks utf8 encoding
3315  }
3316  if ($objp->remise_percent >= 1) {
3317  $optlabel .= " - ".$langs->trans("Discount")." : ".vatrate($objp->remise_percent).' %';
3318  $outvallabel .= " - ".$langs->transnoentities("Discount")." : ".vatrate($objp->remise_percent).' %';
3319  }
3320  if ($objp->duration) {
3321  $optlabel .= " - ".$objp->duration;
3322  $outvallabel .= " - ".$objp->duration;
3323  }
3324  if (!$socid) {
3325  $optlabel .= " - ".dol_trunc($objp->name, 8);
3326  $outvallabel .= " - ".dol_trunc($objp->name, 8);
3327  }
3328  if ($objp->supplier_reputation) {
3329  //TODO dictionary
3330  $reputations = array(''=>$langs->trans('Standard'), 'FAVORITE'=>$langs->trans('Favorite'), 'NOTTHGOOD'=>$langs->trans('NotTheGoodQualitySupplier'), 'DONOTORDER'=>$langs->trans('DoNotOrderThisProductToThisSupplier'));
3331 
3332  $optlabel .= " - ".$reputations[$objp->supplier_reputation];
3333  $outvallabel .= " - ".$reputations[$objp->supplier_reputation];
3334  }
3335  } else {
3336  if (empty($alsoproductwithnosupplierprice)) { // No supplier price defined for couple product/supplier
3337  $optlabel .= " - <span class='opacitymedium'>".$langs->trans("NoPriceDefinedForThisSupplier").'</span>';
3338  $outvallabel .= ' - '.$langs->transnoentities("NoPriceDefinedForThisSupplier");
3339  } else // No supplier price defined for product, even on other suppliers
3340  {
3341  $optlabel .= " - <span class='opacitymedium'>".$langs->trans("NoPriceDefinedForThisSupplier").'</span>';
3342  $outvallabel .= ' - '.$langs->transnoentities("NoPriceDefinedForThisSupplier");
3343  }
3344  }
3345 
3346  if (!empty($conf->stock->enabled) && $showstockinlist && isset($objp->stock) && ($objp->fk_product_type == Product::TYPE_PRODUCT || !empty($conf->global->STOCK_SUPPORTS_SERVICES))) {
3347  $novirtualstock = ($showstockinlist == 2);
3348 
3349  if (!empty($user->rights->stock->lire)) {
3350  $outvallabel .= ' - '.$langs->trans("Stock").': '.price(price2num($objp->stock, 'MS'));
3351 
3352  if ($objp->stock > 0) {
3353  $optlabel .= ' - <span class="product_line_stock_ok">';
3354  } elseif ($objp->stock <= 0) {
3355  $optlabel .= ' - <span class="product_line_stock_too_low">';
3356  }
3357  $optlabel .= $langs->transnoentities("Stock").':'.price(price2num($objp->stock, 'MS'));
3358  $optlabel .= '</span>';
3359  if (empty($novirtualstock) && !empty($conf->global->STOCK_SHOW_VIRTUAL_STOCK_IN_PRODUCTS_COMBO)) { // Warning, this option may slow down combo list generation
3360  $langs->load("stocks");
3361 
3362  $tmpproduct = new Product($this->db);
3363  $tmpproduct->fetch($objp->rowid, '', '', '', 1, 1, 1); // Load product without lang and prices arrays (we just need to make ->virtual_stock() after)
3364  $tmpproduct->load_virtual_stock();
3365  $virtualstock = $tmpproduct->stock_theorique;
3366 
3367  $outvallabel .= ' - '.$langs->trans("VirtualStock").':'.$virtualstock;
3368 
3369  $optlabel .= ' - '.$langs->transnoentities("VirtualStock").':';
3370  if ($virtualstock > 0) {
3371  $optlabel .= '<span class="product_line_stock_ok">';
3372  } elseif ($virtualstock <= 0) {
3373  $optlabel .= '<span class="product_line_stock_too_low">';
3374  }
3375  $optlabel .= $virtualstock;
3376  $optlabel .= '</span>';
3377 
3378  unset($tmpproduct);
3379  }
3380  }
3381  }
3382 
3383  $opt = '<option value="'.$outkey.'"';
3384  if ($selected && $selected == $objp->idprodfournprice) {
3385  $opt .= ' selected';
3386  }
3387  if (empty($objp->idprodfournprice) && empty($alsoproductwithnosupplierprice)) {
3388  $opt .= ' disabled';
3389  }
3390  if (!empty($objp->idprodfournprice) && $objp->idprodfournprice > 0) {
3391  $opt .= ' data-product-id="'.$objp->rowid.'" data-price-id="'.$objp->idprodfournprice.'" data-qty="'.$objp->quantity.'" data-up="'.$objp->unitprice.'" data-discount="'.$outdiscount.'"';
3392  }
3393  $opt .= ' data-description="'.dol_escape_htmltag($objp->description, 0, 1).'"';
3394  $opt .= ' data-html="'.dol_escape_htmltag($optlabel).'"';
3395  $opt .= '>';
3396 
3397  $opt .= $optlabel;
3398  $outval .= $outvallabel;
3399 
3400  $opt .= "</option>\n";
3401 
3402 
3403  // Add new entry
3404  // "key" value of json key array is used by jQuery automatically as selected value. Example: 'type' = product or service, 'price_ht' = unit price without tax
3405  // "label" value of json key array is used by jQuery automatically as text for combo box
3406  $out .= $opt;
3407  array_push(
3408  $outarray,
3409  array('key'=>$outkey,
3410  'value'=>$outref,
3411  'label'=>$outval,
3412  'qty'=>$outqty,
3413  'price_ht'=>price2num($objp->unitprice, 'MT'),
3414  'discount'=>$outdiscount,
3415  'type'=>$outtype,
3416  'duration_value'=>$outdurationvalue,
3417  'duration_unit'=>$outdurationunit,
3418  'disabled'=>(empty($objp->idprodfournprice) ? true : false),
3419  'description'=>$objp->description
3420  )
3421  );
3422  // Exemple of var_dump $outarray
3423  // array(1) {[0]=>array(6) {[key"]=>string(1) "2" ["value"]=>string(3) "ppp"
3424  // ["label"]=>string(76) "ppp (<strong>f</strong>ff2) - ppp - 20,00 Euros/1unité (20,00 Euros/unité)"
3425  // ["qty"]=>string(1) "1" ["discount"]=>string(1) "0" ["disabled"]=>bool(false)
3426  //}
3427  //var_dump($outval); var_dump(utf8_check($outval)); var_dump(json_encode($outval));
3428  //$outval=array('label'=>'ppp (<strong>f</strong>ff2) - ppp - 20,00 Euros/ Unité (20,00 Euros/unité)');
3429  //var_dump($outval); var_dump(utf8_check($outval)); var_dump(json_encode($outval));
3430 
3431  $i++;
3432  }
3433  $out .= '</select>';
3434 
3435  $this->db->free($result);
3436 
3437  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/ajax.lib.php';
3438  $out .= ajax_combobox($htmlname);
3439 
3440  if (empty($outputmode)) {
3441  return $out;
3442  }
3443  return $outarray;
3444  } else {
3445  dol_print_error($this->db);
3446  }
3447  }
3448 
3449  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3458  public function select_product_fourn_price($productid, $htmlname = 'productfournpriceid', $selected_supplier = '')
3459  {
3460  // phpcs:enable
3461  global $langs, $conf;
3462 
3463  $langs->load('stocks');
3464 
3465  $sql = "SELECT p.rowid, p.ref, p.label, p.price, p.duration, pfp.fk_soc,";
3466  $sql .= " pfp.ref_fourn, pfp.rowid as idprodfournprice, pfp.price as fprice, pfp.remise_percent, pfp.quantity, pfp.unitprice,";
3467  $sql .= " pfp.fk_supplier_price_expression, pfp.fk_product, pfp.tva_tx, s.nom as name";
3468  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product as p";
3469  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."product_fournisseur_price as pfp ON p.rowid = pfp.fk_product";
3470  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s ON pfp.fk_soc = s.rowid";
3471  $sql .= " WHERE pfp.entity IN (".getEntity('productsupplierprice').")";
3472  $sql .= " AND p.tobuy = 1";
3473  $sql .= " AND s.fournisseur = 1";
3474  $sql .= " AND p.rowid = ".((int) $productid);
3475  $sql .= " ORDER BY s.nom, pfp.ref_fourn DESC";
3476 
3477  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::select_product_fourn_price", LOG_DEBUG);
3478  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
3479 
3480  if ($result) {
3481  $num = $this->db->num_rows($result);
3482 
3483  $form = '<select class="flat" id="select_'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'">';
3484 
3485  if (!$num) {
3486  $form .= '<option value="0">-- '.$langs->trans("NoSupplierPriceDefinedForThisProduct").' --</option>';
3487  } else {
3488  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/product/dynamic_price/class/price_parser.class.php';
3489  $form .= '<option value="0">&nbsp;</option>';
3490 
3491  $i = 0;
3492  while ($i < $num) {
3493  $objp = $this->db->fetch_object($result);
3494 
3495  $opt = '<option value="'.$objp->idprodfournprice.'"';
3496  //if there is only one supplier, preselect it
3497  if ($num == 1 || ($selected_supplier > 0 && $objp->fk_soc == $selected_supplier)) {
3498  $opt .= ' selected';
3499  }
3500  $opt .= '>'.$objp->name.' - '.$objp->ref_fourn.' - ';
3501 
3502  if (!empty($conf->dynamicprices->enabled) && !empty($objp->fk_supplier_price_expression)) {
3503  $prod_supplier = new ProductFournisseur($this->db);
3504  $prod_supplier->product_fourn_price_id = $objp->idprodfournprice;
3505  $prod_supplier->id = $productid;
3506  $prod_supplier->fourn_qty = $objp->quantity;
3507  $prod_supplier->fourn_tva_tx = $objp->tva_tx;
3508  $prod_supplier->fk_supplier_price_expression = $objp->fk_supplier_price_expression;
3509  $priceparser = new PriceParser($this->db);
3510  $price_result = $priceparser->parseProductSupplier($prod_supplier);
3511  if ($price_result >= 0) {
3512  $objp->fprice = $price_result;
3513  if ($objp->quantity >= 1) {
3514  $objp->unitprice = $objp->fprice / $objp->quantity;
3515  }
3516  }
3517  }
3518  if ($objp->quantity == 1) {
3519  $opt .= price($objp->fprice * (!empty($conf->global->DISPLAY_DISCOUNTED_SUPPLIER_PRICE) ? (1 - $objp->remise_percent / 100) : 1), 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/";
3520  }
3521 
3522  $opt .= $objp->quantity.' ';
3523 
3524  if ($objp->quantity == 1) {
3525  $opt .= $langs->trans("Unit");
3526  } else {
3527  $opt .= $langs->trans("Units");
3528  }
3529  if ($objp->quantity > 1) {
3530  $opt .= " - ";
3531  $opt .= price($objp->unitprice * (!empty($conf->global->DISPLAY_DISCOUNTED_SUPPLIER_PRICE) ? (1 - $objp->remise_percent / 100) : 1), 1, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency)."/".$langs->trans("Unit");
3532  }
3533  if ($objp->duration) {
3534  $opt .= " - ".$objp->duration;
3535  }
3536  $opt .= "</option>\n";
3537 
3538  $form .= $opt;
3539  $i++;
3540  }
3541  }
3542 
3543  $form .= '</select>';
3544  $this->db->free($result);
3545  return $form;
3546  } else {
3547  dol_print_error($this->db);
3548  }
3549  }
3550 
3551  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3561  public function select_address($selected, $socid, $htmlname = 'address_id', $showempty = 0)
3562  {
3563  // phpcs:enable
3564  // looking for users
3565  $sql = "SELECT a.rowid, a.label";
3566  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe_address as a";
3567  $sql .= " WHERE a.fk_soc = ".((int) $socid);
3568  $sql .= " ORDER BY a.label ASC";
3569 
3570  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::select_address", LOG_DEBUG);
3571  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3572  if ($resql) {
3573  print '<select class="flat" id="select_'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'">';
3574  if ($showempty) {
3575  print '<option value="0">&nbsp;</option>';
3576  }
3577  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
3578  $i = 0;
3579  if ($num) {
3580  while ($i < $num) {
3581  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
3582 
3583  if ($selected && $selected == $obj->rowid) {
3584  print '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'" selected>'.$obj->label.'</option>';
3585  } else {
3586  print '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'">'.$obj->label.'</option>';
3587  }
3588  $i++;
3589  }
3590  }
3591  print '</select>';
3592  return $num;
3593  } else {
3594  dol_print_error($this->db);
3595  }
3596  }
3597 
3598 
3599  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3605  public function load_cache_conditions_paiements()
3606  {
3607  // phpcs:enable
3608  global $langs;
3609 
3610  $num = count($this->cache_conditions_paiements);
3611  if ($num > 0) {
3612  return 0; // Cache already loaded
3613  }
3614 
3615  dol_syslog(__METHOD__, LOG_DEBUG);
3616 
3617  $sql = "SELECT rowid, code, libelle as label";
3618  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'c_payment_term';
3619  $sql .= " WHERE entity IN (".getEntity('c_payment_term').")";
3620  $sql .= " AND active > 0";
3621  $sql .= " ORDER BY sortorder";
3622 
3623  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3624  if ($resql) {
3625  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
3626  $i = 0;
3627  while ($i < $num) {
3628  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
3629 
3630  // Si traduction existe, on l'utilise, sinon on prend le libelle par defaut
3631  $label = ($langs->trans("PaymentConditionShort".$obj->code) != ("PaymentConditionShort".$obj->code) ? $langs->trans("PaymentConditionShort".$obj->code) : ($obj->label != '-' ? $obj->label : ''));
3632  $this->cache_conditions_paiements[$obj->rowid]['code'] = $obj->code;
3633  $this->cache_conditions_paiements[$obj->rowid]['label'] = $label;
3634  $i++;
3635  }
3636 
3637  //$this->cache_conditions_paiements=dol_sort_array($this->cache_conditions_paiements, 'label', 'asc', 0, 0, 1); // We use the field sortorder of table
3638 
3639  return $num;
3640  } else {
3641  dol_print_error($this->db);
3642  return -1;
3643  }
3644  }
3645 
3646  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3652  public function load_cache_availability()
3653  {
3654  // phpcs:enable
3655  global $langs;
3656 
3657  $num = count($this->cache_availability);
3658  if ($num > 0) {
3659  return 0; // Cache already loaded
3660  }
3661 
3662  dol_syslog(__METHOD__, LOG_DEBUG);
3663 
3664  $langs->load('propal');
3665 
3666  $sql = "SELECT rowid, code, label, position";
3667  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'c_availability';
3668  $sql .= " WHERE active > 0";
3669 
3670  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3671  if ($resql) {
3672  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
3673  $i = 0;
3674  while ($i < $num) {
3675  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
3676 
3677  // Si traduction existe, on l'utilise, sinon on prend le libelle par defaut
3678  $label = ($langs->trans("AvailabilityType".$obj->code) != ("AvailabilityType".$obj->code) ? $langs->trans("AvailabilityType".$obj->code) : ($obj->label != '-' ? $obj->label : ''));
3679  $this->cache_availability[$obj->rowid]['code'] = $obj->code;
3680  $this->cache_availability[$obj->rowid]['label'] = $label;
3681  $this->cache_availability[$obj->rowid]['position'] = $obj->position;
3682  $i++;
3683  }
3684 
3685  $this->cache_availability = dol_sort_array($this->cache_availability, 'position', 'asc', 0, 0, 1);
3686 
3687  return $num;
3688  } else {
3689  dol_print_error($this->db);
3690  return -1;
3691  }
3692  }
3693 
3704  public function selectAvailabilityDelay($selected = '', $htmlname = 'availid', $filtertype = '', $addempty = 0, $morecss = '')
3705  {
3706  global $langs, $user;
3707 
3708  $this->load_cache_availability();
3709 
3710  dol_syslog(__METHOD__." selected=".$selected.", htmlname=".$htmlname, LOG_DEBUG);
3711 
3712  print '<select id="'.$htmlname.'" class="flat'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" name="'.$htmlname.'">';
3713  if ($addempty) {
3714  print '<option value="0">&nbsp;</option>';
3715  }
3716  foreach ($this->cache_availability as $id => $arrayavailability) {
3717  if ($selected == $id) {
3718  print '<option value="'.$id.'" selected>';
3719  } else {
3720  print '<option value="'.$id.'">';
3721  }
3722  print dol_escape_htmltag($arrayavailability['label']);
3723  print '</option>';
3724  }
3725  print '</select>';
3726  if ($user->admin) {
3727  print info_admin($langs->trans("YouCanChangeValuesForThisListFromDictionarySetup"), 1);
3728  }
3729  print ajax_combobox($htmlname);
3730  }
3731 
3737  public function loadCacheInputReason()
3738  {
3739  global $langs;
3740 
3741  $num = count($this->cache_demand_reason);
3742  if ($num > 0) {
3743  return 0; // Cache already loaded
3744  }
3745 
3746  $sql = "SELECT rowid, code, label";
3747  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'c_input_reason';
3748  $sql .= " WHERE active > 0";
3749 
3750  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3751  if ($resql) {
3752  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
3753  $i = 0;
3754  $tmparray = array();
3755  while ($i < $num) {
3756  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
3757 
3758  // Si traduction existe, on l'utilise, sinon on prend le libelle par defaut
3759  $label = ($obj->label != '-' ? $obj->label : '');
3760  if ($langs->trans("DemandReasonType".$obj->code) != ("DemandReasonType".$obj->code)) {
3761  $label = $langs->trans("DemandReasonType".$obj->code); // So translation key DemandReasonTypeSRC_XXX will work
3762  }
3763  if ($langs->trans($obj->code) != $obj->code) {
3764  $label = $langs->trans($obj->code); // So translation key SRC_XXX will work
3765  }
3766 
3767  $tmparray[$obj->rowid]['id'] = $obj->rowid;
3768  $tmparray[$obj->rowid]['code'] = $obj->code;
3769  $tmparray[$obj->rowid]['label'] = $label;
3770  $i++;
3771  }
3772 
3773  $this->cache_demand_reason = dol_sort_array($tmparray, 'label', 'asc', 0, 0, 1);
3774 
3775  unset($tmparray);
3776  return $num;
3777  } else {
3778  dol_print_error($this->db);
3779  return -1;
3780  }
3781  }
3782 
3795  public function selectInputReason($selected = '', $htmlname = 'demandreasonid', $exclude = '', $addempty = 0, $morecss = '', $notooltip = 0)
3796  {
3797  global $langs, $user;
3798 
3799  $this->loadCacheInputReason();
3800 
3801  print '<select class="flat'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" id="select_'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'">';
3802  if ($addempty) {
3803  print '<option value="0"'.(empty($selected) ? ' selected' : '').'>&nbsp;</option>';
3804  }
3805  foreach ($this->cache_demand_reason as $id => $arraydemandreason) {
3806  if ($arraydemandreason['code'] == $exclude) {
3807  continue;
3808  }
3809 
3810  if ($selected && ($selected == $arraydemandreason['id'] || $selected == $arraydemandreason['code'])) {
3811  print '<option value="'.$arraydemandreason['id'].'" selected>';
3812  } else {
3813  print '<option value="'.$arraydemandreason['id'].'">';
3814  }
3815  $label = $arraydemandreason['label']; // Translation of label was already done into the ->loadCacheInputReason
3816  print $langs->trans($label);
3817  print '</option>';
3818  }
3819  print '</select>';
3820  if ($user->admin && empty($notooltip)) {
3821  print info_admin($langs->trans("YouCanChangeValuesForThisListFromDictionarySetup"), 1);
3822  }
3823  print ajax_combobox('select_'.$htmlname);
3824  }
3825 
3826  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3832  public function load_cache_types_paiements()
3833  {
3834  // phpcs:enable
3835  global $langs;
3836 
3837  $num = count($this->cache_types_paiements);
3838  if ($num > 0) {
3839  return $num; // Cache already loaded
3840  }
3841 
3842  dol_syslog(__METHOD__, LOG_DEBUG);
3843 
3844  $this->cache_types_paiements = array();
3845 
3846  $sql = "SELECT id, code, libelle as label, type, active";
3847  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_paiement";
3848  $sql .= " WHERE entity IN (".getEntity('c_paiement').")";
3849 
3850  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3851  if ($resql) {
3852  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
3853  $i = 0;
3854  while ($i < $num) {
3855  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
3856 
3857  // Si traduction existe, on l'utilise, sinon on prend le libelle par defaut
3858  $label = ($langs->transnoentitiesnoconv("PaymentTypeShort".$obj->code) != ("PaymentTypeShort".$obj->code) ? $langs->transnoentitiesnoconv("PaymentTypeShort".$obj->code) : ($obj->label != '-' ? $obj->label : ''));
3859  $this->cache_types_paiements[$obj->id]['id'] = $obj->id;
3860  $this->cache_types_paiements[$obj->id]['code'] = $obj->code;
3861  $this->cache_types_paiements[$obj->id]['label'] = $label;
3862  $this->cache_types_paiements[$obj->id]['type'] = $obj->type;
3863  $this->cache_types_paiements[$obj->id]['active'] = $obj->active;
3864  $i++;
3865  }
3866 
3867  $this->cache_types_paiements = dol_sort_array($this->cache_types_paiements, 'label', 'asc', 0, 0, 1);
3868 
3869  return $num;
3870  } else {
3871  dol_print_error($this->db);
3872  return -1;
3873  }
3874  }
3875 
3876 
3877  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3891  public function select_conditions_paiements($selected = 0, $htmlname = 'condid', $filtertype = -1, $addempty = 0, $noinfoadmin = 0, $morecss = '')
3892  {
3893  // phpcs:enable
3894  global $langs, $user, $conf;
3895 
3896  dol_syslog(__METHOD__." selected=".$selected.", htmlname=".$htmlname, LOG_DEBUG);
3897 
3898  $this->load_cache_conditions_paiements();
3899 
3900  // Set default value if not already set by caller
3901  if (empty($selected) && !empty($conf->global->MAIN_DEFAULT_PAYMENT_TERM_ID)) {
3902  $selected = $conf->global->MAIN_DEFAULT_PAYMENT_TERM_ID;
3903  }
3904 
3905  print '<select id="'.$htmlname.'" class="flat selectpaymentterms'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" name="'.$htmlname.'">';
3906  if ($addempty) {
3907  print '<option value="0">&nbsp;</option>';
3908  }
3909  foreach ($this->cache_conditions_paiements as $id => $arrayconditions) {
3910  if ($selected == $id) {
3911  print '<option value="'.$id.'" selected>';
3912  } else {
3913  print '<option value="'.$id.'">';
3914  }
3915  print $arrayconditions['label'];
3916  print '</option>';
3917  }
3918  print '</select>';
3919  if ($user->admin && empty($noinfoadmin)) {
3920  print info_admin($langs->trans("YouCanChangeValuesForThisListFromDictionarySetup"), 1);
3921  }
3922  print ajax_combobox($htmlname);
3923  }

3925 
3926  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3943  public function select_types_paiements($selected = '', $htmlname = 'paiementtype', $filtertype = '', $format = 0, $empty = 1, $noadmininfo = 0, $maxlength = 0, $active = 1, $morecss = '', $nooutput = 0)
3944  {
3945  // phpcs:enable
3946  global $langs, $user, $conf;
3947 
3948  $out = '';
3949 
3950  dol_syslog(__METHOD__." ".$selected.", ".$htmlname.", ".$filtertype.", ".$format, LOG_DEBUG);
3951 
3952  $filterarray = array();
3953  if ($filtertype == 'CRDT') {
3954  $filterarray = array(0, 2, 3);
3955  } elseif ($filtertype == 'DBIT') {
3956  $filterarray = array(1, 2, 3);
3957  } elseif ($filtertype != '' && $filtertype != '-1') {
3958  $filterarray = explode(',', $filtertype);
3959  }
3960 
3961  $this->load_cache_types_paiements();
3962 
3963  // Set default value if not already set by caller
3964  if (empty($selected) && !empty($conf->global->MAIN_DEFAULT_PAYMENT_TYPE_ID)) {
3965  $selected = $conf->global->MAIN_DEFAULT_PAYMENT_TYPE_ID;
3966  }
3967 
3968  $out .= '<select id="select'.$htmlname.'" class="flat selectpaymenttypes'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" name="'.$htmlname.'">';
3969  if ($empty) {
3970  $out .= '<option value="">&nbsp;</option>';
3971  }
3972  foreach ($this->cache_types_paiements as $id => $arraytypes) {
3973  // If not good status
3974  if ($active >= 0 && $arraytypes['active'] != $active) {
3975  continue;
3976  }
3977 
3978  // On passe si on a demande de filtrer sur des modes de paiments particuliers
3979  if (count($filterarray) && !in_array($arraytypes['type'], $filterarray)) {
3980  continue;
3981  }
3982 
3983  // We discard empty line if showempty is on because an empty line has already been output.
3984  if ($empty && empty($arraytypes['code'])) {
3985  continue;
3986  }
3987 
3988  if ($format == 0) {
3989  $out .= '<option value="'.$id.'"';
3990  } elseif ($format == 1) {
3991  $out .= '<option value="'.$arraytypes['code'].'"';
3992  } elseif ($format == 2) {
3993  $out .= '<option value="'.$arraytypes['code'].'"';
3994  } elseif ($format == 3) {
3995  $out .= '<option value="'.$id.'"';
3996  }
3997  // Print attribute selected or not
3998  if ($format == 1 || $format == 2) {
3999  if ($selected == $arraytypes['code']) {
4000  $out .= ' selected';
4001  }
4002  } else {
4003  if ($selected == $id) {
4004  $out .= ' selected';
4005  }
4006  }
4007  $out .= '>';
4008  if ($format == 0) {
4009  $value = ($maxlength ?dol_trunc($arraytypes['label'], $maxlength) : $arraytypes['label']);
4010  } elseif ($format == 1) {
4011  $value = $arraytypes['code'];
4012  } elseif ($format == 2) {
4013  $value = ($maxlength ?dol_trunc($arraytypes['label'], $maxlength) : $arraytypes['label']);
4014  } elseif ($format == 3) {
4015  $value = $arraytypes['code'];
4016  }
4017  $out .= $value ? $value : '&nbsp;';
4018  $out .= '</option>';
4019  }
4020  $out .= '</select>';
4021  if ($user->admin && !$noadmininfo) {
4022  $out .= info_admin($langs->trans("YouCanChangeValuesForThisListFromDictionarySetup"), 1);
4023  }
4024  $out .= ajax_combobox('select'.$htmlname);
4025 
4026  if (empty($nooutput)) {
4027  print $out;
4028  } else {
4029  return $out;
4030  }
4031  }
4032 
4033 
4042  public function selectPriceBaseType($selected = '', $htmlname = 'price_base_type', $addjscombo = 0)
4043  {
4044  global $langs;
4045 
4046  $return = '<select class="flat maxwidth100" id="select_'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'">';
4047  $options = array(
4048  'HT'=>$langs->trans("HT"),
4049  'TTC'=>$langs->trans("TTC")
4050  );
4051  foreach ($options as $id => $value) {
4052  if ($selected == $id) {
4053  $return .= '<option value="'.$id.'" selected>'.$value;
4054  } else {
4055  $return .= '<option value="'.$id.'">'.$value;
4056  }
4057  $return .= '</option>';
4058  }
4059  $return .= '</select>';
4060  if ($addjscombo) {
4061  $return .= ajax_combobox('select_'.$htmlname);
4062  }
4063 
4064  return $return;
4065  }
4066 
4067  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
4073  public function load_cache_transport_mode()
4074  {
4075  // phpcs:enable
4076  global $langs;
4077 
4078  $num = count($this->cache_transport_mode);
4079  if ($num > 0) {
4080  return $num; // Cache already loaded
4081  }
4082 
4083  dol_syslog(__METHOD__, LOG_DEBUG);
4084 
4085  $this->cache_transport_mode = array();
4086 
4087  $sql = "SELECT rowid, code, label, active";
4088  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_transport_mode";
4089  $sql .= " WHERE entity IN (".getEntity('c_transport_mode').")";
4090 
4091  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
4092  if ($resql) {
4093  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
4094  $i = 0;
4095  while ($i < $num) {
4096  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
4097 
4098  // If traduction exist, we use it else we take the default label
4099  $label = ($langs->transnoentitiesnoconv("PaymentTypeShort".$obj->code) != ("PaymentTypeShort".$obj->code) ? $langs->transnoentitiesnoconv("PaymentTypeShort".$obj->code) : ($obj->label != '-' ? $obj->label : ''));
4100  $this->cache_transport_mode[$obj->rowid]['rowid'] = $obj->rowid;
4101  $this->cache_transport_mode[$obj->rowid]['code'] = $obj->code;
4102  $this->cache_transport_mode[$obj->rowid]['label'] = $label;
4103  $this->cache_transport_mode[$obj->rowid]['active'] = $obj->active;
4104  $i++;
4105  }
4106 
4107  $this->cache_transport_mode = dol_sort_array($this->cache_transport_mode, 'label', 'asc', 0, 0, 1);
4108 
4109  return $num;
4110  } else {
4111  dol_print_error($this->db);
4112  return -1;
4113  }
4114  }

4129  public function selectTransportMode($selected = '', $htmlname = 'transportmode', $format = 0, $empty = 1, $noadmininfo = 0, $maxlength = 0, $active = 1, $morecss = '')
4130  {
4131  global $langs, $user;
4132 
4133  dol_syslog(__METHOD__." ".$selected.", ".$htmlname.", ".$format, LOG_DEBUG);
4134 
4135  $this->load_cache_transport_mode();
4136 
4137  print '<select id="select'.$htmlname.'" class="flat selectmodetransport'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" name="'.$htmlname.'">';
4138  if ($empty) {
4139  print '<option value="">&nbsp;</option>';
4140  }
4141  foreach ($this->cache_transport_mode as $id => $arraytypes) {
4142  // If not good status
4143  if ($active >= 0 && $arraytypes['active'] != $active) {
4144  continue;
4145  }
4146 
4147  // We discard empty line if showempty is on because an empty line has already been output.
4148  if ($empty && empty($arraytypes['code'])) {
4149  continue;
4150  }
4151 
4152  if ($format == 0) {
4153  print '<option value="'.$id.'"';
4154  } elseif ($format == 1) {
4155  print '<option value="'.$arraytypes['code'].'"';
4156  } elseif ($format == 2) {
4157  print '<option value="'.$arraytypes['code'].'"';
4158  } elseif ($format == 3) {
4159  print '<option value="'.$id.'"';
4160  }
4161  // If text is selected, we compare with code, else with id
4162  if (preg_match('/[a-z]/i', $selected) && $selected == $arraytypes['code']) {
4163  print ' selected';
4164  } elseif ($selected == $id) {
4165  print ' selected';
4166  }
4167  print '>';
4168  if ($format == 0) {
4169  $value = ($maxlength ?dol_trunc($arraytypes['label'], $maxlength) : $arraytypes['label']);
4170  } elseif ($format == 1) {
4171  $value = $arraytypes['code'];
4172  } elseif ($format == 2) {
4173  $value = ($maxlength ?dol_trunc($arraytypes['label'], $maxlength) : $arraytypes['label']);
4174  } elseif ($format == 3) {
4175  $value = $arraytypes['code'];
4176  }
4177  print $value ? $value : '&nbsp;';
4178  print '</option>';
4179  }
4180  print '</select>';
4181  if ($user->admin && !$noadmininfo) {
4182  print info_admin($langs->trans("YouCanChangeValuesForThisListFromDictionarySetup"), 1);
4183  }
4184  }
4185 
4198  public function selectShippingMethod($selected = '', $htmlname = 'shipping_method_id', $filtre = '', $useempty = 0, $moreattrib = '', $noinfoadmin = 0, $morecss = '')
4199  {
4200  global $langs, $conf, $user;
4201 
4202  $langs->load("admin");
4203  $langs->load("deliveries");
4204 
4205  $sql = "SELECT rowid, code, libelle as label";
4206  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_shipment_mode";
4207  $sql .= " WHERE active > 0";
4208  if ($filtre) {
4209  $sql .= " AND ".$filtre;
4210  }
4211  $sql .= " ORDER BY libelle ASC";
4212 
4213  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::selectShippingMode", LOG_DEBUG);
4214  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
4215  if ($result) {
4216  $num = $this->db->num_rows($result);
4217  $i = 0;
4218  if ($num) {
4219  print '<select id="select'.$htmlname.'" class="flat selectshippingmethod'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" name="'.$htmlname.'"'.($moreattrib ? ' '.$moreattrib : '').'>';
4220  if ($useempty == 1 || ($useempty == 2 && $num > 1)) {
4221  print '<option value="-1">&nbsp;</option>';
4222  }
4223  while ($i < $num) {
4224  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($result);
4225  if ($selected == $obj->rowid) {
4226  print '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'" selected>';
4227  } else {
4228  print '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'">';
4229  }
4230  print ($langs->trans("SendingMethod".strtoupper($obj->code)) != "SendingMethod".strtoupper($obj->code)) ? $langs->trans("SendingMethod".strtoupper($obj->code)) : $obj->label;
4231  print '</option>';
4232  $i++;
4233  }
4234  print "</select>";
4235  if ($user->admin && empty($noinfoadmin)) {
4236  print info_admin($langs->trans("YouCanChangeValuesForThisListFromDictionarySetup"), 1);
4237  }
4238 
4239  print ajax_combobox('select'.$htmlname);
4240  } else {
4241  print $langs->trans("NoShippingMethodDefined");
4242  }
4243  } else {
4244  dol_print_error($this->db);
4245  }
4246  }
4247 
4257  public function formSelectShippingMethod($page, $selected = '', $htmlname = 'shipping_method_id', $addempty = 0)
4258  {
4259  global $langs, $db;
4260 
4261  $langs->load("deliveries");
4262 
4263  if ($htmlname != "none") {
4264  print '<form method="POST" action="'.$page.'">';
4265  print '<input type="hidden" name="action" value="setshippingmethod">';
4266  print '<input type="hidden" name="token" value="'.newToken().'">';
4267  $this->selectShippingMethod($selected, $htmlname, '', $addempty);
4268  print '<input type="submit" class="button valignmiddle" value="'.$langs->trans("Modify").'">';
4269  print '</form>';
4270  } else {
4271  if ($selected) {
4272  $code = $langs->getLabelFromKey($db, $selected, 'c_shipment_mode', 'rowid', 'code');
4273  print $langs->trans("SendingMethod".strtoupper($code));
4274  } else {
4275  print "&nbsp;";
4276  }
4277  }
4278  }
4279 
4288  public function selectSituationInvoices($selected = '', $socid = 0)
4289  {
4290  global $langs;
4291 
4292  $langs->load('bills');
4293 
4294  $opt = '<option value ="" selected></option>';
4295  $sql = 'SELECT rowid, ref, situation_cycle_ref, situation_counter, situation_final, fk_soc';
4296  $sql .= ' FROM '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'facture';
4297  $sql .= ' WHERE entity IN ('.getEntity('invoice').')';
4298  $sql .= ' AND situation_counter >= 1';
4299  $sql .= ' AND fk_soc = '.(int) $socid;
4300  $sql .= ' AND type <> 2';
4301  $sql .= ' ORDER by situation_cycle_ref, situation_counter desc';
4302  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
4303 
4304  if ($resql && $this->db->num_rows($resql) > 0) {
4305  // Last seen cycle
4306  $ref = 0;
4307  while ($obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql)) {
4308  //Same cycle ?
4309  if ($obj->situation_cycle_ref != $ref) {
4310  // Just seen this cycle
4311  $ref = $obj->situation_cycle_ref;
4312  //not final ?
4313  if ($obj->situation_final != 1) {
4314  //Not prov?
4315  if (substr($obj->ref, 1, 4) != 'PROV') {
4316  if ($selected == $obj->rowid) {
4317  $opt .= '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'" selected>'.$obj->ref.'</option>';
4318  } else {
4319  $opt .= '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'">'.$obj->ref.'</option>';
4320  }
4321  }
4322  }
4323  }
4324  }
4325  } else {
4326  dol_syslog("Error sql=".$sql.", error=".$this->error, LOG_ERR);
4327  }
4328  if ($opt == '<option value ="" selected></option>') {
4329  $opt = '<option value ="0" selected>'.$langs->trans('NoSituations').'</option>';
4330  }
4331  return $opt;
4332  }
4333 
4343  public function selectUnits($selected = '', $htmlname = 'units', $showempty = 0, $unit_type = '')
4344  {
4345  global $langs;
4346 
4347  $langs->load('products');
4348 
4349  $return = '<select class="flat" id="'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'">';
4350 
4351  $sql = 'SELECT rowid, label, code from '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'c_units';
4352  $sql .= ' WHERE active > 0';
4353  if (!empty($unit_type)) {
4354  $sql .= " AND unit_type = '".$this->db->escape($unit_type)."'";
4355  }
4356 
4357  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
4358  if ($resql && $this->db->num_rows($resql) > 0) {
4359  if ($showempty) {
4360  $return .= '<option value="none"></option>';
4361  }
4362 
4363  while ($res = $this->db->fetch_object($resql)) {
4364  $unitLabel = $res->label;
4365  if (!empty($langs->tab_translate['unit'.$res->code])) { // check if Translation is available before
4366  $unitLabel = $langs->trans('unit'.$res->code) != $res->label ? $langs->trans('unit'.$res->code) : $res->label;
4367  }
4368 
4369  if ($selected == $res->rowid) {
4370  $return .= '<option value="'.$res->rowid.'" selected>'.$unitLabel.'</option>';
4371  } else {
4372  $return .= '<option value="'.$res->rowid.'">'.$unitLabel.'</option>';
4373  }
4374  }
4375  $return .= '</select>';
4376  }
4377  return $return;
4378  }
