4380  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
4395  public function select_comptes($selected = '', $htmlname = 'accountid', $status = 0, $filtre = '', $useempty = 0, $moreattrib = '', $showcurrency = 0, $morecss = '', $nooutput = 0)
4396  {
4397  // phpcs:enable
4398  global $langs, $conf;
4399 
4400  $out = '';
4401 
4402  $langs->load("admin");
4403  $num = 0;
4404 
4405  $sql = "SELECT rowid, label, bank, clos as status, currency_code";
4406  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."bank_account";
4407  $sql .= " WHERE entity IN (".getEntity('bank_account').")";
4408  if ($status != 2) {
4409  $sql .= " AND clos = ".(int) $status;
4410  }
4411  if ($filtre) {
4412  $sql .= " AND ".$filtre;
4413  }
4414  $sql .= " ORDER BY label";
4415 
4416  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::select_comptes", LOG_DEBUG);
4417  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
4418  if ($result) {
4419  $num = $this->db->num_rows($result);
4420  $i = 0;
4421  if ($num) {
4422  $out .= '<select id="select'.$htmlname.'" class="flat selectbankaccount'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" name="'.$htmlname.'"'.($moreattrib ? ' '.$moreattrib : '').'>';
4423  if ($useempty == 1 || ($useempty == 2 && $num > 1)) {
4424  $out .= '<option value="-1">&nbsp;</option>';
4425  }
4426 
4427  while ($i < $num) {
4428  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($result);
4429  if ($selected == $obj->rowid || ($useempty == 2 && $num == 1 && empty($selected))) {
4430  $out .= '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'" data-currency-code="'.$obj->currency_code.'" selected>';
4431  } else {
4432  $out .= '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'" data-currency-code="'.$obj->currency_code.'">';
4433  }
4434  $out .= trim($obj->label);
4435  if ($showcurrency) {
4436  $out .= ' ('.$obj->currency_code.')';
4437  }
4438  if ($status == 2 && $obj->status == 1) {
4439  $out .= ' ('.$langs->trans("Closed").')';
4440  }
4441  $out .= '</option>';
4442  $i++;
4443  }
4444  $out .= "</select>";
4445  $out .= ajax_combobox('select'.$htmlname);
4446  } else {
4447  if ($status == 0) {
4448  $out .= '<span class="opacitymedium">'.$langs->trans("NoActiveBankAccountDefined").'</span>';
4449  } else {
4450  $out .= '<span class="opacitymedium">'.$langs->trans("NoBankAccountFound").'</span>';
4451  }
4452  }
4453  } else {
4454  dol_print_error($this->db);
4455  }
4456 
4457  // Output or return
4458  if (empty($nooutput)) {
4459  print $out;
4460  } else {
4461  return $out;
4462  }
4463 
4464  return $num;
4465  }
4466 
4478  public function selectEstablishments($selected = '', $htmlname = 'entity', $status = 0, $filtre = '', $useempty = 0, $moreattrib = '')
4479  {
4480  global $langs, $conf;
4481 
4482  $langs->load("admin");
4483  $num = 0;
4484 
4485  $sql = "SELECT rowid, name, fk_country, status, entity";
4486  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."establishment";
4487  $sql .= " WHERE 1=1";
4488  if ($status != 2) {
4489  $sql .= " AND status = ".(int) $status;
4490  }
4491  if ($filtre) {
4492  $sql .= " AND ".$filtre;
4493  }
4494  $sql .= " ORDER BY name";
4495 
4496  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::select_establishment", LOG_DEBUG);
4497  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
4498  if ($result) {
4499  $num = $this->db->num_rows($result);
4500  $i = 0;
4501  if ($num) {
4502  print '<select id="select'.$htmlname.'" class="flat selectestablishment" name="'.$htmlname.'"'.($moreattrib ? ' '.$moreattrib : '').'>';
4503  if ($useempty == 1 || ($useempty == 2 && $num > 1)) {
4504  print '<option value="-1">&nbsp;</option>';
4505  }
4506 
4507  while ($i < $num) {
4508  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($result);
4509  if ($selected == $obj->rowid) {
4510  print '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'" selected>';
4511  } else {
4512  print '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'">';
4513  }
4514  print trim($obj->name);
4515  if ($status == 2 && $obj->status == 1) {
4516  print ' ('.$langs->trans("Closed").')';
4517  }
4518  print '</option>';
4519  $i++;
4520  }
4521  print "</select>";
4522  } else {
4523  if ($status == 0) {
4524  print '<span class="opacitymedium">'.$langs->trans("NoActiveEstablishmentDefined").'</span>';
4525  } else {
4526  print '<span class="opacitymedium">'.$langs->trans("NoEstablishmentFound").'</span>';
4527  }
4528  }
4529  } else {
4530  dol_print_error($this->db);
4531  }
4532  }
4533 
4543  public function formSelectAccount($page, $selected = '', $htmlname = 'fk_account', $addempty = 0)
4544  {
4545  global $langs;
4546  if ($htmlname != "none") {
4547  print '<form method="POST" action="'.$page.'">';
4548  print '<input type="hidden" name="action" value="setbankaccount">';
4549  print '<input type="hidden" name="token" value="'.newToken().'">';
4550  print img_picto('', 'bank_account', 'class="pictofixedwidth"');
4551  $nbaccountfound = $this->select_comptes($selected, $htmlname, 0, '', $addempty);
4552  if ($nbaccountfound > 0) {
4553  print '<input type="submit" class="button valignmiddle" value="'.$langs->trans("Modify").'">';
4554  }
4555  print '</form>';
4556  } else {
4557  $langs->load('banks');
4558 
4559  if ($selected) {
4560  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/compta/bank/class/account.class.php';
4561  $bankstatic = new Account($this->db);
4562  $result = $bankstatic->fetch($selected);
4563  if ($result) {
4564  print $bankstatic->getNomUrl(1);
4565  }
4566  } else {
4567  print "&nbsp;";
4568  }
4569  }
4570  }
4571 
4572  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
4591  public function select_all_categories($type, $selected = '', $htmlname = "parent", $maxlength = 64, $markafterid = 0, $outputmode = 0, $include = 0, $morecss = '')
4592  {
4593  // phpcs:enable
4594  global $conf, $langs;
4595  $langs->load("categories");
4596 
4597  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/categories/class/categorie.class.php';
4598 
4599  // For backward compatibility
4600  if (is_numeric($type)) {
4601  dol_syslog(__METHOD__.': using numeric value for parameter type is deprecated. Use string code instead.', LOG_WARNING);
4602  }
4603 
4604  if ($type === Categorie::TYPE_BANK_LINE) {
4605  // TODO Move this into common category feature
4606  $cate_arbo = array();
4607  $sql = "SELECT c.label, c.rowid";
4608  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."bank_categ as c";
4609  $sql .= " WHERE entity = ".$conf->entity;
4610  $sql .= " ORDER BY c.label";
4611  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
4612  if ($result) {
4613  $num = $this->db->num_rows($result);
4614  $i = 0;
4615  while ($i < $num) {
4616  $objp = $this->db->fetch_object($result);
4617  if ($objp) {
4618  $cate_arbo[$objp->rowid] = array('id'=>$objp->rowid, 'fulllabel'=>$objp->label);
4619  }
4620  $i++;
4621  }
4622  $this->db->free($result);
4623  } else {
4624  dol_print_error($this->db);
4625  }
4626  } else {
4627  $cat = new Categorie($this->db);
4628  $cate_arbo = $cat->get_full_arbo($type, $markafterid, $include);
4629  }
4630 
4631  $output = '<select class="flat'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" name="'.$htmlname.'" id="'.$htmlname.'">';
4632  $outarray = array();
4633  if (is_array($cate_arbo)) {
4634  if (!count($cate_arbo)) {
4635  $output .= '<option value="-1" disabled>'.$langs->trans("NoCategoriesDefined").'</option>';
4636  } else {
4637  $output .= '<option value="-1">&nbsp;</option>';
4638  foreach ($cate_arbo as $key => $value) {
4639  if ($cate_arbo[$key]['id'] == $selected || ($selected === 'auto' && count($cate_arbo) == 1)) {
4640  $add = 'selected ';
4641  } else {
4642  $add = '';
4643  }
4644  $output .= '<option '.$add.'value="'.$cate_arbo[$key]['id'].'">'.dol_trunc($cate_arbo[$key]['fulllabel'], $maxlength, 'middle').'</option>';
4645 
4646  $outarray[$cate_arbo[$key]['id']] = $cate_arbo[$key]['fulllabel'];
4647  }
4648  }
4649  }
4650  $output .= '</select>';
4651  $output .= "\n";
4652 
4653  if ($outputmode) {
4654  return $outarray;
4655  }
4656  return $output;
4657  }
4658 
4659  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
4676  public function form_confirm($page, $title, $question, $action, $formquestion = '', $selectedchoice = "", $useajax = 0, $height = 170, $width = 500)
4677  {
4678  // phpcs:enable
4679  dol_syslog(__METHOD__.': using form_confirm is deprecated. Use formconfim instead.', LOG_WARNING);
4680  print $this->formconfirm($page, $title, $question, $action, $formquestion, $selectedchoice, $useajax, $height, $width);
4681  }
4682 
4707  public function formconfirm($page, $title, $question, $action, $formquestion = '', $selectedchoice = '', $useajax = 0, $height = 0, $width = 500, $disableformtag = 0)
4708  {
4709  global $langs, $conf;
4710 
4711  $more = '<!-- formconfirm before calling page='.dol_escape_htmltag($page).' -->';
4712  $formconfirm = '';
4713  $inputok = array();
4714  $inputko = array();
4715 
4716  // Clean parameters
4717  $newselectedchoice = empty($selectedchoice) ? "no" : $selectedchoice;
4718  if ($conf->browser->layout == 'phone') {
4719  $width = '95%';
4720  }
4721 
4722  // Set height automatically if not defined
4723  if (empty($height)) {
4724  $height = 220;
4725  if (is_array($formquestion) && count($formquestion) > 2) {
4726  $height += ((count($formquestion) - 2) * 24);
4727  }
4728  }
4729 
4730  if (is_array($formquestion) && !empty($formquestion)) {
4731  // First add hidden fields and value
4732  foreach ($formquestion as $key => $input) {
4733  if (is_array($input) && !empty($input)) {
4734  if ($input['type'] == 'hidden') {
4735  $more .= '<input type="hidden" id="'.dol_escape_htmltag($input['name']).'" name="'.dol_escape_htmltag($input['name']).'" value="'.dol_escape_htmltag($input['value']).'">'."\n";
4736  }
4737  }
4738  }
4739 
4740  // Now add questions
4741  $moreonecolumn = '';
4742  $more .= '<div class="tagtable paddingtopbottomonly centpercent noborderspacing">'."\n";
4743  foreach ($formquestion as $key => $input) {
4744  if (is_array($input) && !empty($input)) {
4745  $size = (!empty($input['size']) ? ' size="'.$input['size'].'"' : ''); // deprecated. Use morecss instead.
4746  $moreattr = (!empty($input['moreattr']) ? ' '.$input['moreattr'] : '');
4747  $morecss = (!empty($input['morecss']) ? ' '.$input['morecss'] : '');
4748 
4749  if ($input['type'] == 'text') {
4750  $more .= '<div class="tagtr"><div class="tagtd'.(empty($input['tdclass']) ? '' : (' '.$input['tdclass'])).'">'.$input['label'].'</div><div class="tagtd"><input type="text" class="flat'.$morecss.'" id="'.dol_escape_htmltag($input['name']).'" name="'.dol_escape_htmltag($input['name']).'"'.$size.' value="'.$input['value'].'"'.$moreattr.' /></div></div>'."\n";
4751  } elseif ($input['type'] == 'password') {
4752  $more .= '<div class="tagtr"><div class="tagtd'.(empty($input['tdclass']) ? '' : (' '.$input['tdclass'])).'">'.$input['label'].'</div><div class="tagtd"><input type="password" class="flat'.$morecss.'" id="'.dol_escape_htmltag($input['name']).'" name="'.dol_escape_htmltag($input['name']).'"'.$size.' value="'.$input['value'].'"'.$moreattr.' /></div></div>'."\n";
4753  } elseif ($input['type'] == 'textarea') {
4754  /*$more .= '<div class="tagtr"><div class="tagtd'.(empty($input['tdclass']) ? '' : (' '.$input['tdclass'])).'">'.$input['label'].'</div><div class="tagtd">';
4755  $more .= '<textarea name="'.$input['name'].'" class="'.$morecss.'"'.$moreattr.'>';
4756  $more .= $input['value'];
4757  $more .= '</textarea>';
4758  $more .= '</div></div>'."\n";*/
4759  $moreonecolumn .= '<div class="margintoponly">';
4760  $moreonecolumn .= $input['label'].'<br>';
4761  $moreonecolumn .= '<textarea name="'.dol_escape_htmltag($input['name']).'" id="'.dol_escape_htmltag($input['name']).'" class="'.$morecss.'"'.$moreattr.'>';
4762  $moreonecolumn .= $input['value'];
4763  $moreonecolumn .= '</textarea>';
4764  $moreonecolumn .= '</div>';
4765  } elseif ($input['type'] == 'select') {
4766  if (empty($morecss)) {
4767  $morecss = 'minwidth100';
4768  }
4769 
4770  $show_empty = isset($input['select_show_empty']) ? $input['select_show_empty'] : 1;
4771  $key_in_label = isset($input['select_key_in_label']) ? $input['select_key_in_label'] : 0;
4772  $value_as_key = isset($input['select_value_as_key']) ? $input['select_value_as_key'] : 0;
4773  $translate = isset($input['select_translate']) ? $input['select_translate'] : 0;
4774  $maxlen = isset($input['select_maxlen']) ? $input['select_maxlen'] : 0;
4775  $disabled = isset($input['select_disabled']) ? $input['select_disabled'] : 0;
4776  $sort = isset($input['select_sort']) ? $input['select_sort'] : '';
4777 
4778  $more .= '<div class="tagtr"><div class="tagtd'.(empty($input['tdclass']) ? '' : (' '.$input['tdclass'])).'">';
4779  if (!empty($input['label'])) {
4780  $more .= $input['label'].'</div><div class="tagtd left">';
4781  }
4782  $more .= $this->selectarray($input['name'], $input['values'], $input['default'], $show_empty, $key_in_label, $value_as_key, $moreattr, $translate, $maxlen, $disabled, $sort, $morecss);
4783  $more .= '</div></div>'."\n";
4784  } elseif ($input['type'] == 'checkbox') {
4785  $more .= '<div class="tagtr">';
4786  $more .= '<div class="tagtd'.(empty($input['tdclass']) ? '' : (' '.$input['tdclass'])).'">'.$input['label'].' </div><div class="tagtd">';
4787  $more .= '<input type="checkbox" class="flat'.$morecss.'" id="'.dol_escape_htmltag($input['name']).'" name="'.dol_escape_htmltag($input['name']).'"'.$moreattr;
4788  if (!is_bool($input['value']) && $input['value'] != 'false' && $input['value'] != '0') {
4789  $more .= ' checked';
4790  }
4791  if (is_bool($input['value']) && $input['value']) {
4792  $more .= ' checked';
4793  }
4794  if (isset($input['disabled'])) {
4795  $more .= ' disabled';
4796  }
4797  $more .= ' /></div>';
4798  $more .= '</div>'."\n";
4799  } elseif ($input['type'] == 'radio') {
4800  $i = 0;
4801  foreach ($input['values'] as $selkey => $selval) {
4802  $more .= '<div class="tagtr">';
4803  if ($i == 0) {
4804  $more .= '<div class="tagtd'.(empty($input['tdclass']) ? ' tdtop' : (' tdtop '.$input['tdclass'])).'">'.$input['label'].'</div>';
4805  } else {
4806  $more .= '<div clas="tagtd'.(empty($input['tdclass']) ? '' : (' "'.$input['tdclass'])).'">&nbsp;</div>';
4807  }
4808  $more .= '<div class="tagtd'.($i == 0 ? ' tdtop' : '').'"><input type="radio" class="flat'.$morecss.'" id="'.dol_escape_htmltag($input['name'].$selkey).'" name="'.dol_escape_htmltag($input['name']).'" value="'.$selkey.'"'.$moreattr;
4809  if ($input['disabled']) {
4810  $more .= ' disabled';
4811  }
4812  if (isset($input['default']) && $input['default'] === $selkey) {
4813  $more .= ' checked="checked"';
4814  }
4815  $more .= ' /> ';
4816  $more .= '<label for="'.dol_escape_htmltag($input['name'].$selkey).'">'.$selval.'</label>';
4817  $more .= '</div></div>'."\n";
4818  $i++;
4819  }
4820  } elseif ($input['type'] == 'date') {
4821  $more .= '<div class="tagtr"><div class="tagtd'.(empty($input['tdclass']) ? '' : (' '.$input['tdclass'])).'">'.$input['label'].'</div>';
4822  $more .= '<div class="tagtd">';
4823  $addnowlink = (empty($input['datenow']) ? 0 : 1);
4824  $more .= $this->selectDate($input['value'], $input['name'], 0, 0, 0, '', 1, $addnowlink);
4825  $more .= '</div></div>'."\n";
4826  $formquestion[] = array('name'=>$input['name'].'day');
4827  $formquestion[] = array('name'=>$input['name'].'month');
4828  $formquestion[] = array('name'=>$input['name'].'year');
4829  $formquestion[] = array('name'=>$input['name'].'hour');
4830  $formquestion[] = array('name'=>$input['name'].'min');
4831  } elseif ($input['type'] == 'other') {
4832  $more .= '<div class="tagtr"><div class="tagtd'.(empty($input['tdclass']) ? '' : (' '.$input['tdclass'])).'">';
4833  if (!empty($input['label'])) {
4834  $more .= $input['label'].'</div><div class="tagtd">';
4835  }
4836  $more .= $input['value'];
4837  $more .= '</div></div>'."\n";
4838  } elseif ($input['type'] == 'onecolumn') {
4839  $moreonecolumn .= '<div class="margintoponly">';
4840  $moreonecolumn .= $input['value'];
4841  $moreonecolumn .= '</div>'."\n";
4842  } elseif ($input['type'] == 'hidden') {
4843  // Do nothing more, already added by a previous loop
4844  } else {
4845  $more .= 'Error type '.$input['type'].' for the confirm box is not a supported type';
4846  }
4847  }
4848  }
4849  $more .= '</div>'."\n";
4850  $more .= $moreonecolumn;
4851  }
4852 
4853  // JQUI method dialog is broken with jmobile, we use standard HTML.
4854  // Note: When using dol_use_jmobile or no js, you must also check code for button use a GET url with action=xxx and check that you also output the confirm code when action=xxx
4855  // See page product/card.php for example
4856  if (!empty($conf->dol_use_jmobile)) {
4857  $useajax = 0;
4858  }
4859  if (empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax)) {
4860  $useajax = 0;
4861  }
4862 
4863  if ($useajax) {
4864  $autoOpen = true;
4865  $dialogconfirm = 'dialog-confirm';
4866  $button = '';
4867  if (!is_numeric($useajax)) {
4868  $button = $useajax;
4869  $useajax = 1;
4870  $autoOpen = false;
4871  $dialogconfirm .= '-'.$button;
4872  }
4873  $pageyes = $page.(preg_match('/\?/', $page) ? '&' : '?').'action='.$action.'&confirm=yes';
4874  $pageno = ($useajax == 2 ? $page.(preg_match('/\?/', $page) ? '&' : '?').'confirm=no' : '');
4875 
4876  // Add input fields into list of fields to read during submit (inputok and inputko)
4877  if (is_array($formquestion)) {
4878  foreach ($formquestion as $key => $input) {
4879  //print "xx ".$key." rr ".is_array($input)."<br>\n";
4880  // Add name of fields to propagate with the GET when submitting the form with button OK.
4881  if (is_array($input) && isset($input['name'])) {
4882  if (strpos($input['name'], ',') > 0) {
4883  $inputok = array_merge($inputok, explode(',', $input['name']));
4884  } else {
4885  array_push($inputok, $input['name']);
4886  }
4887  }
4888  // Add name of fields to propagate with the GET when submitting the form with button KO.
4889  if (isset($input['inputko']) && $input['inputko'] == 1) {
4890  array_push($inputko, $input['name']);
4891  }
4892  }
4893  }
4894 
4895  // Show JQuery confirm box.
4896  $formconfirm .= '<div id="'.$dialogconfirm.'" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($title).'" style="display: none;">';
4897  if (is_array($formquestion) && !empty($formquestion['text'])) {
4898  $formconfirm .= '<div class="confirmtext">'.$formquestion['text'].'</div>'."\n";
4899  }
4900  if (!empty($more)) {
4901  $formconfirm .= '<div class="confirmquestions">'.$more.'</div>'."\n";
4902  }
4903  $formconfirm .= ($question ? '<div class="confirmmessage">'.img_help('', '').' '.$question.'</div>' : '');
4904  $formconfirm .= '</div>'."\n";
4905 
4906  $formconfirm .= "\n<!-- begin ajax formconfirm page=".$page." -->\n";
4907  $formconfirm .= '<script type="text/javascript">'."\n";
4908  $formconfirm .= 'jQuery(document).ready(function() {
4909  $(function() {
4910  $( "#'.$dialogconfirm.'" ).dialog(
4911  {
4912  autoOpen: '.($autoOpen ? "true" : "false").',';
4913  if ($newselectedchoice == 'no') {
4914  $formconfirm .= '
4915  open: function() {
4916  $(this).parent().find("button.ui-button:eq(2)").focus();
4917  },';
4918  }
4919  $formconfirm .= '
4920  resizable: false,
4921  height: "'.$height.'",
4922  width: "'.$width.'",
4923  modal: true,
4924  closeOnEscape: false,
4925  buttons: {
4926  "'.dol_escape_js($langs->transnoentities("Yes")).'": function() {
4927  var options = "&token='.urlencode(newToken()).'";
4928  var inputok = '.json_encode($inputok).'; /* List of fields into form */
4929  var pageyes = "'.dol_escape_js(!empty($pageyes) ? $pageyes : '').'";
4930  if (inputok.length>0) {
4931  $.each(inputok, function(i, inputname) {
4932  var more = "";
4933  var inputvalue;
4934  if ($("input[name=\'" + inputname + "\']").attr("type") == "radio") {
4935  inputvalue = $("input[name=\'" + inputname + "\']:checked").val();
4936  } else {
4937  if ($("#" + inputname).attr("type") == "checkbox") { more = ":checked"; }
4938  inputvalue = $("#" + inputname + more).val();
4939  }
4940  if (typeof inputvalue == "undefined") { inputvalue=""; }
4941  console.log("formconfirm check inputname="+inputname+" inputvalue="+inputvalue);
4942  options += "&" + inputname + "=" + encodeURIComponent(inputvalue);
4943  });
4944  }
4945  var urljump = pageyes + (pageyes.indexOf("?") < 0 ? "?" : "") + options;
4946  if (pageyes.length > 0) { location.href = urljump; }
4947  $(this).dialog("close");
4948  },
4949  "'.dol_escape_js($langs->transnoentities("No")).'": function() {
4950  var options = "&token='.urlencode(newToken()).'";
4951  var inputko = '.json_encode($inputko).'; /* List of fields into form */
4952  var pageno="'.dol_escape_js(!empty($pageno) ? $pageno : '').'";
4953  if (inputko.length>0) {
4954  $.each(inputko, function(i, inputname) {
4955  var more = "";
4956  if ($("#" + inputname).attr("type") == "checkbox") { more = ":checked"; }
4957  var inputvalue = $("#" + inputname + more).val();
4958  if (typeof inputvalue == "undefined") { inputvalue=""; }
4959  options += "&" + inputname + "=" + encodeURIComponent(inputvalue);
4960  });
4961  }
4962  var urljump=pageno + (pageno.indexOf("?") < 0 ? "?" : "") + options;
4963  //alert(urljump);
4964  if (pageno.length > 0) { location.href = urljump; }
4965  $(this).dialog("close");
4966  }
4967  }
4968  }
4969  );
4970 
4971  var button = "'.$button.'";
4972  if (button.length > 0) {
4973  $( "#" + button ).click(function() {
4974  $("#'.$dialogconfirm.'").dialog("open");
4975  });
4976  }
4977  });
4978  });
4979  </script>';
4980  $formconfirm .= "<!-- end ajax formconfirm -->\n";
4981  } else {
4982  $formconfirm .= "\n<!-- begin formconfirm page=".dol_escape_htmltag($page)." -->\n";
4983 
4984  if (empty($disableformtag)) {
4985  $formconfirm .= '<form method="POST" action="'.$page.'" class="notoptoleftroright">'."\n";
4986  }
4987 
4988  $formconfirm .= '<input type="hidden" name="action" value="'.$action.'">'."\n";
4989  $formconfirm .= '<input type="hidden" name="token" value="'.newToken().'">'."\n";
4990 
4991  $formconfirm .= '<table class="valid centpercent">'."\n";
4992 
4993  // Line title
4994  $formconfirm .= '<tr class="validtitre"><td class="validtitre" colspan="2">';
4995  $formconfirm .= img_picto('', 'recent').' '.$title;
4996  $formconfirm .= '</td></tr>'."\n";
4997 
4998  // Line text
4999  if (is_array($formquestion) && !empty($formquestion['text'])) {
5000  $formconfirm .= '<tr class="valid"><td class="valid" colspan="2">'.$formquestion['text'].'</td></tr>'."\n";
5001  }
5002 
5003  // Line form fields
5004  if ($more) {
5005  $formconfirm .= '<tr class="valid"><td class="valid" colspan="2">'."\n";
5006  $formconfirm .= $more;
5007  $formconfirm .= '</td></tr>'."\n";
5008  }
5009 
5010  // Line with question
5011  $formconfirm .= '<tr class="valid">';
5012  $formconfirm .= '<td class="valid">'.$question.'</td>';
5013  $formconfirm .= '<td class="valid center">';
5014  $formconfirm .= $this->selectyesno("confirm", $newselectedchoice, 0, false, 0, 0, 'marginleftonly marginrightonly');
5015  $formconfirm .= '<input class="button valignmiddle confirmvalidatebutton" type="submit" value="'.$langs->trans("Validate").'">';
5016  $formconfirm .= '</td>';
5017  $formconfirm .= '</tr>'."\n";
5018 
5019  $formconfirm .= '</table>'."\n";
5020 
5021  if (empty($disableformtag)) {
5022  $formconfirm .= "</form>\n";
5023  }
5024  $formconfirm .= '<br>';
5025 
5026  if (empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax)) {
5027  $formconfirm .= '<!-- code to disable button to avoid double clic -->';
5028  $formconfirm .= '<script type="text/javascript">'."\n";
5029  $formconfirm .= '
5030  $(document).ready(function () {
5031  $(".confirmvalidatebutton").on("click", function() {
5032  console.log("We click on button");
5033  $(this).attr("disabled", "disabled");
5034  setTimeout(\'$(".confirmvalidatebutton").removeAttr("disabled")\', 3000);
5035  //console.log($(this).closest("form"));
5036  $(this).closest("form").submit();
5037  });
5038  });
5039  ';
5040  $formconfirm .= '</script>'."\n";
5041  }
5042 
5043  $formconfirm .= "<!-- end formconfirm -->\n";
5044  }
5045 
5046  return $formconfirm;
5047  }
5048 
5049 
5050  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
5064  public function form_project($page, $socid, $selected = '', $htmlname = 'projectid', $discard_closed = 0, $maxlength = 20, $forcefocus = 0, $nooutput = 0)
5065  {
5066  // phpcs:enable
5067  global $langs;
5068 
5069  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/project.lib.php';
5070  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/html.formprojet.class.php';
5071 
5072  $out = '';
5073 
5074  $formproject = new FormProjets($this->db);
5075 
5076  $langs->load("project");
5077  if ($htmlname != "none") {
5078  $out .= "\n";
5079  $out .= '<form method="post" action="'.$page.'">';
5080  $out .= '<input type="hidden" name="action" value="classin">';
5081  $out .= '<input type="hidden" name="token" value="'.newToken().'">';
5082  $out .= $formproject->select_projects($socid, $selected, $htmlname, $maxlength, 0, 1, $discard_closed, $forcefocus, 0, 0, '', 1);
5083  $out .= '<input type="submit" class="button smallpaddingimp" value="'.$langs->trans("Modify").'">';
5084  $out .= '</form>';
5085  } else {
5086  if ($selected) {
5087  $projet = new Project($this->db);
5088  $projet->fetch($selected);
5089  //print '<a href="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/projet/card.php?id='.$selected.'">'.$projet->title.'</a>';
5090  $out .= $projet->getNomUrl(0, '', 1);
5091  } else {
5092  $out .= "&nbsp;";
5093  }
5094  }
5095 
5096  if (empty($nooutput)) {
5097  print $out;
5098  return '';
5099  }
5100  return $out;
5101  }

5123  print '<input type="hidden" name="type" value="'.dol_escape_htmltag($type).'">';
5124  }
5125  $this->select_conditions_paiements($selected, $htmlname, -1, $addempty, 0, '');
5126  print '<input type="submit" class="button valignmiddle smallpaddingimp" value="'.$langs->trans("Modify").'">';
5127  print '</form>';
5128  } else {

5132  print $this->cache_conditions_paiements[$selected]['label'];
5133  } else {
5134  $langs->load('errors');
5135  print $langs->trans('ErrorNotInDictionaryPaymentConditions');
5136  }
5137  } else {
5138  print "&nbsp;";
5139  }
5140  }
5141  }

5224  public function form_date($page, $selected, $htmlname, $displayhour = 0, $displaymin = 0, $nooutput = 0, $type = '')
5225  {
5226  // phpcs:enable
5227  global $langs;
5228 
5229  $ret = '';
5230 
5231  if ($htmlname != "none") {
5232  $ret .= '<form method="POST" action="'.$page.'" name="form'.$htmlname.'">';
5233  $ret .= '<input type="hidden" name="action" value="set'.$htmlname.'">';
5234  $ret .= '<input type="hidden" name="token" value="'.newToken().'">';
5235  if ($type) {
5236  $ret .= '<input type="hidden" name="type" value="'.dol_escape_htmltag($type).'">';
5237  }
5238  $ret .= '<table class="nobordernopadding">';
5239  $ret .= '<tr><td>';
5240  $ret .= $this->selectDate($selected, $htmlname, $displayhour, $displaymin, 1, 'form'.$htmlname, 1, 0);
5241  $ret .= '</td>';
5242  $ret .= '<td class="left"><input type="submit" class="button smallpaddingimp" value="'.$langs->trans("Modify").'"></td>';
5243  $ret .= '</tr></table></form>';
5244  } else {
5245  if ($displayhour) {
5246  $ret .= dol_print_date($selected, 'dayhour');
5247  } else {
5248  $ret .= dol_print_date($selected, 'day');
5249  }
5250  }
5251 
5252  if (empty($nooutput)) {
5253  print $ret;
5254  }
5255  return $ret;
5256  }

5388  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
5398  public function form_multicurrency_rate($page, $rate = '', $htmlname = 'multicurrency_tx', $currency = '')
5399  {
5400  // phpcs:enable
5401  global $langs, $mysoc, $conf;
5402 
5403  if ($htmlname != "none") {
5404  print '<form method="POST" action="'.$page.'">';
5405  print '<input type="hidden" name="action" value="setmulticurrencyrate">';
5406  print '<input type="hidden" name="token" value="'.newToken().'">';
5407  print '<input type="text" class="maxwidth100" name="'.$htmlname.'" value="'.(!empty($rate) ? price(price2num($rate, 'CU')) : 1).'" /> ';
5408  print '<select name="calculation_mode">';
5409  print '<option value="1">Change '.$langs->trans("PriceUHT").' of lines</option>';
5410  print '<option value="2">Change '.$langs->trans("PriceUHTCurrency").' of lines</option>';
5411  print '</select> ';
5412  print '<input type="submit" class="button smallpaddingimp valignmiddle" value="'.$langs->trans("Modify").'">';
5413  print '</form>';
5414  } else {
5415  if (!empty($rate)) {
5416  print price($rate, 1, $langs, 1, 0);
5417  if ($currency && $rate != 1) {
5418  print ' &nbsp; ('.price($rate, 1, $langs, 1, 0).' '.$currency.' = 1 '.$conf->currency.')';
5419  }
5420  } else {
5421  print 1;
5422  }
5423  }
5424  }

5426 
5427  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
5443  public function form_remise_dispo($page, $selected, $htmlname, $socid, $amount, $filter = '', $maxvalue = 0, $more = '', $hidelist = 0, $discount_type = 0)
5444  {
5445  // phpcs:enable
5446  global $conf, $langs;
5447  if ($htmlname != "none") {
5448  print '<form method="post" action="'.$page.'">';
5449  print '<input type="hidden" name="action" value="setabsolutediscount">';
5450  print '<input type="hidden" name="token" value="'.newToken().'">';
5451  print '<div class="inline-block">';
5452  if (!empty($discount_type)) {
5453  if (!empty($conf->global->FACTURE_DEPOSITS_ARE_JUST_PAYMENTS)) {
5454  if (!$filter || $filter == "fk_invoice_supplier_source IS NULL") {
5455  $translationKey = 'HasAbsoluteDiscountFromSupplier'; // If we want deposit to be substracted to payments only and not to total of final invoice
5456  } else {
5457  $translationKey = 'HasCreditNoteFromSupplier';
5458  }
5459  } else {
5460  if (!$filter || $filter == "fk_invoice_supplier_source IS NULL OR (description LIKE '(DEPOSIT)%' AND description NOT LIKE '(EXCESS PAID)%')") {
5461  $translationKey = 'HasAbsoluteDiscountFromSupplier';
5462  } else {
5463  $translationKey = 'HasCreditNoteFromSupplier';
5464  }
5465  }
5466  } else {
5467  if (!empty($conf->global->FACTURE_DEPOSITS_ARE_JUST_PAYMENTS)) {
5468  if (!$filter || $filter == "fk_facture_source IS NULL") {
5469  $translationKey = 'CompanyHasAbsoluteDiscount'; // If we want deposit to be substracted to payments only and not to total of final invoice
5470  } else {
5471  $translationKey = 'CompanyHasCreditNote';
5472  }
5473  } else {
5474  if (!$filter || $filter == "fk_facture_source IS NULL OR (description LIKE '(DEPOSIT)%' AND description NOT LIKE '(EXCESS RECEIVED)%')") {
5475  $translationKey = 'CompanyHasAbsoluteDiscount';
5476  } else {
5477  $translationKey = 'CompanyHasCreditNote';
5478  }
5479  }
5480  }
5481  print $langs->trans($translationKey, price($amount, 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency));
5482  if (empty($hidelist)) {
5483  print ' ';
5484  }
5485  print '</div>';
5486  if (empty($hidelist)) {
5487  print '<div class="inline-block" style="padding-right: 10px">';
5488  $newfilter = 'discount_type='.intval($discount_type);
5489  if (!empty($discount_type)) {
5490  $newfilter .= ' AND fk_invoice_supplier IS NULL AND fk_invoice_supplier_line IS NULL'; // Supplier discounts available
5491  } else {
5492  $newfilter .= ' AND fk_facture IS NULL AND fk_facture_line IS NULL'; // Customer discounts available
5493  }
5494  if ($filter) {
5495  $newfilter .= ' AND ('.$filter.')';
5496  }
5497  $nbqualifiedlines = $this->select_remises($selected, $htmlname, $newfilter, $socid, $maxvalue);
5498  if ($nbqualifiedlines > 0) {
5499  print ' &nbsp; <input type="submit" class="button smallpaddingimp" value="'.dol_escape_htmltag($langs->trans("UseLine")).'"';
5500  if (!empty($discount_type) && $filter && $filter != "fk_invoice_supplier_source IS NULL OR (description LIKE '(DEPOSIT)%' AND description NOT LIKE '(EXCESS PAID)%')") {
5501  print ' title="'.$langs->trans("UseCreditNoteInInvoicePayment").'"';
5502  }
5503  if (empty($discount_type) && $filter && $filter != "fk_facture_source IS NULL OR (description LIKE '(DEPOSIT)%' AND description NOT LIKE '(EXCESS RECEIVED)%')") {
5504  print ' title="'.$langs->trans("UseCreditNoteInInvoicePayment").'"';
5505  }
5506 
5507  print '>';
5508  }
5509  print '</div>';
5510  }
5511  if ($more) {
5512  print '<div class="inline-block">';
5513  print $more;
5514  print '</div>';
5515  }
5516  print '</form>';
5517  } else {
5518  if ($selected) {
5519  print $selected;
5520  } else {
5521  print "0";
5522  }
5523  }
5524  }
5525 
5526 
5527  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
5537  public function form_contacts($page, $societe, $selected = '', $htmlname = 'contactid')
5538  {
5539  // phpcs:enable
5540  global $langs, $conf;
5541 
5542  if ($htmlname != "none") {
5543  print '<form method="post" action="'.$page.'">';
5544  print '<input type="hidden" name="action" value="set_contact">';
5545  print '<input type="hidden" name="token" value="'.newToken().'">';
5546  print '<table class="nobordernopadding">';
5547  print '<tr><td>';
5548  print $this->selectcontacts($societe->id, $selected, $htmlname);
5549  $num = $this->num;
5550  if ($num == 0) {
5551  $addcontact = (!empty($conf->global->SOCIETE_ADDRESSES_MANAGEMENT) ? $langs->trans("AddContact") : $langs->trans("AddContactAddress"));
5552  print '<a href="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/contact/card.php?socid='.$societe->id.'&amp;action=create&amp;backtoreferer=1">'.$addcontact.'</a>';
5553  }
5554  print '</td>';
5555  print '<td class="left"><input type="submit" class="button smallpaddingimp" value="'.$langs->trans("Modify").'"></td>';
5556  print '</tr></table></form>';
5557  } else {
5558  if ($selected) {
5559  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/contact/class/contact.class.php';
5560  $contact = new Contact($this->db);
5561  $contact->fetch($selected);
5562  print $contact->getFullName($langs);
5563  } else {
5564  print "&nbsp;";
5565  }
5566  }
5567  }

5585  public function form_thirdparty($page, $selected = '', $htmlname = 'socid', $filter = '', $showempty = 0, $showtype = 0, $forcecombo = 0, $events = array(), $nooutput = 0, $excludeids = array())

5592  $out .= '<form method="post" action="'.$page.'">';
5593  $out .= '<input type="hidden" name="action" value="set_thirdparty">';
5594  $out .= '<input type="hidden" name="token" value="'.newToken().'">';
5595  $out .= $this->select_company($selected, $htmlname, $filter, $showempty, $showtype, $forcecombo, $events, 0, 'minwidth100', '', '', 1, array(), false, $excludeids);
5596  $out .= '<input type="submit" class="button smallpaddingimp valignmiddle" value="'.$langs->trans("Modify").'">';
5597  $out .= '</form>';
5598  } else {
5599  if ($selected) {
5600  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/societe/class/societe.class.php';
5601  $soc = new Societe($this->db);

5603  $out .= $soc->getNomUrl($langs);
5604  } else {
5605  $out .= "&nbsp;";
5606  }
5607  }
5608 
5609  if ($nooutput) {
5610  return $out;
5611  } else {
5612  print $out;
5613  }
5614  }

5616  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
5625  public function select_currency($selected = '', $htmlname = 'currency_id')
5626  {
5627  // phpcs:enable
5628  print $this->selectCurrency($selected, $htmlname);
5629  }
5630 
5639  public function selectCurrency($selected = '', $htmlname = 'currency_id', $mode = 0)
5640  {
5641  global $conf, $langs, $user;
5642 
5643  $langs->loadCacheCurrencies('');
5644 
5645  $out = '';
5646 
5647  if ($selected == 'euro' || $selected == 'euros') {
5648  $selected = 'EUR'; // Pour compatibilite
5649  }
5650 
5651  $out .= '<select class="flat maxwidth200onsmartphone minwidth300" name="'.$htmlname.'" id="'.$htmlname.'">';
5652  foreach ($langs->cache_currencies as $code_iso => $currency) {
5653  $labeltoshow = $currency['label'];
5654  if ($mode == 1) {
5655  $labeltoshow .= ' <span class="opacitymedium">('.$code_iso.')</span>';
5656  } else {
5657  $labeltoshow .= ' <span class="opacitymedium">('.$langs->getCurrencySymbol($code_iso).')</span>';
5658  }
5659 
5660  if ($selected && $selected == $code_iso) {
5661  $out .= '<option value="'.$code_iso.'" selected data-html="'.dol_escape_htmltag($labeltoshow).'">';
5662  } else {
5663  $out .= '<option value="'.$code_iso.'" data-html="'.dol_escape_htmltag($labeltoshow).'">';
5664  }
5665  $out .= $labeltoshow;
5666  $out .= '</option>';
5667  }
5668  $out .= '</select>';
5669  if ($user->admin) {
5670  $out .= info_admin($langs->trans("YouCanChangeValuesForThisListFromDictionarySetup"), 1);
5671  }
5672 
5673  // Make select dynamic
5674  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/ajax.lib.php';
5675  $out .= ajax_combobox($htmlname);
5676 
5677  return $out;
5678  }
5679 
5690  public function selectMultiCurrency($selected = '', $htmlname = 'multicurrency_code', $useempty = 0, $filter = '', $excludeConfCurrency = false)
5691  {
5692  global $db, $conf, $langs, $user;
5693 
5694  $langs->loadCacheCurrencies(''); // Load ->cache_currencies
5695 
5696  $TCurrency = array();
5697 
5698  $sql = 'SELECT code FROM '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'multicurrency';
5699  $sql .= " WHERE entity IN ('".getEntity('mutlicurrency')."')";
5700  if ($filter) {
5701  $sql .= " AND ".$filter;
5702  }
5703  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
5704  if ($resql) {
5705  while ($obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql)) {
5706  $TCurrency[$obj->code] = $obj->code;
5707  }
5708  }
5709 
5710  $out = '';
5711  $out .= '<select class="flat" name="'.$htmlname.'" id="'.$htmlname.'">';
5712  if ($useempty) {
5713  $out .= '<option value="">&nbsp;</option>';
5714  }
5715  // If company current currency not in table, we add it into list. Should always be available.
5716  if (!in_array($conf->currency, $TCurrency) && !$excludeConfCurrency) {
5717  $TCurrency[$conf->currency] = $conf->currency;
5718  }
5719  if (count($TCurrency) > 0) {
5720  foreach ($langs->cache_currencies as $code_iso => $currency) {
5721  if (isset($TCurrency[$code_iso])) {
5722  if (!empty($selected) && $selected == $code_iso) {
5723  $out .= '<option value="'.$code_iso.'" selected="selected">';
5724  } else {
5725  $out .= '<option value="'.$code_iso.'">';
5726  }
5727 
5728  $out .= $currency['label'];
5729  $out .= ' ('.$langs->getCurrencySymbol($code_iso).')';
5730  $out .= '</option>';
5731  }
5732  }
5733  }
5734 
5735  $out .= '</select>';
5736  // Make select dynamic
5737  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/ajax.lib.php';
5738  $out .= ajax_combobox($htmlname);
5739 
5740  return $out;
5741  }
5742 
5743  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
5750  public function load_cache_vatrates($country_code)
5751  {
5752  // phpcs:enable
5753  global $langs;
5754 
5755  $num = count($this->cache_vatrates);
5756  if ($num > 0) {
5757  return $num; // Cache already loaded
5758  }
5759 
5760  dol_syslog(__METHOD__, LOG_DEBUG);
5761 
5762  $sql = "SELECT DISTINCT t.rowid, t.code, t.taux, t.localtax1, t.localtax1_type, t.localtax2, t.localtax2_type, t.recuperableonly";
5763  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_tva as t, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_country as c";
5764  $sql .= " WHERE t.fk_pays = c.rowid";
5765  $sql .= " AND t.active > 0";
5766  $sql .= " AND c.code IN (".$this->db->sanitize($country_code, 1).")";
5767  $sql .= " ORDER BY t.code ASC, t.taux ASC, t.recuperableonly ASC";
5768 
5769  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
5770  if ($resql) {
5771  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
5772  if ($num) {
5773  for ($i = 0; $i < $num; $i++) {
5774  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
5775  $this->cache_vatrates[$i]['rowid'] = $obj->rowid;
5776  $this->cache_vatrates[$i]['code'] = $obj->code;
5777  $this->cache_vatrates[$i]['txtva'] = $obj->taux;
5778  $this->cache_vatrates[$i]['nprtva'] = $obj->recuperableonly;
5779  $this->cache_vatrates[$i]['localtax1'] = $obj->localtax1;
5780  $this->cache_vatrates[$i]['localtax1_type'] = $obj->localtax1_type;
5781  $this->cache_vatrates[$i]['localtax2'] = $obj->localtax2;
5782  $this->cache_vatrates[$i]['localtax2_type'] = $obj->localtax1_type;
5783 
5784  $this->cache_vatrates[$i]['label'] = $obj->taux.'%'.($obj->code ? ' ('.$obj->code.')' : ''); // Label must contains only 0-9 , . % or *
5785  $this->cache_vatrates[$i]['labelallrates'] = $obj->taux.'/'.($obj->localtax1 ? $obj->localtax1 : '0').'/'.($obj->localtax2 ? $obj->localtax2 : '0').($obj->code ? ' ('.$obj->code.')' : ''); // Must never be used as key, only label
5786  $positiverates = '';
5787  if ($obj->taux) {
5788  $positiverates .= ($positiverates ? '/' : '').$obj->taux;
5789  }
5790  if ($obj->localtax1) {
5791  $positiverates .= ($positiverates ? '/' : '').$obj->localtax1;
5792  }
5793  if ($obj->localtax2) {
5794  $positiverates .= ($positiverates ? '/' : '').$obj->localtax2;
5795  }
5796  if (empty($positiverates)) {
5797  $positiverates = '0';
5798  }
5799  $this->cache_vatrates[$i]['labelpositiverates'] = $positiverates.($obj->code ? ' ('.$obj->code.')' : ''); // Must never be used as key, only label
5800  }
5801 
5802  return $num;
5803  } else {
5804  $this->error = '<span class="error">'.$langs->trans("ErrorNoVATRateDefinedForSellerCountry", $country_code).'</span>';
5805  return -1;
5806  }
5807  } else {
5808  $this->error = '<span class="error">'.$this->db->error().'</span>';
5809  return -2;
5810  }
5811  }
5812 
5813  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
5835  public function load_tva($htmlname = 'tauxtva', $selectedrate = '', $societe_vendeuse = '', $societe_acheteuse = '', $idprod = 0, $info_bits = 0, $type = '', $options_only = false, $mode = 0)
5836  {
5837  // phpcs:enable
5838  global $langs, $conf, $mysoc;
5839 
5840  $langs->load('errors');
5841 
5842  $return = '';
5843 
5844  // Define defaultnpr, defaultttx and defaultcode
5845  $defaultnpr = ($info_bits & 0x01);
5846  $defaultnpr = (preg_match('/\*/', $selectedrate) ? 1 : $defaultnpr);
5847  $defaulttx = str_replace('*', '', $selectedrate);
5848  $defaultcode = '';
5849  $reg = array();
5850  if (preg_match('/\((.*)\)/', $defaulttx, $reg)) {
5851  $defaultcode = $reg[1];
5852  $defaulttx = preg_replace('/\s*\(.*\)/', '', $defaulttx);
5853  }
5854  //var_dump($selectedrate.'-'.$defaulttx.'-'.$defaultnpr.'-'.$defaultcode);
5855 
5856  // Check parameters
5857  if (is_object($societe_vendeuse) && !$societe_vendeuse->country_code) {
5858  if ($societe_vendeuse->id == $mysoc->id) {
5859  $return .= '<span class="error">'.$langs->trans("ErrorYourCountryIsNotDefined").'</span>';
5860  } else {
5861  $return .= '<span class="error">'.$langs->trans("ErrorSupplierCountryIsNotDefined").'</span>';
5862  }
5863  return $return;
5864  }
5865 
5866  //var_dump($societe_acheteuse);
5867  //print "name=$name, selectedrate=$selectedrate, seller=".$societe_vendeuse->country_code." buyer=".$societe_acheteuse->country_code." buyer is company=".$societe_acheteuse->isACompany()." idprod=$idprod, info_bits=$info_bits type=$type";
5868  //exit;
5869 
5870  // Define list of countries to use to search VAT rates to show
5871  // First we defined code_country to use to find list
5872  if (is_object($societe_vendeuse)) {
5873  $code_country = "'".$societe_vendeuse->country_code."'";
5874  } else {
5875  $code_country = "'".$mysoc->country_code."'"; // Pour compatibilite ascendente
5876  }
5877  if (!empty($conf->global->SERVICE_ARE_ECOMMERCE_200238EC)) { // If option to have vat for end customer for services is on
5878  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/company.lib.php';
5879  if (!isInEEC($societe_vendeuse) && (!is_object($societe_acheteuse) || (isInEEC($societe_acheteuse) && !$societe_acheteuse->isACompany()))) {
5880  // We also add the buyer
5881  if (is_numeric($type)) {
5882  if ($type == 1) { // We know product is a service
5883  $code_country .= ",'".$societe_acheteuse->country_code."'";
5884  }
5885  } elseif (!$idprod) { // We don't know type of product
5886  $code_country .= ",'".$societe_acheteuse->country_code."'";
5887  } else {
5888  $prodstatic = new Product($this->db);
5889  $prodstatic->fetch($idprod);
5890  if ($prodstatic->type == Product::TYPE_SERVICE) { // We know product is a service
5891  $code_country .= ",'".$societe_acheteuse->country_code."'";
5892  }
5893  }
5894  }
5895  }
5896 
5897  // Now we get list
5898  $num = $this->load_cache_vatrates($code_country); // If no vat defined, return -1 with message into this->error
5899 
5900  if ($num > 0) {
5901  // Definition du taux a pre-selectionner (si defaulttx non force et donc vaut -1 ou '')
5902  if ($defaulttx < 0 || dol_strlen($defaulttx) == 0) {
5903  $tmpthirdparty = new Societe($this->db);
5904  $defaulttx = get_default_tva($societe_vendeuse, (is_object($societe_acheteuse) ? $societe_acheteuse : $tmpthirdparty), $idprod);
5905  $defaultnpr = get_default_npr($societe_vendeuse, (is_object($societe_acheteuse) ? $societe_acheteuse : $tmpthirdparty), $idprod);
5906  if (preg_match('/\((.*)\)/', $defaulttx, $reg)) {
5907  $defaultcode = $reg[1];
5908  $defaulttx = preg_replace('/\s*\(.*\)/', '', $defaulttx);
5909  }
5910  if (empty($defaulttx)) {
5911  $defaultnpr = 0;
5912  }
5913  }
5914 
5915  // Si taux par defaut n'a pu etre determine, on prend dernier de la liste.
5916  // Comme ils sont tries par ordre croissant, dernier = plus eleve = taux courant
5917  if ($defaulttx < 0 || dol_strlen($defaulttx) == 0) {
5918  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_VAT_DEFAULT_IF_AUTODETECT_FAILS)) {
5919  $defaulttx = $this->cache_vatrates[$num - 1]['txtva'];
5920  } else {
5921  $defaulttx = ($conf->global->MAIN_VAT_DEFAULT_IF_AUTODETECT_FAILS == 'none' ? '' : $conf->global->MAIN_VAT_DEFAULT_IF_AUTODETECT_FAILS);
5922  }
5923  }
5924 
5925  // Disabled if seller is not subject to VAT
5926  $disabled = false;
5927  $title = '';
5928  if (is_object($societe_vendeuse) && $societe_vendeuse->id == $mysoc->id && $societe_vendeuse->tva_assuj == "0") {
5929  // Override/enable VAT for expense report regardless of global setting - needed if expense report used for business expenses instead
5930  // of using supplier invoices (this is a very bad idea !)
5931  if (empty($conf->global->EXPENSEREPORT_OVERRIDE_VAT)) {
5932  $title = ' title="'.$langs->trans('VATIsNotUsed').'"';
5933  $disabled = true;
5934  }
5935  }
5936 
5937  if (!$options_only) {
5938  $return .= '<select class="flat minwidth75imp" id="'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'"'.($disabled ? ' disabled' : '').$title.'>';
5939  }
5940 
5941  $selectedfound = false;
5942  foreach ($this->cache_vatrates as $rate) {
5943  // Keep only 0 if seller is not subject to VAT
5944  if ($disabled && $rate['txtva'] != 0) {
5945  continue;
5946  }
5947 
5948  // Define key to use into select list
5949  $key = $rate['txtva'];
5950  $key .= $rate['nprtva'] ? '*' : '';
5951  if ($mode > 0 && $rate['code']) {
5952  $key .= ' ('.$rate['code'].')';
5953  }
5954  if ($mode < 0) {
5955  $key = $rate['rowid'];
5956  }
5957 
5958  $return .= '<option value="'.$key.'"';
5959  if (!$selectedfound) {
5960  if ($defaultcode) { // If defaultcode is defined, we used it in priority to select combo option instead of using rate+npr flag
5961  if ($defaultcode == $rate['code']) {
5962  $return .= ' selected';
5963  $selectedfound = true;
5964  }
5965  } elseif ($rate['txtva'] == $defaulttx && $rate['nprtva'] == $defaultnpr) {
5966  $return .= ' selected';
5967  $selectedfound = true;
5968  }
5969  }
5970  $return .= '>';
5971  //if (! empty($conf->global->MAIN_VAT_SHOW_POSITIVE_RATES))
5972  if ($mysoc->country_code == 'IN' || !empty($conf->global->MAIN_VAT_LABEL_IS_POSITIVE_RATES)) {
5973  $return .= $rate['labelpositiverates'];
5974  } else {
5975  $return .= vatrate($rate['label']);
5976  }
5977  //$return.=($rate['code']?' '.$rate['code']:'');
5978  $return .= (empty($rate['code']) && $rate['nprtva']) ? ' *' : ''; // We show the * (old behaviour only if new vat code is not used)
5979 
5980  $return .= '</option>';
5981  }
5982 
5983  if (!$options_only) {
5984  $return .= '</select>';
5985  }
5986  } else {
5987  $return .= $this->error;
5988  }
5989 
5990  $this->num = $num;
5991  return $return;
5992  }
5993 
5994 
5995  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
6020  public function select_date($set_time = '', $prefix = 're', $h = 0, $m = 0, $empty = 0, $form_name = "", $d = 1, $addnowlink = 0, $nooutput = 0, $disabled = 0, $fullday = '', $addplusone = '', $adddateof = '')
6021  {
6022  // phpcs:enable
6023  $retstring = $this->selectDate($set_time, $prefix, $h, $m, $empty, $form_name, $d, $addnowlink, $disabled, $fullday, $addplusone, $adddateof);
6024  if (!empty($nooutput)) {
6025  return $retstring;
6026  }
6027  print $retstring;
6028  return;
6029  }
6030 
6045  public function selectDateToDate($set_time = '', $set_time_end = '', $prefix = 're', $empty = 0)
6046  {
6047  global $langs;
6048 
6049  $ret = $this->selectDate($set_time, $prefix.'_start', 0, 0, $empty, '', 1, 0, 0, '', '', '', '', 1, '', $langs->trans("from"), 'tzuserrel');
6050  $ret .= '<br>';
6051  $ret .= $this->selectDate($set_time_end, $prefix.'_end', 0, 0, $empty, '', 1, 0, 0, '', '', '', '', 1, '', $langs->trans("to"), 'tzuserrel');
6052  return $ret;
6053  }
6054 
6082  public function selectDate($set_time = '', $prefix = 're', $h = 0, $m = 0, $empty = 0, $form_name = "", $d = 1, $addnowlink = 0, $disabled = 0, $fullday = '', $addplusone = '', $adddateof = '', $openinghours = '', $stepminutes = 1, $labeladddateof = '', $placeholder = '', $gm = 'auto')
6083  {
6084  global $conf, $langs;
6085 
6086  if ($gm === 'auto') {
6087  $gm = (empty($conf) ? 'tzserver' : $conf->tzuserinputkey);
6088  }
6089 
6090  $retstring = '';
6091 
6092  if ($prefix == '') {
6093  $prefix = 're';
6094  }
6095  if ($h == '') {
6096  $h = 0;
6097  }
6098  if ($m == '') {
6099  $m = 0;
6100  }
6101  $emptydate = 0;
6102  $emptyhours = 0;
6103  if ($stepminutes <= 0 || $stepminutes > 30) {
6104  $stepminutes = 1;
6105  }
6106  if ($empty == 1) {
6107  $emptydate = 1;
6108  $emptyhours = 1;
6109  }
6110  if ($empty == 2) {
6111  $emptydate = 0;
6112  $emptyhours = 1;
6113  }
6114  $orig_set_time = $set_time;
6115 
6116  if ($set_time === '' && $emptydate == 0) {
6117  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/date.lib.php';
6118  if ($gm == 'tzuser' || $gm == 'tzuserrel') {
6119  $set_time = dol_now($gm);
6120  } else {
6121  $set_time = dol_now('tzuser') - (getServerTimeZoneInt('now') * 3600); // set_time must be relative to PHP server timezone
6122  }
6123  }
6124 
6125  // Analysis of the pre-selection date
6126  $reg = array();
6127  if (preg_match('/^([0-9]+)\-([0-9]+)\-([0-9]+)\s?([0-9]+)?:?([0-9]+)?/', $set_time, $reg)) { // deprecated usage
6128  // Date format 'YYYY-MM-DD' or 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS'
6129  $syear = (!empty($reg[1]) ? $reg[1] : '');
6130  $smonth = (!empty($reg[2]) ? $reg[2] : '');
6131  $sday = (!empty($reg[3]) ? $reg[3] : '');
6132  $shour = (!empty($reg[4]) ? $reg[4] : '');
6133  $smin = (!empty($reg[5]) ? $reg[5] : '');
6134  } elseif (strval($set_time) != '' && $set_time != -1) {
6135  // set_time est un timestamps (0 possible)
6136  $syear = dol_print_date($set_time, "%Y", $gm);
6137  $smonth = dol_print_date($set_time, "%m", $gm);
6138  $sday = dol_print_date($set_time, "%d", $gm);
6139  if ($orig_set_time != '') {
6140  $shour = dol_print_date($set_time, "%H", $gm);
6141  $smin = dol_print_date($set_time, "%M", $gm);
6142  $ssec = dol_print_date($set_time, "%S", $gm);
6143  } else {
6144  $shour = '';
6145  $smin = '';
6146  $ssec = '';
6147  }
6148  } else {
6149  // Date est '' ou vaut -1
6150  $syear = '';
6151  $smonth = '';
6152  $sday = '';
6153  $shour = !isset($conf->global->MAIN_DEFAULT_DATE_HOUR) ? ($h == -1 ? '23' : '') : $conf->global->MAIN_DEFAULT_DATE_HOUR;
6154  $smin = !isset($conf->global->MAIN_DEFAULT_DATE_MIN) ? ($h == -1 ? '59' : '') : $conf->global->MAIN_DEFAULT_DATE_MIN;
6155  $ssec = !isset($conf->global->MAIN_DEFAULT_DATE_SEC) ? ($h == -1 ? '59' : '') : $conf->global->MAIN_DEFAULT_DATE_SEC;
6156  }
6157  if ($h == 3) {
6158  $shour = '';
6159  }
6160  if ($m == 3) {
6161  $smin = '';
6162  }
6163 
6164  $nowgmt = dol_now('gmt');
6165  //var_dump(dol_print_date($nowgmt, 'dayhourinputnoreduce', 'tzuserrel'));
6166 
6167  // You can set MAIN_POPUP_CALENDAR to 'eldy' or 'jquery'
6168  $usecalendar = 'combo';
6169  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) && (empty($conf->global->MAIN_POPUP_CALENDAR) || $conf->global->MAIN_POPUP_CALENDAR != "none")) {
6170  $usecalendar = ((empty($conf->global->MAIN_POPUP_CALENDAR) || $conf->global->MAIN_POPUP_CALENDAR == 'eldy') ? 'jquery' : $conf->global->MAIN_POPUP_CALENDAR);
6171  }
6172 
6173  if ($d) {
6174  // Show date with popup
6175  if ($usecalendar != 'combo') {
6176  $formated_date = '';
6177  //print "e".$set_time." t ".$conf->format_date_short;
6178  if (strval($set_time) != '' && $set_time != -1) {
6179  //$formated_date=dol_print_date($set_time,$conf->format_date_short);
6180  $formated_date = dol_print_date($set_time, $langs->trans("FormatDateShortInput"), $gm); // FormatDateShortInput for dol_print_date / FormatDateShortJavaInput that is same for javascript
6181  }
6182 
6183  // Calendrier popup version eldy
6184  if ($usecalendar == "eldy") {
6185  // Input area to enter date manually
6186  $retstring .= '<input id="'.$prefix.'" name="'.$prefix.'" type="text" class="maxwidthdate" maxlength="11" value="'.$formated_date.'"';
6187  $retstring .= ($disabled ? ' disabled' : '');
6188  $retstring .= ' onChange="dpChangeDay(\''.$prefix.'\',\''.$langs->trans("FormatDateShortJavaInput").'\'); "'; // FormatDateShortInput for dol_print_date / FormatDateShortJavaInput that is same for javascript
6189  $retstring .= '>';
6190 
6191  // Icon calendar
6192  $retstringbuttom = '';
6193  if (!$disabled) {
6194  $retstringbuttom = '<button id="'.$prefix.'Button" type="button" class="dpInvisibleButtons"';
6195  $base = DOL_URL_ROOT.'/core/';
6196  $retstringbuttom .= ' onClick="showDP(\''.$base.'\',\''.$prefix.'\',\''.$langs->trans("FormatDateShortJavaInput").'\',\''.$langs->defaultlang.'\');"';
6197  $retstringbuttom .= '>'.img_object($langs->trans("SelectDate"), 'calendarday', 'class="datecallink"').'</button>';
6198  } else {
6199  $retstringbuttom = '<button id="'.$prefix.'Button" type="button" class="dpInvisibleButtons">'.img_object($langs->trans("Disabled"), 'calendarday', 'class="datecallink"').'</button>';
6200  }
6201  $retstring = $retstringbuttom.$retstring;
6202 
6203  $retstring .= '<input type="hidden" id="'.$prefix.'day" name="'.$prefix.'day" value="'.$sday.'">'."\n";
6204  $retstring .= '<input type="hidden" id="'.$prefix.'month" name="'.$prefix.'month" value="'.$smonth.'">'."\n";
6205  $retstring .= '<input type="hidden" id="'.$prefix.'year" name="'.$prefix.'year" value="'.$syear.'">'."\n";
6206  } elseif ($usecalendar == 'jquery') {
6207  if (!$disabled) {
6208  // Output javascript for datepicker
6209  $retstring .= "<script type='text/javascript'>";
6210  $retstring .= "$(function(){ $('#".$prefix."').datepicker({
6211  dateFormat: '".$langs->trans("FormatDateShortJQueryInput")."',
6212  autoclose: true,
6213  todayHighlight: true,";
6214  if (!empty($conf->dol_use_jmobile)) {
6215  $retstring .= "
6216  beforeShow: function (input, datePicker) {
6217  input.disabled = true;
6218  },
6219  onClose: function (dateText, datePicker) {
6220  this.disabled = false;
6221  },
6222  ";
6223  }
6224  // Note: We don't need monthNames, monthNamesShort, dayNames, dayNamesShort, dayNamesMin, they are set globally on datepicker component in lib_head.js.php
6225  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_POPUP_CALENDAR_ON_FOCUS)) {
6226  $retstring .= "
6227  showOn: 'button', /* both has problem with autocompletion */
6228  buttonImage: '".DOL_URL_ROOT."/theme/".$conf->theme."/img/object_calendarday.png',
6229  buttonImageOnly: true";
6230  }
6231  $retstring .= "
6232  }) });";
6233  $retstring .= "</script>";
6234  }
6235 
6236  // Zone de saisie manuelle de la date
6237  $retstring .= '<div class="nowrap inline-block divfordateinput">';
6238  $retstring .= '<input id="'.$prefix.'" name="'.$prefix.'" type="text" class="maxwidthdate" maxlength="11" value="'.$formated_date.'"';
6239  $retstring .= ($disabled ? ' disabled' : '');
6240  $retstring .= ($placeholder ? ' placeholder="'.dol_escape_htmltag($placeholder).'"' : '');
6241  $retstring .= ' onChange="dpChangeDay(\''.$prefix.'\',\''.$langs->trans("FormatDateShortJavaInput").'\'); "'; // FormatDateShortInput for dol_print_date / FormatDateShortJavaInput that is same for javascript
6242  $retstring .= '>';
6243 
6244  // Icone calendrier
6245  if (!$disabled) {
6246  /* Not required. Managed by option buttonImage of jquery
6247  $retstring.=img_object($langs->trans("SelectDate"),'calendarday','id="'.$prefix.'id" class="datecallink"');
6248  $retstring.="<script type='text/javascript'>";
6249  $retstring.="jQuery(document).ready(function() {";
6250  $retstring.=' jQuery("#'.$prefix.'id").click(function() {';
6251  $retstring.=" jQuery('#".$prefix."').focus();";
6252  $retstring.=' });';
6253  $retstring.='});';
6254  $retstring.="</script>";*/
6255  } else {
6256  $retstringbutton = '<button id="'.$prefix.'Button" type="button" class="dpInvisibleButtons">'.img_object($langs->trans("Disabled"), 'calendarday', 'class="datecallink"').'</button>';
6257  $retsring = $retstringbutton.$retstring;
6258  }
6259 
6260  $retstring .= '</div>';
6261  $retstring .= '<input type="hidden" id="'.$prefix.'day" name="'.$prefix.'day" value="'.$sday.'">'."\n";
6262  $retstring .= '<input type="hidden" id="'.$prefix.'month" name="'.$prefix.'month" value="'.$smonth.'">'."\n";
6263  $retstring .= '<input type="hidden" id="'.$prefix.'year" name="'.$prefix.'year" value="'.$syear.'">'."\n";
6264  } else {
6265  $retstring .= "Bad value of MAIN_POPUP_CALENDAR";
6266  }
6267  } else {
6268  // Show date with combo selects
6269  // Day
6270  $retstring .= '<select'.($disabled ? ' disabled' : '').' class="flat valignmiddle maxwidth50imp" id="'.$prefix.'day" name="'.$prefix.'day">';
6271 
6272  if ($emptydate || $set_time == -1) {
6273  $retstring .= '<option value="0" selected>&nbsp;</option>';
6274  }
6275 
6276  for ($day = 1; $day <= 31; $day++) {
6277  $retstring .= '<option value="'.$day.'"'.($day == $sday ? ' selected' : '').'>'.$day.'</option>';
6278  }
6279 
6280  $retstring .= "</select>";
6281 
6282  $retstring .= '<select'.($disabled ? ' disabled' : '').' class="flat valignmiddle maxwidth75imp" id="'.$prefix.'month" name="'.$prefix.'month">';
6283  if ($emptydate || $set_time == -1) {
6284  $retstring .= '<option value="0" selected>&nbsp;</option>';
6285  }
6286 
6287  // Month
6288  for ($month = 1; $month <= 12; $month++) {
6289  $retstring .= '<option value="'.$month.'"'.($month == $smonth ? ' selected' : '').'>';
6290  $retstring .= dol_print_date(mktime(12, 0, 0, $month, 1, 2000), "%b");
6291  $retstring .= "</option>";
6292  }
6293  $retstring .= "</select>";
6294 
6295  // Year
6296  if ($emptydate || $set_time == -1) {
6297  $retstring .= '<input'.($disabled ? ' disabled' : '').' placeholder="'.dol_escape_htmltag($langs->trans("Year")).'" class="flat maxwidth50imp valignmiddle" type="number" min="0" max="3000" maxlength="4" id="'.$prefix.'year" name="'.$prefix.'year" value="'.$syear.'">';
6298  } else {
6299  $retstring .= '<select'.($disabled ? ' disabled' : '').' class="flat valignmiddle maxwidth75imp" id="'.$prefix.'year" name="'.$prefix.'year">';
6300 
6301  for ($year = $syear - 10; $year < $syear + 10; $year++) {
6302  $retstring .= '<option value="'.$year.'"'.($year == $syear ? ' selected' : '').'>'.$year.'</option>';
6303  }
6304  $retstring .= "</select>\n";
6305  }
6306  }
6307  }
6308 
6309  if ($d && $h) {
6310  $retstring .= ($h == 2 ? '<br>' : ' ');
6311  $retstring .= '<span class="nowraponall">';
6312  }
6313 
6314  if ($h) {
6315  $hourstart = 0;
6316  $hourend = 24;
6317  if ($openinghours != '') {
6318  $openinghours = explode(',', $openinghours);
6319  $hourstart = $openinghours[0];
6320  $hourend = $openinghours[1];
6321  if ($hourend < $hourstart) {
6322  $hourend = $hourstart;
6323  }
6324  }
6325  // Show hour
6326  $retstring .= '<select'.($disabled ? ' disabled' : '').' class="flat valignmiddle maxwidth50 '.($fullday ? $fullday.'hour' : '').'" id="'.$prefix.'hour" name="'.$prefix.'hour">';
6327  if ($emptyhours) {
6328  $retstring .= '<option value="-1">&nbsp;</option>';
6329  }
6330  for ($hour = $hourstart; $hour < $hourend; $hour++) {
6331  if (strlen($hour) < 2) {
6332  $hour = "0".$hour;
6333  }
6334  $retstring .= '<option value="'.$hour.'"'.(($hour == $shour) ? ' selected' : '').'>'.$hour;
6335  //$retstring .= (empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen) ? '' : 'H');
6336  $retstring .= '</option>';
6337  }
6338  $retstring .= '</select>';
6339  //if ($m && empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen)) $retstring .= ":";
6340  if ($m) {
6341  $retstring .= ":";
6342  }
6343  }
6344 
6345  if ($m) {
6346  // Show minutes
6347  $retstring .= '<select'.($disabled ? ' disabled' : '').' class="flat valignmiddle maxwidth50 '.($fullday ? $fullday.'min' : '').'" id="'.$prefix.'min" name="'.$prefix.'min">';
6348  if ($emptyhours) {
6349  $retstring .= '<option value="-1">&nbsp;</option>';
6350  }
6351  for ($min = 0; $min < 60; $min += $stepminutes) {
6352  if (strlen($min) < 2) {
6353  $min = "0".$min;
6354  }
6355  $retstring .= '<option value="'.$min.'"'.(($min == $smin) ? ' selected' : '').'>'.$min.(empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen) ? '' : '').'</option>';
6356  }
6357  $retstring .= '</select>';
6358 
6359  $retstring .= '<input type="hidden" name="'.$prefix.'sec" value="'.$ssec.'">';
6360  }
6361 
6362  if ($d && $h) {
6363  $retstring .= '</span>';
6364  }
6365 
6366  // Add a "Now" link
6367  if ($conf->use_javascript_ajax && $addnowlink) {
6368  // Script which will be inserted in the onClick of the "Now" link
6369  $reset_scripts = "";
6370  if ($addnowlink == 2) { // local computer time
6371  // pad add leading 0 on numbers
6372  $reset_scripts .= "Number.prototype.pad = function(size) {
6373  var s = String(this);
6374  while (s.length < (size || 2)) {s = '0' + s;}
6375  return s;
6376  };
6377  var d = new Date();";
6378  }
6379 
6380  // Generate the date part, depending on the use or not of the javascript calendar
6381  if ($addnowlink == 1) { // server time expressed in user time setup
6382  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, 'day', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
6383  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'day\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, '%d', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
6384  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'month\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, '%m', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
6385  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'year\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, '%Y', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
6386  } elseif ($addnowlink == 2) {
6387  /* Disabled because the output does not use the string format defined by FormatDateShort key to forge the value into #prefix.
6388  * This break application for foreign languages.
6389  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'\').val(d.toLocaleDateString(\''.str_replace('_', '-', $langs->defaultlang).'\'));';
6390  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'day\').val(d.getDate().pad());';
6391  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'month\').val(parseInt(d.getMonth().pad()) + 1);';
6392  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'year\').val(d.getFullYear());';
6393  */
6394  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, 'day', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
6395  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'day\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, '%d', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
6396  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'month\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, '%m', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
6397  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'year\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, '%Y', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
6398  }
6399  /*if ($usecalendar == "eldy")
6400  {
6401  $base=DOL_URL_ROOT.'/core/';
6402  $reset_scripts .= 'resetDP(\''.$base.'\',\''.$prefix.'\',\''.$langs->trans("FormatDateShortJavaInput").'\',\''.$langs->defaultlang.'\');';
6403  }
6404  else
6405  {
6406  $reset_scripts .= 'this.form.elements[\''.$prefix.'day\'].value=formatDate(new Date(), \'d\'); ';
6407  $reset_scripts .= 'this.form.elements[\''.$prefix.'month\'].value=formatDate(new Date(), \'M\'); ';
6408  $reset_scripts .= 'this.form.elements[\''.$prefix.'year\'].value=formatDate(new Date(), \'yyyy\'); ';
6409  }*/
6410  // Update the hour part
6411  if ($h) {
6412  if ($fullday) {
6413  $reset_scripts .= " if (jQuery('#fullday:checked').val() == null) {";
6414  }
6415  //$reset_scripts .= 'this.form.elements[\''.$prefix.'hour\'].value=formatDate(new Date(), \'HH\'); ';
6416  if ($addnowlink == 1) {
6417  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'hour\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, '%H', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
6418  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'hour\').change();';
6419  } elseif ($addnowlink == 2) {
6420  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'hour\').val(d.getHours().pad());';
6421  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'hour\').change();';
6422  }
6423 
6424  if ($fullday) {
6425  $reset_scripts .= ' } ';
6426  }
6427  }
6428  // Update the minute part
6429  if ($m) {
6430  if ($fullday) {
6431  $reset_scripts .= " if (jQuery('#fullday:checked').val() == null) {";
6432  }
6433  //$reset_scripts .= 'this.form.elements[\''.$prefix.'min\'].value=formatDate(new Date(), \'mm\'); ';
6434  if ($addnowlink == 1) {
6435  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'min\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, '%M', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
6436  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'min\').change();';
6437  } elseif ($addnowlink == 2) {
6438  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'min\').val(d.getMinutes().pad());';
6439  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'min\').change();';
6440  }
6441  if ($fullday) {
6442  $reset_scripts .= ' } ';
6443  }
6444  }
6445  // If reset_scripts is not empty, print the link with the reset_scripts in the onClick
6446  if ($reset_scripts && empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen)) {
6447  $retstring .= ' <button class="dpInvisibleButtons datenowlink" id="'.$prefix.'ButtonNow" type="button" name="_useless" value="now" onClick="'.$reset_scripts.'">';
6448  $retstring .= $langs->trans("Now");
6449  $retstring .= '</button> ';
6450  }
6451  }
6452 
6453  // Add a "Plus one hour" link
6454  if ($conf->use_javascript_ajax && $addplusone) {
6455  // Script which will be inserted in the onClick of the "Add plusone" link
6456  $reset_scripts = "";
6457 
6458  // Generate the date part, depending on the use or not of the javascript calendar
6459  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, 'dayinputnoreduce', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
6460  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'day\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, '%d', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
6461  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'month\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, '%m', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
6462  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'year\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, '%Y', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
6463  // Update the hour part
6464  if ($h) {
6465  if ($fullday) {
6466  $reset_scripts .= " if (jQuery('#fullday:checked').val() == null) {";
6467  }
6468  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'hour\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, '%H', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
6469  if ($fullday) {
6470  $reset_scripts .= ' } ';
6471  }
6472  }
6473  // Update the minute part
6474  if ($m) {
6475  if ($fullday) {
6476  $reset_scripts .= " if (jQuery('#fullday:checked').val() == null) {";
6477  }
6478  $reset_scripts .= 'jQuery(\'#'.$prefix.'min\').val(\''.dol_print_date($nowgmt, '%M', 'tzuserrel').'\');';
6479  if ($fullday) {
6480  $reset_scripts .= ' } ';
6481  }
6482  }
6483  // If reset_scripts is not empty, print the link with the reset_scripts in the onClick
6484  if ($reset_scripts && empty($conf->dol_optimize_smallscreen)) {
6485  $retstring .= ' <button class="dpInvisibleButtons datenowlink" id="'.$prefix.'ButtonPlusOne" type="button" name="_useless2" value="plusone" onClick="'.$reset_scripts.'">';
6486  $retstring .= $langs->trans("DateStartPlusOne");
6487  $retstring .= '</button> ';
6488  }
6489  }
6490 
6491  // Add a link to set data
6492  if ($conf->use_javascript_ajax && $adddateof) {
6493  $tmparray = dol_getdate($adddateof);
6494  if (empty($labeladddateof)) {
6495  $labeladddateof = $langs->trans("DateInvoice");
6496  }
6497  $retstring .= ' - <button class="dpInvisibleButtons datenowlink" id="dateofinvoice" type="button" name="_dateofinvoice" value="now" onclick="console.log(\'Click on now link\'); jQuery(\'#re\').val(\''.dol_print_date($adddateof, 'dayinputnoreduce').'\');jQuery(\'#reday\').val(\''.$tmparray['mday'].'\');jQuery(\'#remonth\').val(\''.$tmparray['mon'].'\');jQuery(\'#reyear\').val(\''.$tmparray['year'].'\');">'.$labeladddateof.'</a>';
6498  }
6499 
6500  return $retstring;
6501  }
6502 
6511  public function selectTypeDuration($prefix, $selected = 'i', $excludetypes = array())
6512  {
6513  global $langs;
6514 
6515  $TDurationTypes = array(
6516  'y'=>$langs->trans('Years'),
6517  'm'=>$langs->trans('Month'),
6518  'w'=>$langs->trans('Weeks'),
6519  'd'=>$langs->trans('Days'),
6520  'h'=>$langs->trans('Hours'),
6521  'i'=>$langs->trans('Minutes')
6522  );
6523 
6524  // Removed undesired duration types
6525  foreach ($excludetypes as $value) {
6526  unset($TDurationTypes[$value]);
6527  }
6528 
6529  $retstring = '<select class="flat" id="select_'.$prefix.'type_duration" name="'.$prefix.'type_duration">';
6530  foreach ($TDurationTypes as $key => $typeduration) {
6531  $retstring .= '<option value="'.$key.'"';
6532  if ($key == $selected) {
6533  $retstring .= " selected";
6534  }
6535  $retstring .= ">".$typeduration."</option>";
6536  }
6537  $retstring .= "</select>";
6538 
6539  $retstring .= ajax_combobox('select_'.$prefix.'type_duration');
6540 
6541  return $retstring;
6542  }
6543 
6544  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
6558  public function select_duration($prefix, $iSecond = '', $disabled = 0, $typehour = 'select', $minunderhours = 0, $nooutput = 0)
6559  {
6560  // phpcs:enable
6561  global $langs;
6562 
6563  $retstring = '';
6564 
6565  $hourSelected = 0;
6566  $minSelected = 0;
6567 
6568  // Hours
6569  if ($iSecond != '') {
6570  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/date.lib.php';
6571 
6572  $hourSelected = convertSecondToTime($iSecond, 'allhour');
6573  $minSelected = convertSecondToTime($iSecond, 'min');
6574  }
6575 
6576  if ($typehour == 'select') {
6577  $retstring .= '<select class="flat" id="select_'.$prefix.'hour" name="'.$prefix.'hour"'.($disabled ? ' disabled' : '').'>';
6578  for ($hour = 0; $hour < 25; $hour++) { // For a duration, we allow 24 hours
6579  $retstring .= '<option value="'.$hour.'"';
6580  if ($hourSelected == $hour) {
6581  $retstring .= " selected";
6582  }
6583  $retstring .= ">".$hour."</option>";
6584  }
6585  $retstring .= "</select>";
6586  } elseif ($typehour == 'text' || $typehour == 'textselect') {
6587  $retstring .= '<input placeholder="'.$langs->trans('HourShort').'" type="number" min="0" name="'.$prefix.'hour"'.($disabled ? ' disabled' : '').' class="flat maxwidth50 inputhour" value="'.(($hourSelected != '') ? ((int) $hourSelected) : '').'">';
6588  } else {
6589  return 'BadValueForParameterTypeHour';
6590  }
6591 
6592  if ($typehour != 'text') {
6593  $retstring .= ' '.$langs->trans('HourShort');
6594  } else {
6595  $retstring .= '<span class="hideonsmartphone">:</span>';
6596  }
6597 
6598  // Minutes
6599  if ($minunderhours) {
6600  $retstring .= '<br>';
6601  } else {
6602  $retstring .= '<span class="hideonsmartphone">&nbsp;</span>';
6603  }
6604 
6605  if ($typehour == 'select' || $typehour == 'textselect') {
6606  $retstring .= '<select class="flat" id="select_'.$prefix.'min" name="'.$prefix.'min"'.($disabled ? ' disabled' : '').'>';
6607  for ($min = 0; $min <= 55; $min = $min + 5) {
6608  $retstring .= '<option value="'.$min.'"';
6609  if ($minSelected == $min) {
6610  $retstring .= ' selected';
6611  }
6612  $retstring .= '>'.$min.'</option>';
6613  }
6614  $retstring .= "</select>";
6615  } elseif ($typehour == 'text') {
6616  $retstring .= '<input placeholder="'.$langs->trans('MinuteShort').'" type="number" min="0" name="'.$prefix.'min"'.($disabled ? ' disabled' : '').' class="flat maxwidth50 inputminute" value="'.(($minSelected != '') ? ((int) $minSelected) : '').'">';
6617  }
6618 
6619  if ($typehour != 'text') {
6620  $retstring .= ' '.$langs->trans('MinuteShort');
6621  }
6622 
6623  //$retstring.="&nbsp;";
6624 
6625  if (!empty($nooutput)) {
6626  return $retstring;
6627  }
6628 
6629  print $retstring;
6630  return;
6631  }
6632 
6652  public function selectTickets($selected = '', $htmlname = 'ticketid', $filtertype = '', $limit = 0, $status = 1, $selected_input_value = '', $hidelabel = 0, $ajaxoptions = array(), $socid = 0, $showempty = '1', $forcecombo = 0, $morecss = '', $selected_combinations = null, $nooutput = 0)
6653  {
6654  global $langs, $conf;
6655 
6656  $out = '';
6657 
6658  // check parameters
6659  if (is_null($ajaxoptions)) $ajaxoptions = array();
6660 
6661  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) && !empty($conf->global->TICKET_USE_SEARCH_TO_SELECT)) {
6662  $placeholder = '';
6663 
6664  if ($selected && empty($selected_input_value)) {
6665  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/ticket/class/ticket.class.php';
6666  $tickettmpselect = new Ticket($this->db);
6667  $tickettmpselect->fetch($selected);
6668  $selected_input_value = $tickettmpselect->ref;
6669  unset($tickettmpselect);
6670  }
6671 
6672  $out .= ajax_autocompleter($selected, $htmlname, DOL_URL_ROOT.'/ticket/ajax/tickets.php', $urloption, $conf->global->PRODUIT_USE_SEARCH_TO_SELECT, 1, $ajaxoptions);
6673 
6674  if (empty($hidelabel)) $out .= $langs->trans("RefOrLabel").' : ';
6675  elseif ($hidelabel > 1) {
6676  $placeholder = ' placeholder="'.$langs->trans("RefOrLabel").'"';
6677  if ($hidelabel == 2) {
6678  $out .= img_picto($langs->trans("Search"), 'search');
6679  }
6680  }
6681  $out .= '<input type="text" class="minwidth100" name="search_'.$htmlname.'" id="search_'.$htmlname.'" value="'.$selected_input_value.'"'.$placeholder.' '.(!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_SEARCH_AUTOFOCUS) ? 'autofocus' : '').' />';
6682  if ($hidelabel == 3) {
6683  $out .= img_picto($langs->trans("Search"), 'search');
6684  }
6685  } else {
6686  $out .= $this->selectTicketsList($selected, $htmlname, $filtertype, $limit, $status, 0, $socid, $showempty, $forcecombo, $morecss);
6687  }
6688 
6689  if (empty($nooutput)) print $out;
6690  else return $out;
6691  }
6692 
6693 
6710  public function selectTicketsList($selected = '', $htmlname = 'ticketid', $filtertype = '', $limit = 20, $filterkey = '', $status = 1, $outputmode = 0, $showempty = '1', $forcecombo = 0, $morecss = '')
6711  {
6712  global $langs, $conf, $user, $db;
6713 
6714  $out = '';
6715  $outarray = array();
6716 
6717  $selectFields = " p.rowid, p.ref, p.message";
6718 
6719  $sql = "SELECT ";
6720  $sql .= $selectFields;
6721  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."ticket as p";
6722  $sql .= ' WHERE p.entity IN ('.getEntity('ticket').')';
6723 
6724  // Add criteria on ref/label
6725  if ($filterkey != '') {
6726  $sql .= ' AND (';
6727  $prefix = empty($conf->global->TICKET_DONOTSEARCH_ANYWHERE) ? '%' : ''; // Can use index if PRODUCT_DONOTSEARCH_ANYWHERE is on
6728  // For natural search
6729  $scrit = explode(' ', $filterkey);
6730  $i = 0;
6731  if (count($scrit) > 1) $sql .= "(";
6732  foreach ($scrit as $crit) {
6733  if ($i > 0) $sql .= " AND ";
6734  $sql .= "(p.ref LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$crit)."%' OR p.subject LIKE '".$this->db->escape($prefix.$crit)."%'";
6735  $sql .= ")";
6736  $i++;
6737  }
6738  if (count($scrit) > 1) $sql .= ")";
6739  $sql .= ')';
6740  }
6741 
6742  $sql .= $this->db->plimit($limit, 0);
6743 
6744  // Build output string
6745  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::selectTicketsList search tickets", LOG_DEBUG);
6746  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
6747  if ($result) {
6748  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/ticket/class/ticket.class.php';
6749  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/ticket.lib.php';
6750 
6751  $num = $this->db->num_rows($result);
6752 
6753  $events = null;
6754 
6755  if (!$forcecombo) {
6756  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/ajax.lib.php';
6757  $out .= ajax_combobox($htmlname, $events, $conf->global->TICKET_USE_SEARCH_TO_SELECT);
6758  }
6759 
6760  $out .= '<select class="flat'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" name="'.$htmlname.'" id="'.$htmlname.'">';
6761 
6762  $textifempty = '';
6763  // Do not use textifempty = ' ' or '&nbsp;' here, or search on key will search on ' key'.
6764  //if (! empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) || $forcecombo) $textifempty='';
6765  if (!empty($conf->global->TICKET_USE_SEARCH_TO_SELECT)) {
6766  if ($showempty && !is_numeric($showempty)) $textifempty = $langs->trans($showempty);
6767  else $textifempty .= $langs->trans("All");
6768  } else {
6769  if ($showempty && !is_numeric($showempty)) $textifempty = $langs->trans($showempty);
6770  }
6771  if ($showempty) $out .= '<option value="0" selected>'.$textifempty.'</option>';
6772 
6773  $i = 0;
6774  while ($num && $i < $num) {
6775  $opt = '';
6776  $optJson = array();
6777  $objp = $this->db->fetch_object($result);
6778 
6779  $this->constructTicketListOption($objp, $opt, $optJson, $selected, $filterkey);
6780  // Add new entry
6781  // "key" value of json key array is used by jQuery automatically as selected value
6782  // "label" value of json key array is used by jQuery automatically as text for combo box
6783  $out .= $opt;
6784  array_push($outarray, $optJson);
6785 
6786  $i++;
6787  }
6788 
6789  $out .= '</select>';
6790 
6791  $this->db->free($result);
6792 
6793  if (empty($outputmode)) return $out;
6794  return $outarray;
6795  } else {
6796  dol_print_error($db);
6797  }
6798  }
6799 
6811  protected function constructTicketListOption(&$objp, &$opt, &$optJson, $selected, $filterkey = '')
6812  {
6813  global $langs, $conf, $user, $db;
6814 
6815  $outkey = '';
6816  $outval = '';
6817  $outref = '';
6818  $outlabel = '';
6819  $outtype = '';
6820 
6821  $label = $objp->label;
6822 
6823  $outkey = $objp->rowid;
6824  $outref = $objp->ref;
6825  $outlabel = $objp->label;
6826  $outtype = $objp->fk_product_type;
6827 
6828  $opt = '<option value="'.$objp->rowid.'"';
6829  $opt .= ($objp->rowid == $selected) ? ' selected' : '';
6830  $opt .= '>';
6831  $opt .= $objp->ref;
6832  $objRef = $objp->ref;
6833  if (!empty($filterkey) && $filterkey != '') $objRef = preg_replace('/('.preg_quote($filterkey, '/').')/i', '<strong>$1</strong>', $objRef, 1);
6834  $outval .= $objRef;
6835 
6836  $opt .= "</option>\n";
6837  $optJson = array('key'=>$outkey, 'value'=>$outref, 'type'=>$outtypem);
6838  }
6839 
6840 
6860  public function selectForForms($objectdesc, $htmlname, $preselectedvalue, $showempty = '', $searchkey = '', $placeholder = '', $morecss = '', $moreparams = '', $forcecombo = 0, $disabled = 0, $selected_input_value = '')
6861  {
6862  global $conf, $user;
6863 
6864  $objecttmp = null;
6865 
6866  $InfoFieldList = explode(":", $objectdesc);
6867  $classname = $InfoFieldList[0];
6868  $classpath = $InfoFieldList[1];
6869  $addcreatebuttonornot = empty($InfoFieldList[2]) ? 0 : $InfoFieldList[2];
6870  $filter = empty($InfoFieldList[3]) ? '' : $InfoFieldList[3];
6871  $sortfield = empty($InfoFieldList[4]) ? '' : $InfoFieldList[4];
6872 
6873  if (!empty($classpath)) {
6874  dol_include_once($classpath);
6875 
6876  if ($classname && class_exists($classname)) {
6877  $objecttmp = new $classname($this->db);
6878  // Make some replacement
6879  $sharedentities = getEntity(strtolower($classname));
6880  $objecttmp->filter = str_replace(
