6881  array('__ENTITY__', '__SHARED_ENTITIES__', '__USER_ID__'),
6882  array($conf->entity, $sharedentities, $user->id),
6883  $filter
6884  );
6885  }
6886  }
6887  if (!is_object($objecttmp)) {
6888  dol_syslog('Error bad setup of type for field '.$InfoFieldList, LOG_WARNING);
6889  return 'Error bad setup of type for field '.join(',', $InfoFieldList);
6890  }
6891 
6892  //var_dump($objecttmp->filter);
6893  $prefixforautocompletemode = $objecttmp->element;
6894  if ($prefixforautocompletemode == 'societe') {
6895  $prefixforautocompletemode = 'company';
6896  }
6897  if ($prefixforautocompletemode == 'product') {
6898  $prefixforautocompletemode = 'produit';
6899  }
6900  $confkeyforautocompletemode = strtoupper($prefixforautocompletemode).'_USE_SEARCH_TO_SELECT'; // For example COMPANY_USE_SEARCH_TO_SELECT
6901 
6902  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::selectForForms object->filter=".$objecttmp->filter, LOG_DEBUG);
6903  $out = '';
6904  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) && !empty($conf->global->$confkeyforautocompletemode) && !$forcecombo) {
6905  // No immediate load of all database
6906  $placeholder = '';
6907  if ($preselectedvalue && empty($selected_input_value)) {
6908  $objecttmp->fetch($preselectedvalue);
6909  $selected_input_value = ($prefixforautocompletemode == 'company' ? $objecttmp->name : $objecttmp->ref);
6910  //unset($objecttmp);
6911  }
6912 
6913  $objectdesc = $classname.':'.$classpath.':'.$addcreatebuttonornot.':'.$filter;
6914  $urlforajaxcall = DOL_URL_ROOT.'/core/ajax/selectobject.php';
6915 
6916  // No immediate load of all database
6917  $urloption = 'htmlname='.urlencode($htmlname).'&outjson=1&objectdesc='.urlencode($objectdesc).'&filter='.urlencode($objecttmp->filter).($sortfield ? '&sortfield='.urlencode($sortfield) : '');
6918  // Activate the auto complete using ajax call.
6919  $out .= ajax_autocompleter($preselectedvalue, $htmlname, $urlforajaxcall, $urloption, $conf->global->$confkeyforautocompletemode, 0, array());
6920  $out .= '<style type="text/css">.ui-autocomplete { z-index: 1003; }</style>';
6921  $out .= '<input type="text" class="'.$morecss.'"'.($disabled ? ' disabled="disabled"' : '').' name="search_'.$htmlname.'" id="search_'.$htmlname.'" value="'.$selected_input_value.'"'.($placeholder ? ' placeholder="'.dol_escape_htmltag($placeholder).'"' : '') .' />';
6922  } else {
6923  // Immediate load of table record. Note: filter is inside $objecttmp->filter
6924  $out .= $this->selectForFormsList($objecttmp, $htmlname, $preselectedvalue, $showempty, $searchkey, $placeholder, $morecss, $moreparams, $forcecombo, 0, $disabled, $sortfield);
6925  }
6926 
6927  return $out;
6928  }
6929 
6936  protected static function forgeCriteriaCallback($matches)
6937  {
6938  global $db;
6939 
6940  //dol_syslog("Convert matches ".$matches[1]);
6941  if (empty($matches[1])) {
6942  return '';
6943  }
6944  $tmp = explode(':', $matches[1]);
6945  if (count($tmp) < 3) {
6946  return '';
6947  }
6948 
6949  $tmpescaped = $tmp[2];
6950  $regbis = array();
6951  if (preg_match('/^\'(.*)\'$/', $tmpescaped, $regbis)) {
6952  $tmpescaped = "'".$db->escape($regbis[1])."'";
6953  } else {
6954  $tmpescaped = $db->escape($tmpescaped);
6955  }
6956  return $db->escape($tmp[0]).' '.strtoupper($db->escape($tmp[1]))." ".$tmpescaped;
6957  }
6958 
6978  public function selectForFormsList($objecttmp, $htmlname, $preselectedvalue, $showempty = '', $searchkey = '', $placeholder = '', $morecss = '', $moreparams = '', $forcecombo = 0, $outputmode = 0, $disabled = 0, $sortfield = '')
6979  {
6980  global $conf, $langs, $user, $hookmanager;
6981 
6982  //print "$objecttmp->filter, $htmlname, $preselectedvalue, $showempty = '', $searchkey = '', $placeholder = '', $morecss = '', $moreparams = '', $forcecombo = 0, $outputmode = 0, $disabled";
6983 
6984  $prefixforautocompletemode = $objecttmp->element;
6985  if ($prefixforautocompletemode == 'societe') {
6986  $prefixforautocompletemode = 'company';
6987  }
6988  $confkeyforautocompletemode = strtoupper($prefixforautocompletemode).'_USE_SEARCH_TO_SELECT'; // For example COMPANY_USE_SEARCH_TO_SELECT
6989 
6990  if (!empty($objecttmp->fields)) { // For object that declare it, it is better to use declared fields (like societe, contact, ...)
6991  $tmpfieldstoshow = '';
6992  foreach ($objecttmp->fields as $key => $val) {
6993  if (!dol_eval($val['enabled'], 1, 1)) {
6994  continue;
6995  }
6996  if (!empty($val['showoncombobox'])) {
6997  $tmpfieldstoshow .= ($tmpfieldstoshow ? ',' : '').'t.'.$key;
6998  }
6999  }
7000  if ($tmpfieldstoshow) {
7001  $fieldstoshow = $tmpfieldstoshow;
7002  }
7003  } else {
7004  // For backward compatibility
7005  $objecttmp->fields['ref'] = array('type'=>'varchar(30)', 'label'=>'Ref', 'showoncombobox'=>1);
7006  }
7007 
7008  if (empty($fieldstoshow)) {
7009  if (isset($objecttmp->fields['ref'])) {
7010  $fieldstoshow = 't.ref';
7011  } else {
7012  $langs->load("errors");
7013  $this->error = $langs->trans("ErrorNoFieldWithAttributeShowoncombobox");
7014  return $langs->trans('ErrorNoFieldWithAttributeShowoncombobox');
7015  }
7016  }
7017 
7018  $out = '';
7019  $outarray = array();
7020 
7021  $num = 0;
7022 
7023  // Search data
7024  $sql = "SELECT t.rowid, ".$fieldstoshow." FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$objecttmp->table_element." as t";
7025  if (isset($objecttmp->ismultientitymanaged)) {
7026  if (!is_numeric($objecttmp->ismultientitymanaged)) {
7027  $tmparray = explode('@', $objecttmp->ismultientitymanaged);
7028  $sql .= " INNER JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$tmparray[1]." as parenttable ON parenttable.rowid = t.".$tmparray[0];
7029  }
7030  if ($objecttmp->ismultientitymanaged === 'fk_soc@societe') {
7031  if (!$user->rights->societe->client->voir && !$user->socid) {
7032  $sql .= ", ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe_commerciaux as sc";
7033  }
7034  }
7035  }
7036 
7037  // Add where from hooks
7038  $parameters = array();
7039  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('selectForFormsListWhere', $parameters); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by hook
7040  if (!empty($hookmanager->resPrint)) {
7041  $sql .= $hookmanager->resPrint;
7042  } else {
7043  $sql .= " WHERE 1=1";
7044  if (isset($objecttmp->ismultientitymanaged)) {
7045  if ($objecttmp->ismultientitymanaged == 1) {
7046  $sql .= " AND t.entity IN (".getEntity($objecttmp->table_element).")";
7047  }
7048  if (!is_numeric($objecttmp->ismultientitymanaged)) {
7049  $sql .= " AND parenttable.entity = t.".$tmparray[0];
7050  }
7051  if ($objecttmp->ismultientitymanaged == 1 && !empty($user->socid)) {
7052  if ($objecttmp->element == 'societe') {
7053  $sql .= " AND t.rowid = ".((int) $user->socid);
7054  } else {
7055  $sql .= " AND t.fk_soc = ".((int) $user->socid);
7056  }
7057  }
7058  if ($objecttmp->ismultientitymanaged === 'fk_soc@societe') {
7059  if (!$user->rights->societe->client->voir && !$user->socid) {
7060  $sql .= " AND t.rowid = sc.fk_soc AND sc.fk_user = ".((int) $user->id);
7061  }
7062  }
7063  }
7064  if ($searchkey != '') {
7065  $sql .= natural_search(explode(',', $fieldstoshow), $searchkey);
7066  }
7067  if ($objecttmp->filter) { // Syntax example "(t.ref:like:'SO-%') and (t.date_creation:<:'20160101')"
7068  /*if (! DolibarrApi::_checkFilters($objecttmp->filter))
7069  {
7070  throw new RestException(503, 'Error when validating parameter sqlfilters '.$objecttmp->filter);
7071  }*/
7072  $regexstring = '\(([^:\'\(\)]+:[^:\'\(\)]+:[^\(\)]+)\)';
7073  $sql .= " AND (".preg_replace_callback('/'.$regexstring.'/', 'Form::forgeCriteriaCallback', $objecttmp->filter).")";
7074  }
7075  }
7076  $sql .= $this->db->order($sortfield ? $sortfield : $fieldstoshow, "ASC");
7077  //$sql.=$this->db->plimit($limit, 0);
7078  //print $sql;
7079 
7080  // Build output string
7081  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
7082  if ($resql) {
7083  // Construct $out and $outarray
7084  $out .= '<select id="'.$htmlname.'" class="flat'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'"'.($disabled ? ' disabled="disabled"' : '').($moreparams ? ' '.$moreparams : '').' name="'.$htmlname.'">'."\n";
7085 
7086  // Warning: Do not use textifempty = ' ' or '&nbsp;' here, or search on key will search on ' key'. Seems it is no more true with selec2 v4
7087  $textifempty = '&nbsp;';
7088 
7089  //if (! empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) || $forcecombo) $textifempty='';
7090  if (!empty($conf->global->$confkeyforautocompletemode)) {
7091  if ($showempty && !is_numeric($showempty)) {
7092  $textifempty = $langs->trans($showempty);
7093  } else {
7094  $textifempty .= $langs->trans("All");
7095  }
7096  }
7097  if ($showempty) {
7098  $out .= '<option value="-1">'.$textifempty.'</option>'."\n";
7099  }
7100 
7101  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
7102  $i = 0;
7103  if ($num) {
7104  while ($i < $num) {
7105  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
7106  $label = '';
7107  $tmparray = explode(',', $fieldstoshow);
7108  $oldvalueforshowoncombobox = 0;
7109  foreach ($tmparray as $key => $val) {
7110  $val = preg_replace('/t\./', '', $val);
7111  $label .= (($label && $obj->$val) ? ($oldvalueforshowoncombobox != $objecttmp->fields[$val]['showoncombobox'] ? ' - ' : ' ') : '');
7112  $label .= $obj->$val;
7113  $oldvalueforshowoncombobox = $objecttmp->fields[$val]['showoncombobox'];
7114  }
7115  if (empty($outputmode)) {
7116  if ($preselectedvalue > 0 && $preselectedvalue == $obj->rowid) {
7117  $out .= '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'" selected>'.$label.'</option>';
7118  } else {
7119  $out .= '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'">'.$label.'</option>';
7120  }
7121  } else {
7122  array_push($outarray, array('key'=>$obj->rowid, 'value'=>$label, 'label'=>$label));
7123  }
7124 
7125  $i++;
7126  if (($i % 10) == 0) {
7127  $out .= "\n";
7128  }
7129  }
7130  }
7131 
7132  $out .= '</select>'."\n";
7133 
7134  if (!$forcecombo) {
7135  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/ajax.lib.php';
7136  $out .= ajax_combobox($htmlname, null, (!empty($conf->global->$confkeyforautocompletemode) ? $conf->global->$confkeyforautocompletemode : 0));
7137  }
7138  } else {
7139  dol_print_error($this->db);
7140  }
7141 
7142  $this->result = array('nbofelement'=>$num);
7143 
7144  if ($outputmode) {
7145  return $outarray;
7146  }
7147  return $out;
7148  }
7149 
7150 
7174  public static function selectarray($htmlname, $array, $id = '', $show_empty = 0, $key_in_label = 0, $value_as_key = 0, $moreparam = '', $translate = 0, $maxlen = 0, $disabled = 0, $sort = '', $morecss = '', $addjscombo = 1, $moreparamonempty = '', $disablebademail = 0, $nohtmlescape = 0)
7175  {
7176  global $conf, $langs;
7177 
7178  // Do we want a multiselect ?
7179  //$jsbeautify = 0;
7180  //if (preg_match('/^multi/',$htmlname)) $jsbeautify = 1;
7181  $jsbeautify = 1;
7182 
7183  if ($value_as_key) {
7184  $array = array_combine($array, $array);
7185  }
7186 
7187  $out = '';
7188 
7189  if ($addjscombo < 0) {
7190  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_OPTIMIZEFORTEXTBROWSER)) {
7191  $addjscombo = 1;
7192  } else {
7193  $addjscombo = 0;
7194  }
7195  }
7196 
7197  // Add code for jquery to use multiselect
7198  if ($addjscombo && $jsbeautify) {
7199  // Enhance with select2
7200  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/ajax.lib.php';
7201  $out .= ajax_combobox($htmlname, array(), 0, 0, 'resolve', $show_empty < 0 ? (string) $show_empty : '-1');
7202  }
7203 
7204  $out .= '<select id="'.preg_replace('/^\./', '', $htmlname).'" '.($disabled ? 'disabled="disabled" ' : '').'class="flat '.(preg_replace('/^\./', '', $htmlname)).($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'"';
7205  $out .= ' name="'.preg_replace('/^\./', '', $htmlname).'" '.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '');
7206  $out .= '>';
7207 
7208  if ($show_empty) {
7209  $textforempty = ' ';
7210  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax)) {
7211  $textforempty = '&nbsp;'; // If we use ajaxcombo, we need &nbsp; here to avoid to have an empty element that is too small.
7212  }
7213  if (!is_numeric($show_empty)) {
7214  $textforempty = $show_empty;
7215  }
7216  $out .= '<option class="optiongrey" '.($moreparamonempty ? $moreparamonempty.' ' : '').'value="'.($show_empty < 0 ? $show_empty : -1).'"'.($id == $show_empty ? ' selected' : '').'>'.$textforempty.'</option>'."\n";
7217  }
7218 
7219  if (is_array($array)) {
7220  // Translate
7221  if ($translate) {
7222  foreach ($array as $key => $value) {
7223  if (!is_array($value)) {
7224  $array[$key] = $langs->trans($value);
7225  } else {
7226  $array[$key]['label'] = $langs->trans($value['label']);
7227  }
7228  }
7229  }
7230 
7231  // Sort
7232  if ($sort == 'ASC') {
7233  asort($array);
7234  } elseif ($sort == 'DESC') {
7235  arsort($array);
7236  }
7237 
7238  foreach ($array as $key => $tmpvalue) {
7239  if (is_array($tmpvalue)) {
7240  $value = $tmpvalue['label'];
7241  $disabled = empty($tmpvalue['disabled']) ? '' : ' disabled';
7242  $style = empty($tmpvalue['css']) ? ' class="'.$tmpvalue['css'].'"' : '';
7243  } else {
7244  $value = $tmpvalue;
7245  $disabled = '';
7246  $style = '';
7247  }
7248  if (!empty($disablebademail)) {
7249  if (($disablebademail == 1 && !preg_match('/&lt;.+@.+&gt;/', $value))
7250  || ($disablebademail == 2 && preg_match('/---/', $value))) {
7251  $disabled = ' disabled';
7252  $style = ' class="warning"';
7253  }
7254  }
7255 
7256  if ($key_in_label) {
7257  if (empty($nohtmlescape)) {
7258  $selectOptionValue = dol_escape_htmltag($key.' - '.($maxlen ?dol_trunc($value, $maxlen) : $value));
7259  } else {
7260  $selectOptionValue = $key.' - '.($maxlen ?dol_trunc($value, $maxlen) : $value);
7261  }
7262  } else {
7263  if (empty($nohtmlescape)) {
7264  $selectOptionValue = dol_escape_htmltag($maxlen ?dol_trunc($value, $maxlen) : $value);
7265  } else {
7266  $selectOptionValue = $maxlen ?dol_trunc($value, $maxlen) : $value;
7267  }
7268  if ($value == '' || $value == '-') {
7269  $selectOptionValue = '&nbsp;';
7270  }
7271  }
7272 
7273  $out .= '<option value="'.$key.'"';
7274  $out .= $style.$disabled;
7275  if (is_array($id)) {
7276  if (in_array($key, $id) && !$disabled) {
7277  $out .= ' selected'; // To preselect a value
7278  }
7279  } else {
7280  $id = (string) $id; // if $id = 0, then $id = '0'
7281  if ($id != '' && $id == $key && !$disabled) {
7282  $out .= ' selected'; // To preselect a value
7283  }
7284  }
7285  if ($nohtmlescape) {
7286  $out .= ' data-html="'.dol_escape_htmltag($selectOptionValue).'"';
7287  }
7288  if (is_array($tmpvalue)) {
7289  foreach ($tmpvalue as $keyforvalue => $valueforvalue) {
7290  if (preg_match('/^data-/', $keyforvalue)) {
7291  $out .= ' '.$keyforvalue.'="'.$valueforvalue.'"';
7292  }
7293  }
7294  }
7295  $out .= '>';
7296  //var_dump($selectOptionValue);
7297  $out .= $selectOptionValue;
7298  $out .= "</option>\n";
7299  }
7300  }
7301 
7302  $out .= "</select>";
7303  return $out;
7304  }
7305 
7306 
7325  public static function selectArrayAjax($htmlname, $url, $id = '', $moreparam = '', $moreparamtourl = '', $disabled = 0, $minimumInputLength = 1, $morecss = '', $callurlonselect = 0, $placeholder = '', $acceptdelayedhtml = 0)
7326  {
7327  global $conf, $langs;
7328  global $delayedhtmlcontent; // Will be used later outside of this function
7329 
7330  // TODO Use an internal dolibarr component instead of select2
7331  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_USE_JQUERY_MULTISELECT) && !defined('REQUIRE_JQUERY_MULTISELECT')) {
7332  return '';
7333  }
7334 
7335  $out = '<select type="text" class="'.$htmlname.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" '.($moreparam ? $moreparam.' ' : '').'name="'.$htmlname.'"></select>';
7336 
7337  $outdelayed = '';
7338  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax)) {
7339  $tmpplugin = 'select2';
7340  $outdelayed = "\n".'<!-- JS CODE TO ENABLE '.$tmpplugin.' for id '.$htmlname.' -->
7341  <script>
7342  $(document).ready(function () {
7343 
7344  '.($callurlonselect ? 'var saveRemoteData = [];' : '').'
7345 
7346  $(".'.$htmlname.'").select2({
7347  ajax: {
7348  dir: "ltr",
7349  url: "'.$url.'",
7350  dataType: \'json\',
7351  delay: 250,
7352  data: function (params) {
7353  return {
7354  q: params.term, // search term
7355  page: params.page
7356  };
7357  },
7358  processResults: function (data) {
7359  // parse the results into the format expected by Select2.
7360  // since we are using custom formatting functions we do not need to alter the remote JSON data
7361  //console.log(data);
7362  saveRemoteData = data;
7363  /* format json result for select2 */
7364  result = []
7365  $.each( data, function( key, value ) {
7366  result.push({id: key, text: value.text});
7367  });
7368  //return {results:[{id:\'none\', text:\'aa\'}, {id:\'rrr\', text:\'Red\'},{id:\'bbb\', text:\'Search a into projects\'}], more:false}
7369  //console.log(result);
7370  return {results: result, more: false}
7371  },
7372  cache: true
7373  },
7374  language: select2arrayoflanguage,
7375  containerCssClass: \':all:\', /* Line to add class of origin SELECT propagated to the new <span class="select2-selection...> tag */
7376  placeholder: "'.dol_escape_js($placeholder).'",
7377  escapeMarkup: function (markup) { return markup; }, // let our custom formatter work
7378  minimumInputLength: '.$minimumInputLength.',
7379  formatResult: function(result, container, query, escapeMarkup) {
7380  return escapeMarkup(result.text);
7381  },
7382  });
7383 
7384  '.($callurlonselect ? '
7385  /* Code to execute a GET when we select a value */
7386  $(".'.$htmlname.'").change(function() {
7387  var selected = $(".'.$htmlname.'").val();
7388  console.log("We select in selectArrayAjax the entry "+selected)
7389  $(".'.$htmlname.'").val(""); /* reset visible combo value */
7390  $.each( saveRemoteData, function( key, value ) {
7391  if (key == selected)
7392  {
7393  console.log("selectArrayAjax - Do a redirect to "+value.url)
7394  location.assign(value.url);
7395  }
7396  });
7397  });' : '').'
7398 
7399  });
7400  </script>';
7401  }
7402 
7403  if ($acceptdelayedhtml) {
7404  $delayedhtmlcontent .= $outdelayed;
7405  } else {
7406  $out .= $outdelayed;
7407  }
7408  return $out;
7409  }
7410 
7429  public static function selectArrayFilter($htmlname, $array, $id = '', $moreparam = '', $disableFiltering = 0, $disabled = 0, $minimumInputLength = 1, $morecss = '', $callurlonselect = 0, $placeholder = '', $acceptdelayedhtml = 0)
7430  {
7431  global $conf, $langs;
7432  global $delayedhtmlcontent; // Will be used later outside of this function
7433 
7434  // TODO Use an internal dolibarr component instead of select2
7435  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_USE_JQUERY_MULTISELECT) && !defined('REQUIRE_JQUERY_MULTISELECT')) {
7436  return '';
7437  }
7438 
7439  $out = '<select type="text" class="'.$htmlname.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" '.($moreparam ? $moreparam.' ' : '').'name="'.$htmlname.'"><option></option></select>';
7440 
7441  $formattedarrayresult = array();
7442 
7443  foreach ($array as $key => $value) {
7444  $o = new stdClass();
7445  $o->id = $key;
7446  $o->text = $value['text'];
7447  $o->url = $value['url'];
7448  $formattedarrayresult[] = $o;
7449  }
7450 
7451  $outdelayed = '';
7452  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax)) {
7453  $tmpplugin = 'select2';
7454  $outdelayed = "\n".'<!-- JS CODE TO ENABLE '.$tmpplugin.' for id '.$htmlname.' -->
7455  <script>
7456  $(document).ready(function () {
7457  var data = '.json_encode($formattedarrayresult).';
7458 
7459  '.($callurlonselect ? 'var saveRemoteData = '.json_encode($array).';' : '').'
7460 
7461  $(".'.$htmlname.'").select2({
7462  data: data,
7463  language: select2arrayoflanguage,
7464  containerCssClass: \':all:\', /* Line to add class of origin SELECT propagated to the new <span class="select2-selection...> tag */
7465  placeholder: "'.dol_escape_js($placeholder).'",
7466  escapeMarkup: function (markup) { return markup; }, // let our custom formatter work
7467  minimumInputLength: '.$minimumInputLength.',
7468  formatResult: function(result, container, query, escapeMarkup) {
7469  return escapeMarkup(result.text);
7470  },
7471  matcher: function (params, data) {
7472 
7473  if(! data.id) return null;';
7474 
7475  if ($callurlonselect) {
7476  $outdelayed .= '
7477 
7478  var urlBase = data.url;
7479  var separ = urlBase.indexOf("?") >= 0 ? "&" : "?";
7480  /* console.log("params.term="+params.term); */
7481  /* console.log("params.term encoded="+encodeURIComponent(params.term)); */
7482  saveRemoteData[data.id].url = urlBase + separ + "sall=" + encodeURIComponent(params.term.replace(/\"/g, ""));';
7483  }
7484 
7485  if (!$disableFiltering) {
7486  $outdelayed .= '
7487 
7488  if(data.text.match(new RegExp(params.term))) {
7489  return data;
7490  }
7491 
7492  return null;';
7493  } else {
7494  $outdelayed .= '
7495 
7496  return data;';
7497  }
7498 
7499  $outdelayed .= '
7500  }
7501  });
7502 
7503  '.($callurlonselect ? '
7504  /* Code to execute a GET when we select a value */
7505  $(".'.$htmlname.'").change(function() {
7506  var selected = $(".'.$htmlname.'").val();
7507  console.log("We select "+selected)
7508 
7509  $(".'.$htmlname.'").val(""); /* reset visible combo value */
7510  $.each( saveRemoteData, function( key, value ) {
7511  if (key == selected)
7512  {
7513  console.log("selectArrayFilter - Do a redirect to "+value.url)
7514  location.assign(value.url);
7515  }
7516  });
7517  });' : '').'
7518 
7519  });
7520  </script>';
7521  }
7522 
7523  if ($acceptdelayedhtml) {
7524  $delayedhtmlcontent .= $outdelayed;
7525  } else {
7526  $out .= $outdelayed;
7527  }
7528  return $out;
7529  }
7530 
7549  public static function multiselectarray($htmlname, $array, $selected = array(), $key_in_label = 0, $value_as_key = 0, $morecss = '', $translate = 0, $width = 0, $moreattrib = '', $elemtype = '', $placeholder = '', $addjscombo = -1)
7550  {
7551  global $conf, $langs;
7552 
7553  $out = '';
7554 
7555  if ($addjscombo < 0) {
7556  if (empty($conf->global->MAIN_OPTIMIZEFORTEXTBROWSER)) {
7557  $addjscombo = 1;
7558  } else {
7559  $addjscombo = 0;
7560  }
7561  }
7562 
7563  // Add code for jquery to use multiselect
7564  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) && !empty($conf->global->MAIN_USE_JQUERY_MULTISELECT) || defined('REQUIRE_JQUERY_MULTISELECT')) {
7565  $out .= "\n".'<!-- JS CODE TO ENABLE select for id '.$htmlname.', addjscombo='.$addjscombo.' -->';
7566  $out .= "\n".'<script>'."\n";
7567  if ($addjscombo == 1) {
7568  $tmpplugin = empty($conf->global->MAIN_USE_JQUERY_MULTISELECT) ?constant('REQUIRE_JQUERY_MULTISELECT') : $conf->global->MAIN_USE_JQUERY_MULTISELECT;
7569  $out .= 'function formatResult(record) {'."\n";
7570  if ($elemtype == 'category') {
7571  $out .= 'return \'<span><img src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/theme/eldy/img/object_category.png"> \'+record.text+\'</span>\';';
7572  } else {
7573  $out .= 'return record.text;';
7574  }
7575  $out .= '};'."\n";
7576  $out .= 'function formatSelection(record) {'."\n";
7577  if ($elemtype == 'category') {
7578  $out .= 'return \'<span><img src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/theme/eldy/img/object_category.png"> \'+record.text+\'</span>\';';
7579  } else {
7580  $out .= 'return record.text;';
7581  }
7582  $out .= '};'."\n";
7583  $out .= '$(document).ready(function () {
7584  $(\'#'.$htmlname.'\').'.$tmpplugin.'({
7585  dir: \'ltr\',
7586  // Specify format function for dropdown item
7587  formatResult: formatResult,
7588  templateResult: formatResult, /* For 4.0 */
7589  // Specify format function for selected item
7590  formatSelection: formatSelection,
7591  templateSelection: formatSelection /* For 4.0 */
7592  });
7593 
7594  /* Add also morecss to the css .select2 that is after the #htmlname, for component that are show dynamically after load, because select2 set
7595  the size only if component is not hidden by default on load */
7596  $(\'#'.$htmlname.' + .select2\').addClass(\''.$morecss.'\');
7597  });'."\n";
7598  } elseif ($addjscombo == 2 && !defined('DISABLE_MULTISELECT')) {
7599  // Add other js lib
7600  // TODO external lib multiselect/jquery.multi-select.js must have been loaded to use this multiselect plugin
7601  // ...
7602  $out .= 'console.log(\'addjscombo=2 for htmlname='.$htmlname.'\');';
7603  $out .= '$(document).ready(function () {
7604  $(\'#'.$htmlname.'\').multiSelect({
7605  containerHTML: \'<div class="multi-select-container">\',
7606  menuHTML: \'<div class="multi-select-menu">\',
7607  buttonHTML: \'<span class="multi-select-button '.$morecss.'">\',
7608  menuItemHTML: \'<label class="multi-select-menuitem">\',
7609  activeClass: \'multi-select-container--open\',
7610  noneText: \''.$placeholder.'\'
7611  });
7612  })';
7613  }
7614  $out .= '</script>';
7615  }
7616 
7617  // Try also magic suggest
7618  $out .= '<select id="'.$htmlname.'" class="multiselect'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" multiple name="'.$htmlname.'[]"'.($moreattrib ? ' '.$moreattrib : '').($width ? ' style="width: '.(preg_match('/%/', $width) ? $width : $width.'px').'"' : '').'>'."\n";
7619  if (is_array($array) && !empty($array)) {
7620  if ($value_as_key) {
7621  $array = array_combine($array, $array);
7622  }
7623 
7624  if (!empty($array)) {
7625  foreach ($array as $key => $value) {
7626  $newval = ($translate ? $langs->trans($value) : $value);
7627  $newval = ($key_in_label ? $key.' - '.$newval : $newval);
7628 
7629  $out .= '<option value="'.$key.'"';
7630  if (is_array($selected) && !empty($selected) && in_array((string) $key, $selected) && ((string) $key != '')) {
7631  $out .= ' selected';
7632  }
7633  $out .= ' data-html="'.dol_escape_htmltag($newval).'"';
7634  $out .= '>';
7635  $out .= dol_htmlentitiesbr($newval);
7636  $out .= '</option>'."\n";
7637  }
7638  }
7639  }
7640  $out .= '</select>'."\n";
7641 
7642  return $out;
7643  }
7644 
7645 
7655  public static function multiSelectArrayWithCheckbox($htmlname, &$array, $varpage)
7656  {
7657  global $conf, $langs, $user, $extrafields;
7658 
7659  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_OPTIMIZEFORTEXTBROWSER)) {
7660  return '';
7661  }
7662 
7663  $tmpvar = "MAIN_SELECTEDFIELDS_".$varpage; // To get list of saved selected fields to show
7664 
7665  if (!empty($user->conf->$tmpvar)) { // A list of fields was already customized for user
7666  $tmparray = explode(',', $user->conf->$tmpvar);
7667  foreach ($array as $key => $val) {
7668  //var_dump($key);
7669  //var_dump($tmparray);
7670  if (in_array($key, $tmparray)) {
7671  $array[$key]['checked'] = 1;
7672  } else {
7673  $array[$key]['checked'] = 0;
7674  }
7675  }
7676  } else { // There is no list of fields already customized for user
7677  foreach ($array as $key => $val) {
7678  if ($array[$key]['checked'] < 0) {
7679  $array[$key]['checked'] = 0;
7680  }
7681  }
7682  }
7683 
7684  $listoffieldsforselection = '';
7685  $listcheckedstring = '';
7686 
7687  foreach ($array as $key => $val) {
7688  /* var_dump($val);
7689  var_dump(array_key_exists('enabled', $val));
7690  var_dump(!$val['enabled']);*/
7691  if (array_key_exists('enabled', $val) && isset($val['enabled']) && !$val['enabled']) {
7692  unset($array[$key]); // We don't want this field
7693  continue;
7694  }
7695  if (!empty($val['type']) && $val['type'] == 'separate') {
7696  // Field remains in array but we don't add it into $listoffieldsforselection
7697  //$listoffieldsforselection .= '<li>-----</li>';
7698  continue;
7699  }
7700  if ($val['label']) {
7701  if (!empty($val['langfile']) && is_object($langs)) {
7702  $langs->load($val['langfile']);
7703  }
7704 
7705  // Note: $val['checked'] <> 0 means we must show the field into the combo list
7706  $listoffieldsforselection .= '<li><input type="checkbox" id="checkbox'.$key.'" value="'.$key.'"'.((empty($val['checked']) && $val['checked'] != '-1') ? '' : ' checked="checked"').'/><label for="checkbox'.$key.'">'.dol_escape_htmltag($langs->trans($val['label'])).'</label></li>';
7707  $listcheckedstring .= (empty($val['checked']) ? '' : $key.',');
7708  }
7709  }
7710 
7711  $out = '<!-- Component multiSelectArrayWithCheckbox '.$htmlname.' -->
7712 
7713  <dl class="dropdown">
7714  <dt>
7715  <a href="#'.$htmlname.'">
7716  '.img_picto('', 'list').'
7717  </a>
7718  <input type="hidden" class="'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'" value="'.$listcheckedstring.'">
7719  </dt>
7720  <dd class="dropdowndd">
7721  <div class="multiselectcheckbox'.$htmlname.'">
7722  <ul class="ul'.$htmlname.'">
7723  '.$listoffieldsforselection.'
7724  </ul>
7725  </div>
7726  </dd>
7727  </dl>
7728 
7729  <script type="text/javascript">
7730  jQuery(document).ready(function () {
7731  $(\'.multiselectcheckbox'.$htmlname.' input[type="checkbox"]\').on(\'click\', function () {
7732  console.log("A new field was added/removed, we edit field input[name=formfilteraction]");
7733 
7734  $("input:hidden[name=formfilteraction]").val(\'listafterchangingselectedfields\'); // Update field so we know we changed something on selected fields after POST
7735 
7736  var title = $(this).val() + ",";
7737  if ($(this).is(\':checked\')) {
7738  $(\'.'.$htmlname.'\').val(title + $(\'.'.$htmlname.'\').val());
7739  }
7740  else {
7741  $(\'.'.$htmlname.'\').val( $(\'.'.$htmlname.'\').val().replace(title, \'\') )
7742  }
7743  // Now, we submit page
7744  //$(this).parents(\'form:first\').submit();
7745  });
7746 
7747 
7748  });
7749  </script>
7750 
7751  ';
7752  return $out;
7753  }
7754 
7764  public function showCategories($id, $type, $rendermode = 0, $nolink = 0)
7765  {
7766  global $db;
7767 
7768  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/categories/class/categorie.class.php';
7769 
7770  $cat = new Categorie($db);
7771  $categories = $cat->containing($id, $type);
7772 
7773  if ($rendermode == 1) {
7774  $toprint = array();
7775  foreach ($categories as $c) {
7776  $ways = $c->print_all_ways(' &gt;&gt; ', ($nolink ? 'none' : ''), 0, 1); // $ways[0] = "ccc2 >> ccc2a >> ccc2a1" with html formated text
7777  foreach ($ways as $way) {
7778  $toprint[] = '<li class="select2-search-choice-dolibarr noborderoncategories"'.($c->color ? ' style="background: #'.$c->color.';"' : ' style="background: #bbb"').'>'.$way.'</li>';
7779  }
7780  }
7781  return '<div class="select2-container-multi-dolibarr" style="width: 90%;"><ul class="select2-choices-dolibarr">'.implode(' ', $toprint).'</ul></div>';
7782  }
7783 
7784  if ($rendermode == 0) {
7785  $arrayselected = array();
7786  $cate_arbo = $this->select_all_categories($type, '', 'parent', 64, 0, 1);
7787  foreach ($categories as $c) {
7788  $arrayselected[] = $c->id;
7789  }
7790 
7791  return $this->multiselectarray('categories', $cate_arbo, $arrayselected, '', 0, '', 0, '100%', 'disabled', 'category');
7792  }
7793 
7794  return 'ErrorBadValueForParameterRenderMode'; // Should not happened
7795  }
7796 
7805  public function showLinkedObjectBlock($object, $morehtmlright = '', $compatibleImportElementsList = false)
7806  {
7807  global $conf, $langs, $hookmanager;
7808  global $bc, $action;
7809 
7810  $object->fetchObjectLinked();
7811 
7812  // Bypass the default method
7813  $hookmanager->initHooks(array('commonobject'));
7814  $parameters = array(
7815  'morehtmlright' => $morehtmlright,
7816  'compatibleImportElementsList' => &$compatibleImportElementsList,
7817  );
7818  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('showLinkedObjectBlock', $parameters, $object, $action); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by hook
7819 
7820  if (empty($reshook)) {
7821  $nbofdifferenttypes = count($object->linkedObjects);
7822 
7823  print '<!-- showLinkedObjectBlock -->';
7824  print load_fiche_titre($langs->trans('RelatedObjects'), $morehtmlright, '', 0, 0, 'showlinkedobjectblock');
7825 
7826 
7827  print '<div class="div-table-responsive-no-min">';
7828  print '<table class="noborder allwidth" data-block="showLinkedObject" data-element="'.$object->element.'" data-elementid="'.$object->id.'" >';
7829 
7830  print '<tr class="liste_titre">';
7831  print '<td>'.$langs->trans("Type").'</td>';
7832  print '<td>'.$langs->trans("Ref").'</td>';
7833  print '<td class="center"></td>';
7834  print '<td class="center">'.$langs->trans("Date").'</td>';
7835  print '<td class="right">'.$langs->trans("AmountHTShort").'</td>';
7836  print '<td class="right">'.$langs->trans("Status").'</td>';
7837  print '<td></td>';
7838  print '</tr>';
7839 
7840  $nboftypesoutput = 0;
7841 
7842  foreach ($object->linkedObjects as $objecttype => $objects) {
7843  $tplpath = $element = $subelement = $objecttype;
7844 
7845  // to display inport button on tpl
7846  $showImportButton = false;
7847  if (!empty($compatibleImportElementsList) && in_array($element, $compatibleImportElementsList)) {
7848  $showImportButton = true;
7849  }
7850 
7851  $regs = array();
7852  if ($objecttype != 'supplier_proposal' && preg_match('/^([^_]+)_([^_]+)/i', $objecttype, $regs)) {
7853  $element = $regs[1];
7854  $subelement = $regs[2];
7855  $tplpath = $element.'/'.$subelement;
7856  }
7857  $tplname = 'linkedobjectblock';
7858 
7859  // To work with non standard path
7860  if ($objecttype == 'facture') {
7861  $tplpath = 'compta/'.$element;
7862  if (empty($conf->facture->enabled)) {
7863  continue; // Do not show if module disabled
7864  }
7865  } elseif ($objecttype == 'facturerec') {
7866  $tplpath = 'compta/facture';
7867  $tplname = 'linkedobjectblockForRec';
7868  if (empty($conf->facture->enabled)) {
7869  continue; // Do not show if module disabled
7870  }
7871  } elseif ($objecttype == 'propal') {
7872  $tplpath = 'comm/'.$element;
7873  if (empty($conf->propal->enabled)) {
7874  continue; // Do not show if module disabled
7875  }
7876  } elseif ($objecttype == 'supplier_proposal') {
7877  if (empty($conf->supplier_proposal->enabled)) {
7878  continue; // Do not show if module disabled
7879  }
7880  } elseif ($objecttype == 'shipping' || $objecttype == 'shipment') {
7881  $tplpath = 'expedition';
7882  if (empty($conf->expedition->enabled)) {
7883  continue; // Do not show if module disabled
7884  }
7885  } elseif ($objecttype == 'reception') {
7886  $tplpath = 'reception';
7887  if (empty($conf->reception->enabled)) {
7888  continue; // Do not show if module disabled
7889  }
7890  } elseif ($objecttype == 'delivery') {
7891  $tplpath = 'delivery';
7892  if (empty($conf->expedition->enabled)) {
7893  continue; // Do not show if module disabled
7894  }
7895  } elseif ($objecttype == 'mo') {
7896  $tplpath = 'mrp/mo';
7897  if (empty($conf->mrp->enabled)) {
7898  continue; // Do not show if module disabled
7899  }
7900  } elseif ($objecttype == 'ficheinter') {
7901  $tplpath = 'fichinter';
7902  if (empty($conf->ficheinter->enabled)) {
7903  continue; // Do not show if module disabled
7904  }
7905  } elseif ($objecttype == 'invoice_supplier') {
7906  $tplpath = 'fourn/facture';
7907  } elseif ($objecttype == 'order_supplier') {
7908  $tplpath = 'fourn/commande';
7909  } elseif ($objecttype == 'expensereport') {
7910  $tplpath = 'expensereport';
7911  } elseif ($objecttype == 'subscription') {
7912  $tplpath = 'adherents';
7913  } elseif ($objecttype == 'conferenceorbooth') {
7914  $tplpath = 'eventorganization';
7915  } elseif ($objecttype == 'conferenceorboothattendee') {
7916  $tplpath = 'eventorganization';
7917  } elseif ($objecttype == 'mo') {
7918  $tplpath = 'mrp';
7919  if (empty($conf->mrp->enabled)) {
7920  continue; // Do not show if module disabled
7921  }
7922  }
7923 
7924  global $linkedObjectBlock;
7925  $linkedObjectBlock = $objects;
7926 
7927  // Output template part (modules that overwrite templates must declare this into descriptor)
7928  $dirtpls = array_merge($conf->modules_parts['tpl'], array('/'.$tplpath.'/tpl'));
7929  foreach ($dirtpls as $reldir) {
7930  if ($nboftypesoutput == ($nbofdifferenttypes - 1)) { // No more type to show after
7931  global $noMoreLinkedObjectBlockAfter;
7932  $noMoreLinkedObjectBlockAfter = 1;
7933  }
7934 
7935  $res = @include dol_buildpath($reldir.'/'.$tplname.'.tpl.php');
7936  if ($res) {
7937  $nboftypesoutput++;
7938  break;
7939  }
7940  }
7941  }
7942 
7943  if (!$nboftypesoutput) {
7944  print '<tr><td class="impair" colspan="7"><span class="opacitymedium">'.$langs->trans("None").'</span></td></tr>';
7945  }
7946 
7947  print '</table>';
7948 
7949  if (!empty($compatibleImportElementsList)) {
7950  $res = @include dol_buildpath('core/tpl/ajax/objectlinked_lineimport.tpl.php');
7951  }
7952 
7953 
7954  print '</div>';
7955 
7956  return $nbofdifferenttypes;
7957  }
7958  }
7959 
7968  public function showLinkToObjectBlock($object, $restrictlinksto = array(), $excludelinksto = array())
7969  {
7970  global $conf, $langs, $hookmanager;
7971  global $bc, $action;
7972 
7973  $linktoelem = '';
7974  $linktoelemlist = '';
7975  $listofidcompanytoscan = '';
7976 
7977  if (!is_object($object->thirdparty)) {
7978  $object->fetch_thirdparty();
7979  }
7980 
7981  $possiblelinks = array();
7982  if (is_object($object->thirdparty) && !empty($object->thirdparty->id) && $object->thirdparty->id > 0) {
7983  $listofidcompanytoscan = $object->thirdparty->id;
7984  if (($object->thirdparty->parent > 0) && !empty($conf->global->THIRDPARTY_INCLUDE_PARENT_IN_LINKTO)) {
7985  $listofidcompanytoscan .= ','.$object->thirdparty->parent;
7986  }
7987  if (($object->fk_project > 0) && !empty($conf->global->THIRDPARTY_INCLUDE_PROJECT_THIRDPARY_IN_LINKTO)) {
7988  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/projet/class/project.class.php';
7989  $tmpproject = new Project($this->db);
7990  $tmpproject->fetch($object->fk_project);
7991  if ($tmpproject->socid > 0 && ($tmpproject->socid != $object->thirdparty->id)) {
7992  $listofidcompanytoscan .= ','.$tmpproject->socid;
7993  }
7994  unset($tmpproject);
7995  }
7996 
7997  $possiblelinks = array(
7998  'propal'=>array('enabled'=>$conf->propal->enabled, 'perms'=>1, 'label'=>'LinkToProposal', 'sql'=>"SELECT s.rowid as socid, s.nom as name, s.client, t.rowid, t.ref, t.ref_client, t.total_ht FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."propal as t WHERE t.fk_soc = s.rowid AND t.fk_soc IN (".$this->db->sanitize($listofidcompanytoscan).') AND t.entity IN ('.getEntity('propal').')'),
7999  'order'=>array('enabled'=>$conf->commande->enabled, 'perms'=>1, 'label'=>'LinkToOrder', 'sql'=>"SELECT s.rowid as socid, s.nom as name, s.client, t.rowid, t.ref, t.ref_client, t.total_ht FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."commande as t WHERE t.fk_soc = s.rowid AND t.fk_soc IN (".$this->db->sanitize($listofidcompanytoscan).') AND t.entity IN ('.getEntity('commande').')'),
8000  'invoice'=>array('enabled'=>$conf->facture->enabled, 'perms'=>1, 'label'=>'LinkToInvoice', 'sql'=>"SELECT s.rowid as socid, s.nom as name, s.client, t.rowid, t.ref, t.ref_client, t.total_ht FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."facture as t WHERE t.fk_soc = s.rowid AND t.fk_soc IN (".$this->db->sanitize($listofidcompanytoscan).') AND t.entity IN ('.getEntity('invoice').')'),
8001  'invoice_template'=>array('enabled'=>$conf->facture->enabled, 'perms'=>1, 'label'=>'LinkToTemplateInvoice', 'sql'=>"SELECT s.rowid as socid, s.nom as name, s.client, t.rowid, t.titre as ref, t.total_ht FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."facture_rec as t WHERE t.fk_soc = s.rowid AND t.fk_soc IN (".$this->db->sanitize($listofidcompanytoscan).') AND t.entity IN ('.getEntity('invoice').')'),
8002  'contrat'=>array(
8003  'enabled'=>$conf->contrat->enabled,
8004  'perms'=>1,
8005  'label'=>'LinkToContract',
8006  'sql'=>"SELECT s.rowid as socid, s.nom as name, s.client, t.rowid, t.ref, t.ref_customer as ref_client, t.ref_supplier, SUM(td.total_ht) as total_ht FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."contrat as t, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."contratdet as td WHERE t.fk_soc = s.rowid AND td.fk_contrat = t.rowid AND t.fk_soc IN (".$this->db->sanitize($listofidcompanytoscan).') AND t.entity IN ('.getEntity('contract').') GROUP BY s.rowid, s.nom, s.client, t.rowid, t.ref, t.ref_customer, t.ref_supplier'
8007  ),
8008  'fichinter'=>array('enabled'=>$conf->ficheinter->enabled, 'perms'=>1, 'label'=>'LinkToIntervention', 'sql'=>"SELECT s.rowid as socid, s.nom as name, s.client, t.rowid, t.ref FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."fichinter as t WHERE t.fk_soc = s.rowid AND t.fk_soc IN (".$this->db->sanitize($listofidcompanytoscan).') AND t.entity IN ('.getEntity('intervention').')'),
8009  'supplier_proposal'=>array('enabled'=>$conf->supplier_proposal->enabled, 'perms'=>1, 'label'=>'LinkToSupplierProposal', 'sql'=>"SELECT s.rowid as socid, s.nom as name, s.client, t.rowid, t.ref, '' as ref_supplier, t.total_ht FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."supplier_proposal as t WHERE t.fk_soc = s.rowid AND t.fk_soc IN (".$this->db->sanitize($listofidcompanytoscan).') AND t.entity IN ('.getEntity('supplier_proposal').')'),
8010  'order_supplier'=>array('enabled'=>$conf->supplier_order->enabled, 'perms'=>1, 'label'=>'LinkToSupplierOrder', 'sql'=>"SELECT s.rowid as socid, s.nom as name, s.client, t.rowid, t.ref, t.ref_supplier, t.total_ht FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."commande_fournisseur as t WHERE t.fk_soc = s.rowid AND t.fk_soc IN (".$this->db->sanitize($listofidcompanytoscan).') AND t.entity IN ('.getEntity('commande_fournisseur').')'),
8011  'invoice_supplier'=>array('enabled'=>$conf->supplier_invoice->enabled, 'perms'=>1, 'label'=>'LinkToSupplierInvoice', 'sql'=>"SELECT s.rowid as socid, s.nom as name, s.client, t.rowid, t.ref, t.ref_supplier, t.total_ht FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."facture_fourn as t WHERE t.fk_soc = s.rowid AND t.fk_soc IN (".$this->db->sanitize($listofidcompanytoscan).') AND t.entity IN ('.getEntity('facture_fourn').')'),
8012  'ticket'=>array('enabled'=>$conf->ticket->enabled, 'perms'=>1, 'label'=>'LinkToTicket', 'sql'=>"SELECT s.rowid as socid, s.nom as name, s.client, t.rowid, t.ref, t.track_id, '0' as total_ht FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s, ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."ticket as t WHERE t.fk_soc = s.rowid AND t.fk_soc IN (".$this->db->sanitize($listofidcompanytoscan).') AND t.entity IN ('.getEntity('ticket').')'),
8013  'mo'=>array('enabled'=>$conf->mrp->enabled, 'perms'=>1, 'label'=>'LinkToMO', 'sql'=>"SELECT s.rowid as socid, s.nom as name, s.client, t.rowid, t.ref, t.rowid, '0' as total_ht FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."societe as s INNER JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."mrp_mo as t ON t.fk_soc = s.rowid WHERE t.fk_soc IN (".$this->db->sanitize($listofidcompanytoscan).') AND t.entity IN ('.getEntity('mo').')')
8014  );
8015  }
8016 
8017  // Can complete the possiblelink array
8018  $hookmanager->initHooks(array('commonobject'));
8019  $parameters = array('listofidcompanytoscan' => $listofidcompanytoscan);
8020 
8021  if (!empty($listofidcompanytoscan)) { // If empty, we don't have criteria to scan the object we can link to
8022  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('showLinkToObjectBlock', $parameters, $object, $action); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by hook
8023  }
8024 
8025  if (empty($reshook)) {
8026  if (is_array($hookmanager->resArray) && count($hookmanager->resArray)) {
8027  $possiblelinks = array_merge($possiblelinks, $hookmanager->resArray);
8028  }
8029  } elseif ($reshook > 0) {
8030  if (is_array($hookmanager->resArray) && count($hookmanager->resArray)) {
8031  $possiblelinks = $hookmanager->resArray;
8032  }
8033  }
8034 
8035  foreach ($possiblelinks as $key => $possiblelink) {
8036  $num = 0;
8037 
8038  if (empty($possiblelink['enabled'])) {
8039  continue;
8040  }
8041 
8042  if (!empty($possiblelink['perms']) && (empty($restrictlinksto) || in_array($key, $restrictlinksto)) && (empty($excludelinksto) || !in_array($key, $excludelinksto))) {
8043  print '<div id="'.$key.'list"'.(empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) ? '' : ' style="display:none"').'>';
8044 
8045  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_LINK_BY_REF_IN_LINKTO)) {
8046  print '<br><form action="' . $_SERVER["PHP_SELF"] . '" method="POST" name="formlinkedbyref' . $key . '">';
8047  print '<input type="hidden" name="id" value="' . $object->id . '">';
8048  print '<input type="hidden" name="action" value="addlinkbyref">';
8049  print '<input type="hidden" name="addlink" value="' . $key . '">';
8050  print '<table class="noborder">';
8051  print '<tr>';
8052  print '<td>' . $langs->trans("Ref") . '</td>';
8053  print '<td><input type="text" name="reftolinkto" value="' . dol_escape_htmltag(GETPOST('reftolinkto', 'alpha')) . '">&nbsp;<input type="submit" class="button valignmiddle" value="' . $langs->trans('ToLink') . '">&nbsp;<input type="submit" class="button" name="cancel" value="' . $langs->trans('Cancel') . '"></td>';
8054  print '</tr>';
8055  print '</table>';
8056  print '</form>';
8057  }
8058 
8059  $sql = $possiblelink['sql'];
8060 
8061  $resqllist = $this->db->query($sql);
8062  if ($resqllist) {
8063  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resqllist);
8064  $i = 0;
8065 
8066  print '<br>';
8067  print '<form action="'.$_SERVER["PHP_SELF"].'" method="POST" name="formlinked'.$key.'">';
8068  print '<input type="hidden" name="action" value="addlink">';
8069  print '<input type="hidden" name="token" value="'.newToken().'">';
8070  print '<input type="hidden" name="id" value="'.$object->id.'">';
8071  print '<input type="hidden" name="addlink" value="'.$key.'">';
8072  print '<table class="noborder">';
8073  print '<tr class="liste_titre">';
8074  print '<td class="nowrap"></td>';
8075  print '<td class="center">'.$langs->trans("Ref").'</td>';
8076  print '<td class="left">'.$langs->trans("RefCustomer").'</td>';
8077  print '<td class="right">'.$langs->trans("AmountHTShort").'</td>';
8078  print '<td class="left">'.$langs->trans("Company").'</td>';
8079  print '</tr>';
8080  while ($i < $num) {
8081  $objp = $this->db->fetch_object($resqllist);
8082 
8083  print '<tr class="oddeven">';
8084  print '<td class="left">';
8085  print '<input type="radio" name="idtolinkto" id="'.$key.'_'.$objp->rowid.'" value="'.$objp->rowid.'">';
8086  print '</td>';
8087  print '<td class="center"><label for="'.$key.'_'.$objp->rowid.'">'.$objp->ref.'</label></td>';
8088  print '<td>'.(!empty($objp->ref_client) ? $objp->ref_client : (!empty($objp->ref_supplier) ? $objp->ref_supplier : '')).'</td>';
8089  print '<td class="right">';
8090  if ($possiblelink['label'] == 'LinkToContract') {
8091  $form = new Form($this->db);
8092  print $form->textwithpicto('', $langs->trans("InformationOnLinkToContract")).' ';
8093  }
8094  print '<span class="amount">'.price($objp->total_ht).'</span>';
8095  print '</td>';
8096  print '<td>'.$objp->name.'</td>';
8097  print '</tr>';
8098  $i++;
8099  }
8100  print '</table>';
8101  print '<div class="center">';
8102  print '<input type="submit" class="button valignmiddle marginleftonly marginrightonly" value="'.$langs->trans('ToLink').'">';
8103  if (empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax)) {
8104  print '<input type="submit" class="button button-cancel marginleftonly marginrightonly" name="cancel" value="'.$langs->trans("Cancel").'"></div>';
8105  } else {
8106  print '<input type="submit"; onclick="javascript:jQuery(\'#'.$key.'list\').toggle(); return false;" class="button button-cancel marginleftonly marginrightonly" name="cancel" value="'.$langs->trans("Cancel").'"></div>';
8107  }
8108  print '</form>';
8109  $this->db->free($resqllist);
8110  } else {
8111  dol_print_error($this->db);
8112  }
8113  print '</div>';
8114 
8115  //$linktoelem.=($linktoelem?' &nbsp; ':'');
8116  if ($num > 0 || !empty($conf->global->MAIN_LINK_BY_REF_IN_LINKTO)) {
8117  $linktoelemlist .= '<li><a href="#linkto'.$key.'" class="linkto dropdowncloseonclick" rel="'.$key.'">'.$langs->trans($possiblelink['label']).' ('.$num.')</a></li>';
8118  // } else $linktoelem.=$langs->trans($possiblelink['label']);
8119  } else {
8120  $linktoelemlist .= '<li><span class="linktodisabled">'.$langs->trans($possiblelink['label']).' (0)</span></li>';
8121  }
8122  }
8123  }
8124 
8125  if ($linktoelemlist) {
8126  $linktoelem = '
8127  <dl class="dropdown" id="linktoobjectname">
8128  ';
8129  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax)) {
8130  $linktoelem .= '<dt><a href="#linktoobjectname"><span class="fas fa-link paddingrightonly"></span>'.$langs->trans("LinkTo").'...</a></dt>';
8131  }
8132  $linktoelem .= '<dd>
8133  <div class="multiselectlinkto">
8134  <ul class="ulselectedfields">'.$linktoelemlist.'
8135  </ul>
8136  </div>
8137  </dd>
8138  </dl>';
8139  } else {
8140  $linktoelem = '';
8141  }
8142 
8143  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax)) {
8144  print '<!-- Add js to show linkto box -->
8145  <script>
8146  jQuery(document).ready(function() {
8147  jQuery(".linkto").click(function() {
8148  console.log("We choose to show/hide links for rel="+jQuery(this).attr(\'rel\')+" so #"+jQuery(this).attr(\'rel\')+"list");
8149  jQuery("#"+jQuery(this).attr(\'rel\')+"list").toggle();
8150  });
8151  });
8152  </script>
8153  ';
8154  }
8155 
8156  return $linktoelem;
8157  }
8158 
8171  public function selectyesno($htmlname, $value = '', $option = 0, $disabled = false, $useempty = 0, $addjscombo = 0, $morecss = '')
8172  {
8173  global $langs;
8174 
8175  $yes = "yes";
8176  $no = "no";
8177  if ($option) {
8178  $yes = "1";
8179  $no = "0";
8180  }
8181 
8182  $disabled = ($disabled ? ' disabled' : '');
8183 
8184  $resultyesno = '<select class="flat width75'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" id="'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'"'.$disabled.'>'."\n";
8185  if ($useempty) {
8186  $resultyesno .= '<option value="-1"'.(($value < 0) ? ' selected' : '').'>&nbsp;</option>'."\n";
8187  }
8188  if (("$value" == 'yes') || ($value == 1)) {
8189  $resultyesno .= '<option value="'.$yes.'" selected>'.$langs->trans("Yes").'</option>'."\n";
8190  $resultyesno .= '<option value="'.$no.'">'.$langs->trans("No").'</option>'."\n";
8191  } else {
8192  $selected = (($useempty && $value != '0' && $value != 'no') ? '' : ' selected');
8193  $resultyesno .= '<option value="'.$yes.'">'.$langs->trans("Yes").'</option>'."\n";
8194  $resultyesno .= '<option value="'.$no.'"'.$selected.'>'.$langs->trans("No").'</option>'."\n";
8195  }
8196  $resultyesno .= '</select>'."\n";
8197 
8198  if ($addjscombo) {
8199  $resultyesno .= ajax_combobox($htmlname);
8200  }
8201 
8202  return $resultyesno;
8203  }
8204 
8205  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
8215  public function select_export_model($selected = '', $htmlname = 'exportmodelid', $type = '', $useempty = 0)
8216  {
8217  // phpcs:enable
8218  $sql = "SELECT rowid, label";
8219  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."export_model";
8220  $sql .= " WHERE type = '".$this->db->escape($type)."'";
8221  $sql .= " ORDER BY rowid";
8222  $result = $this->db->query($sql);
8223  if ($result) {
8224  print '<select class="flat" id="select_'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'">';
8225  if ($useempty) {
8226  print '<option value="-1">&nbsp;</option>';
8227  }
8228 
8229  $num = $this->db->num_rows($result);
8230  $i = 0;
8231  while ($i < $num) {
8232  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($result);
8233  if ($selected == $obj->rowid) {
8234  print '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'" selected>';
8235  } else {
8236  print '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'">';
8237  }
8238  print $obj->label;
8239  print '</option>';
8240  $i++;
8241  }
8242  print "</select>";
8243  } else {
8244  dol_print_error($this->db);
8245  }
8246  }
8247 
8266  public function showrefnav($object, $paramid, $morehtml = '', $shownav = 1, $fieldid = 'rowid', $fieldref = 'ref', $morehtmlref = '', $moreparam = '', $nodbprefix = 0, $morehtmlleft = '', $morehtmlstatus = '', $morehtmlright = '')
8267  {
8268  global $langs, $conf, $hookmanager, $extralanguages;
8269 
8270  $ret = '';
8271  if (empty($fieldid)) {
8272  $fieldid = 'rowid';
8273  }
8274  if (empty($fieldref)) {
8275  $fieldref = 'ref';
8276  }
8277 
8278  // Preparing gender's display if there is one
8279  $addgendertxt = '';
8280  if (!empty($object->gender)) {
8281  $addgendertxt = ' ';
8282  switch ($object->gender) {
8283  case 'man':
8284  $addgendertxt .= '<i class="fas fa-mars"></i>';
8285  break;
8286  case 'woman':
8287  $addgendertxt .= '<i class="fas fa-venus"></i>';
8288  break;
8289  case 'other':
8290  $addgendertxt .= '<i class="fas fa-genderless"></i>';
8291  break;
8292  }
8293  }
8294 
8295  // Add where from hooks
8296  if (is_object($hookmanager)) {
8297  $parameters = array();
8298  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('printFieldListWhere', $parameters, $object); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by hook
8299  $object->next_prev_filter .= $hookmanager->resPrint;
8300  }
8301  $previous_ref = $next_ref = '';
8302  if ($shownav) {
8303  //print "paramid=$paramid,morehtml=$morehtml,shownav=$shownav,$fieldid,$fieldref,$morehtmlref,$moreparam";
8304  $object->load_previous_next_ref((isset($object->next_prev_filter) ? $object->next_prev_filter : ''), $fieldid, $nodbprefix);
8305 
8306  $navurl = $_SERVER["PHP_SELF"];
8307  // Special case for project/task page
8308  if ($paramid == 'project_ref') {
8309  if (preg_match('/\/tasks\/(task|contact|note|document)\.php/', $navurl)) { // TODO Remove this when nav with project_ref on task pages are ok
8310  $navurl = preg_replace('/\/tasks\/(task|contact|time|note|document)\.php/', '/tasks.php', $navurl);
8311  $paramid = 'ref';
8312  }
8313  }
8314 
8315  // accesskey is for Windows or Linux: ALT + key for chrome, ALT + SHIFT + KEY for firefox
8316  // accesskey is for Mac: CTRL + key for all browsers
8317  $stringforfirstkey = $langs->trans("KeyboardShortcut");
8318  if ($conf->browser->name == 'chrome') {
8319  $stringforfirstkey .= ' ALT +';
8320  } elseif ($conf->browser->name == 'firefox') {
8321  $stringforfirstkey .= ' ALT + SHIFT +';
8322  } else {
8323  $stringforfirstkey .= ' CTL +';
8324  }
8325 
8326  $previous_ref = $object->ref_previous ? '<a accesskey="p" title="'.$stringforfirstkey.' p" class="classfortooltip" href="'.$navurl.'?'.$paramid.'='.urlencode($object->ref_previous).$moreparam.'"><i class="fa fa-chevron-left"></i></a>' : '<span class="inactive"><i class="fa fa-chevron-left opacitymedium"></i></span>';
8327  $next_ref = $object->ref_next ? '<a accesskey="n" title="'.$stringforfirstkey.' n" class="classfortooltip" href="'.$navurl.'?'.$paramid.'='.urlencode($object->ref_next).$moreparam.'"><i class="fa fa-chevron-right"></i></a>' : '<span class="inactive"><i class="fa fa-chevron-right opacitymedium"></i></span>';
8328  }
8329 
8330  //print "xx".$previous_ref."x".$next_ref;
8331  $ret .= '<!-- Start banner content --><div style="vertical-align: middle">';
8332 
8333  // Right part of banner
8334  if ($morehtmlright) {
8335  $ret .= '<div class="inline-block floatleft">'.$morehtmlright.'</div>';
8336  }
8337 
8338  if ($previous_ref || $next_ref || $morehtml) {
8339  $ret .= '<div class="pagination paginationref"><ul class="right">';
8340  }
8341  if ($morehtml) {
8342  $ret .= '<li class="noborder litext'.(($shownav && $previous_ref && $next_ref) ? ' clearbothonsmartphone' : '').'">'.$morehtml.'</li>';
8343  }
8344  if ($shownav && ($previous_ref || $next_ref)) {
8345  $ret .= '<li class="pagination">'.$previous_ref.'</li>';
8346  $ret .= '<li class="pagination">'.$next_ref.'</li>';
8347  }
8348  if ($previous_ref || $next_ref || $morehtml) {
8349  $ret .= '</ul></div>';
8350  }
8351 
8352  $parameters = array();
8353  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('moreHtmlStatus', $parameters, $object); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by hook
8354  if (empty($reshook)) {
8355  $morehtmlstatus .= $hookmanager->resPrint;
8356  } else {
8357  $morehtmlstatus = $hookmanager->resPrint;
8358  }
8359  if ($morehtmlstatus) {
8360  $ret .= '<div class="statusref">'.$morehtmlstatus.'</div>';
8361  }
8362 
8363  $parameters = array();
8364  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('moreHtmlRef', $parameters, $object); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by hook
8365  if (empty($reshook)) {
8366  $morehtmlref .= $hookmanager->resPrint;
8367  } elseif ($reshook > 0) {
8368  $morehtmlref = $hookmanager->resPrint;
8369  }
8370 
8371  // Left part of banner
8372  if ($morehtmlleft) {
8373  if ($conf->browser->layout == 'phone') {
8374  $ret .= '<!-- morehtmlleft --><div class="floatleft">'.$morehtmlleft.'</div>'; // class="center" to have photo in middle
8375  } else {
8376  $ret .= '<!-- morehtmlleft --><div class="inline-block floatleft">'.$morehtmlleft.'</div>';
8377  }
8378  }
8379 
8380  //if ($conf->browser->layout == 'phone') $ret.='<div class="clearboth"></div>';
8381  $ret .= '<div class="inline-block floatleft valignmiddle maxwidth750 marginbottomonly refid'.(($shownav && ($previous_ref || $next_ref)) ? ' refidpadding' : '').'">';
8382 
8383  // For thirdparty, contact, user, member, the ref is the id, so we show something else
8384  if ($object->element == 'societe') {
8385  $ret .= dol_htmlentities($object->name);
8386 
8387  // List of extra languages
8388  $arrayoflangcode = array();
8389  if (!empty($conf->global->PDF_USE_ALSO_LANGUAGE_CODE)) {
8390  $arrayoflangcode[] = $conf->global->PDF_USE_ALSO_LANGUAGE_CODE;
8391  }
8392 
8393  if (is_array($arrayoflangcode) && count($arrayoflangcode)) {
8394  if (!is_object($extralanguages)) {
8395  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/extralanguages.class.php';
8396  $extralanguages = new ExtraLanguages($this->db);
8397  }
8398  $extralanguages->fetch_name_extralanguages('societe');
8399 
8400  if (!empty($extralanguages->attributes['societe']['name'])) {
8401  $object->fetchValuesForExtraLanguages();
8402 
8403  $htmltext = '';
8404  // If there is extra languages
8405  foreach ($arrayoflangcode as $extralangcode) {
8406  $htmltext .= picto_from_langcode($extralangcode, 'class="pictoforlang paddingright"');
8407  if ($object->array_languages['name'][$extralangcode]) {
8408  $htmltext .= $object->array_languages['name'][$extralangcode];
8409  } else {
8410  $htmltext .= '<span class="opacitymedium">'.$langs->trans("SwitchInEditModeToAddTranslation").'</span>';
8411  }
8412  }
8413  $ret .= '<!-- Show translations of name -->'."\n";
8414  $ret .= $this->textwithpicto('', $htmltext, -1, 'language', 'opacitymedium paddingleft');
8415  }
8416  }
8417  } elseif ($object->element == 'member') {
8418  $ret .= $object->ref.'<br>';
8419  $fullname = $object->getFullName($langs);
8420  if ($object->morphy == 'mor' && $object->societe) {
8421  $ret .= dol_htmlentities($object->societe).((!empty($fullname) && $object->societe != $fullname) ? ' ('.dol_htmlentities($fullname).$addgendertxt.')' : '');
8422  } else {
8423  $ret .= dol_htmlentities($fullname).$addgendertxt.((!empty($object->societe) && $object->societe != $fullname) ? ' ('.dol_htmlentities($object->societe).')' : '');
8424  }
8425  } elseif (in_array($object->element, array('contact', 'user', 'usergroup'))) {
8426  $ret .= dol_htmlentities($object->getFullName($langs)).$addgendertxt;
8427  } elseif (in_array($object->element, array('action', 'agenda'))) {
8428  $ret .= $object->ref.'<br>'.$object->label;
8429  } elseif (in_array($object->element, array('adherent_type'))) {
8430  $ret .= $object->label;
8431  } elseif ($object->element == 'ecm_directories') {
8432  $ret .= '';
8433  } elseif ($fieldref != 'none') {
8434  $ret .= dol_htmlentities($object->$fieldref);
8435  }
8436 
8437  if ($morehtmlref) {
8438  // don't add a additional space, when "$morehtmlref" starts with a HTML div tag
8439  if (substr($morehtmlref, 0, 4) != '<div') {
8440  $ret .= ' ';
8441  }
8442 
8443  $ret .= $morehtmlref;
8444  }
8445 
8446  $ret .= '</div>';
8447 
8448  $ret .= '</div><!-- End banner content -->';
8449 
8450  return $ret;
8451  }
8452 
8453 
8462  public function showbarcode(&$object, $width = 100, $morecss = '')
8463  {
8464  global $conf;
8465 
8466  //Check if barcode is filled in the card
8467  if (empty($object->barcode)) {
8468  return '';
8469  }
8470 
8471  // Complete object if not complete
8472  if (empty($object->barcode_type_code) || empty($object->barcode_type_coder)) {
8473  $result = $object->fetch_barcode();
8474  //Check if fetch_barcode() failed
8475  if ($result < 1) {
8476  return '<!-- ErrorFetchBarcode -->';
8477  }
8478  }
8479 
8480  // Barcode image
8481  $url = DOL_URL_ROOT.'/viewimage.php?modulepart=barcode&generator='.urlencode($object->barcode_type_coder).'&code='.urlencode($object->barcode).'&encoding='.urlencode($object->barcode_type_code);
8482  $out = '<!-- url barcode = '.$url.' -->';
8483  $out .= '<img src="'.$url.'"'.($morecss ? ' class="'.$morecss.'"' : '').'>';
8484  return $out;
8485  }
8486 
8503  public static function showphoto($modulepart, $object, $width = 100, $height = 0, $caneditfield = 0, $cssclass = 'photowithmargin', $imagesize = '', $addlinktofullsize = 1, $cache = 0, $forcecapture = '', $noexternsourceoverwrite = 0)
8504  {
8505  global $conf, $langs;
8506 
8507  $entity = (!empty($object->entity) ? $object->entity : $conf->entity);
8508  $id = (!empty($object->id) ? $object->id : $object->rowid);
8509 
8510  $ret = '';
8511  $dir = '';
8512  $file = '';
8513  $originalfile = '';
8514  $altfile = '';
8515  $email = '';
8516  $capture = '';
8517  if ($modulepart == 'societe') {
8518  $dir = $conf->societe->multidir_output[$entity];
8519  if (!empty($object->logo)) {
8520  if (dolIsAllowedForPreview($object->logo)) {
8521  if ((string) $imagesize == 'mini') {
8522  $file = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'thirdparty').'logos/'.getImageFileNameForSize($object->logo, '_mini'); // getImageFileNameForSize include the thumbs
8523  } elseif ((string) $imagesize == 'small') {
8524  $file = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'thirdparty').'logos/'.getImageFileNameForSize($object->logo, '_small');
8525  } else {
8526  $file = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'thirdparty').'logos/'.$object->logo;
8527  }
8528  $originalfile = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'thirdparty').'logos/'.$object->logo;
8529  }
8530  }
8531  $email = $object->email;
8532  } elseif ($modulepart == 'contact') {
8533  $dir = $conf->societe->multidir_output[$entity].'/contact';
8534  if (!empty($object->photo)) {
8535  if (dolIsAllowedForPreview($object->photo)) {
8536  if ((string) $imagesize == 'mini') {
8537  $file = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'contact').'photos/'.getImageFileNameForSize($object->photo, '_mini');
8538  } elseif ((string) $imagesize == 'small') {
8539  $file = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'contact').'photos/'.getImageFileNameForSize($object->photo, '_small');
8540  } else {
8541  $file = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'contact').'photos/'.$object->photo;
8542  }
8543  $originalfile = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'contact').'photos/'.$object->photo;
8544  }
8545  }
8546  $email = $object->email;
8547  $capture = 'user';
8548  } elseif ($modulepart == 'userphoto') {
8549  $dir = $conf->user->dir_output;
8550  if (!empty($object->photo)) {
8551  if (dolIsAllowedForPreview($object->photo)) {
8552  if ((string) $imagesize == 'mini') {
8553  $file = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'user').getImageFileNameForSize($object->photo, '_mini');
8554  } elseif ((string) $imagesize == 'small') {
8555  $file = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'user').getImageFileNameForSize($object->photo, '_small');
8556  } else {
8557  $file = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'user').$object->photo;
8558  }
8559  $originalfile = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'user').$object->photo;
8560  }
8561  }
8562  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_OLD_IMAGE_LINKS)) {
8563  $altfile = $object->id.".jpg"; // For backward compatibility
8564  }
8565  $email = $object->email;
8566  $capture = 'user';
8567  } elseif ($modulepart == 'memberphoto') {
8568  $dir = $conf->adherent->dir_output;
8569  if (!empty($object->photo)) {
8570  if (dolIsAllowedForPreview($object->photo)) {
8571  if ((string) $imagesize == 'mini') {
8572  $file = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'member').'photos/'.getImageFileNameForSize($object->photo, '_mini');
8573  } elseif ((string) $imagesize == 'small') {
8574  $file = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'member').'photos/'.getImageFileNameForSize($object->photo, '_small');
8575  } else {
8576  $file = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'member').'photos/'.$object->photo;
8577  }
8578  $originalfile = get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $object, 'member').'photos/'.$object->photo;
8579  }
8580  }
8581  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_OLD_IMAGE_LINKS)) {
8582  $altfile = $object->id.".jpg"; // For backward compatibility
8583  }
8584  $email = $object->email;
8585  $capture = 'user';
8586  } else {
8587  // Generic case to show photos
8588  $dir = $conf->$modulepart->dir_output;
8589  if (!empty($object->photo)) {
8590  if (dolIsAllowedForPreview($object->photo)) {
8591  if ((string) $imagesize == 'mini') {
8592  $file = get_exdir($id, 2, 0, 0, $object, $modulepart).'photos/'.getImageFileNameForSize($object->photo, '_mini');
8593  } elseif ((string) $imagesize == 'small') {
8594  $file = get_exdir($id, 2, 0, 0, $object, $modulepart).'photos/'.getImageFileNameForSize($object->photo, '_small');
8595  } else {
8596  $file = get_exdir($id, 2, 0, 0, $object, $modulepart).'photos/'.$object->photo;
8597  }
8598  $originalfile = get_exdir($id, 2, 0, 0, $object, $modulepart).'photos/'.$object->photo;
8599  }
8600  }
8601  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_OLD_IMAGE_LINKS)) {
8602  $altfile = $object->id.".jpg"; // For backward compatibility
8603  }
8604  $email = $object->email;
8605  }
8606 
8607  if ($forcecapture) {
8608  $capture = $forcecapture;
8609  }
8610 
8611  if ($dir) {
8612  if ($file && file_exists($dir."/".$file)) {
8613  if ($addlinktofullsize) {
8614  $urladvanced = getAdvancedPreviewUrl($modulepart, $originalfile, 0, '&entity='.$entity);
8615  if ($urladvanced) {
8616  $ret .= '<a href="'.$urladvanced.'">';
8617  } else {
8618  $ret .= '<a href="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/viewimage.php?modulepart='.$modulepart.'&entity='.$entity.'&file='.urlencode($originalfile).'&cache='.$cache.'">';
8619  }
8620  }
8621  $ret .= '<img alt="Photo" class="photo'.$modulepart.($cssclass ? ' '.$cssclass : '').' photologo'.(preg_replace('/[^a-z]/i', '_', $file)).'" '.($width ? ' width="'.$width.'"' : '').($height ? ' height="'.$height.'"' : '').' src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/viewimage.php?modulepart='.$modulepart.'&entity='.$entity.'&file='.urlencode($file).'&cache='.$cache.'">';
8622  if ($addlinktofullsize) {
8623  $ret .= '</a>';
8624  }
8625  } elseif ($altfile && file_exists($dir."/".$altfile)) {
8626  if ($addlinktofullsize) {
8627  $urladvanced = getAdvancedPreviewUrl($modulepart, $originalfile, 0, '&entity='.$entity);
8628  if ($urladvanced) {
8629  $ret .= '<a href="'.$urladvanced.'">';
8630  } else {
8631  $ret .= '<a href="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/viewimage.php?modulepart='.$modulepart.'&entity='.$entity.'&file='.urlencode($originalfile).'&cache='.$cache.'">';
8632  }
8633  }
8634  $ret .= '<img class="photo'.$modulepart.($cssclass ? ' '.$cssclass : '').'" alt="Photo alt" id="photologo'.(preg_replace('/[^a-z]/i', '_', $file)).'" class="'.$cssclass.'" '.($width ? ' width="'.$width.'"' : '').($height ? ' height="'.$height.'"' : '').' src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/viewimage.php?modulepart='.$modulepart.'&entity='.$entity.'&file='.urlencode($altfile).'&cache='.$cache.'">';
8635  if ($addlinktofullsize) {
8636  $ret .= '</a>';
8637  }
8638  } else {
8639  $nophoto = '/public/theme/common/nophoto.png';
8640  $defaultimg = 'identicon'; // For gravatar
8641  if (in_array($modulepart, array('societe', 'userphoto', 'contact', 'memberphoto'))) { // For modules that need a special image when photo not found
8642  if ($modulepart == 'societe' || ($modulepart == 'memberphoto' && strpos($object->morphy, 'mor')) !== false) {
8643  $nophoto = 'company';
8644  } else {
8645  $nophoto = '/public/theme/common/user_anonymous.png';
8646  if (!empty($object->gender) && $object->gender == 'man') {
8647  $nophoto = '/public/theme/common/user_man.png';
8648  }
8649  if (!empty($object->gender) && $object->gender == 'woman') {
8650  $nophoto = '/public/theme/common/user_woman.png';
8651  }
8652  }
8653  }
8654 
8655  if (!empty($conf->gravatar->enabled) && $email && empty($noexternsourceoverwrite)) {
8656  // see https://gravatar.com/site/implement/images/php/
8657  $ret .= '<!-- Put link to gravatar -->';
8658  $ret .= '<img class="photo'.$modulepart.($cssclass ? ' '.$cssclass : '').'" alt="Gravatar avatar" title="'.$email.' Gravatar avatar" '.($width ? ' width="'.$width.'"' : '').($height ? ' height="'.$height.'"' : '').' src="https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/'.md5(strtolower(trim($email))).'?s='.$width.'&d='.$defaultimg.'">'; // gravatar need md5 hash
8659  } else {
8660  if ($nophoto == 'company') {
8661  $ret .= '<div class="photo'.$modulepart.($cssclass ? ' '.$cssclass : '').'" alt="No photo" '.($width ? ' width="'.$width.'"' : '').($height ? ' height="'.$height.'"' : '').'">'.img_picto('', 'company').'</div>';
8662  } else {
8663  $ret .= '<img class="photo'.$modulepart.($cssclass ? ' '.$cssclass : '').'" alt="No photo" '.($width ? ' width="'.$width.'"' : '').($height ? ' height="'.$height.'"' : '').' src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.$nophoto.'">';
8664  }
8665  }
8666  }
8667 
8668  if ($caneditfield) {
8669  if ($object->photo) {
8670  $ret .= "<br>\n";
8671  }
8672  $ret .= '<table class="nobordernopadding centpercent">';
8673  if ($object->photo) {
8674  $ret .= '<tr><td><input type="checkbox" class="flat photodelete" name="deletephoto" id="photodelete"> '.$langs->trans("Delete").'<br><br></td></tr>';
8675  }
8676  $ret .= '<tr><td class="tdoverflow"><input type="file" class="flat maxwidth200onsmartphone" name="photo" id="photoinput" accept="image/*"'.($capture ? ' capture="'.$capture.'"' : '').'></td></tr>';
8677  $ret .= '</table>';
8678  }
8679  } else {
8680  dol_print_error('', 'Call of showphoto with wrong parameters modulepart='.$modulepart);
8681  }
8682 
8683  return $ret;
8684  }
8685 
8686  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
8703  public function select_dolgroups($selected = '', $htmlname = 'groupid', $show_empty = 0, $exclude = '', $disabled = 0, $include = '', $enableonly = '', $force_entity = '0', $multiple = false, $morecss = '')
8704  {
8705  // phpcs:enable
8706  global $conf, $user, $langs;
8707 
8708  // Permettre l'exclusion de groupes
8709  if (is_array($exclude)) {
8710  $excludeGroups = implode(",", $exclude);
8711  }
8712  // Permettre l'inclusion de groupes
8713  if (is_array($include)) {
8714  $includeGroups = implode(",", $include);
8715  }
8716 
8717  if (!is_array($selected)) {
8718  $selected = array($selected);
8719  }
8720 
8721  $out = '';
8722 
8723  // On recherche les groupes
8724  $sql = "SELECT ug.rowid, ug.nom as name";
8725  if (!empty($conf->multicompany->enabled) && $conf->entity == 1 && $user->admin && !$user->entity) {
8726  $sql .= ", e.label";
8727  }
8728  $sql .= " FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."usergroup as ug ";
8729  if (!empty($conf->multicompany->enabled) && $conf->entity == 1 && $user->admin && !$user->entity) {
8730  $sql .= " LEFT JOIN ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."entity as e ON e.rowid=ug.entity";
8731  if ($force_entity) {
8732  $sql .= " WHERE ug.entity IN (0, ".$force_entity.")";
8733  } else {
8734  $sql .= " WHERE ug.entity IS NOT NULL";
8735  }
8736  } else {
8737  $sql .= " WHERE ug.entity IN (0, ".$conf->entity.")";
8738  }
8739  if (is_array($exclude) && $excludeGroups) {
8740  $sql .= " AND ug.rowid NOT IN (".$this->db->sanitize($excludeGroups).")";
8741  }
8742  if (is_array($include) && $includeGroups) {
8743  $sql .= " AND ug.rowid IN (".$this->db->sanitize($includeGroups).")";
8744  }
8745  $sql .= " ORDER BY ug.nom ASC";
8746 
8747  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::select_dolgroups", LOG_DEBUG);
8748  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
8749  if ($resql) {
8750  // Enhance with select2
8751  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/ajax.lib.php';
8752  $out .= ajax_combobox($htmlname);
8753 
8754  $out .= '<select class="flat minwidth200'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'" id="'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.($multiple ? '[]' : '').'" '.($multiple ? 'multiple' : '').' '.($disabled ? ' disabled' : '').'>';
8755 
8756  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
8757  $i = 0;
8758  if ($num) {
8759  if ($show_empty && !$multiple) {
8760  $out .= '<option value="-1"'.(in_array(-1, $selected) ? ' selected' : '').'>&nbsp;</option>'."\n";
8761  }
8762 
8763  while ($i < $num) {
8764  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
8765  $disableline = 0;
8766  if (is_array($enableonly) && count($enableonly) && !in_array($obj->rowid, $enableonly)) {
8767  $disableline = 1;
8768  }
8769 
8770  $out .= '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'"';
8771  if ($disableline) {
8772  $out .= ' disabled';
8773  }
8774  if ((is_object($selected[0]) && $selected[0]->id == $obj->rowid) || (!is_object($selected[0]) && in_array($obj->rowid, $selected))) {
8775  $out .= ' selected';
8776  }
8777  $out .= '>';
8778 
8779  $out .= $obj->name;
8780  if (!empty($conf->multicompany->enabled) && empty($conf->global->MULTICOMPANY_TRANSVERSE_MODE) && $conf->entity == 1) {
8781  $out .= " (".$obj->label.")";
8782  }
8783 
8784  $out .= '</option>';
8785  $i++;
8786  }
8787  } else {
8788  if ($show_empty) {
8789  $out .= '<option value="-1"'.(in_array(-1, $selected) ? ' selected' : '').'></option>'."\n";
8790  }
8791  $out .= '<option value="" disabled>'.$langs->trans("NoUserGroupDefined").'</option>';
8792  }
8793  $out .= '</select>';
8794  } else {
8795  dol_print_error($this->db);
8796  }
8797 
8798  return $out;
8799  }
8800 
8801 
8807  public function showFilterButtons()
8808  {
8809  $out = '<div class="nowraponall">';
8810  $out .= '<button type="submit" class="liste_titre button_search reposition" name="button_search_x" value="x"><span class="fa fa-search"></span></button>';
8811  $out .= '<button type="submit" class="liste_titre button_removefilter reposition" name="button_removefilter_x" value="x"><span class="fa fa-remove"></span></button>';
8812  $out .= '</div>';
8813 
8814  return $out;
8815  }
8816 
8825  public function showCheckAddButtons($cssclass = 'checkforaction', $calljsfunction = 0, $massactionname = "massaction")
8826  {
8827  global $conf, $langs;
8828 
8829  $out = '';
8830 
8831  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax)) {
8832  $out .= '<div class="inline-block checkallactions"><input type="checkbox" id="'.$cssclass.'s" name="'.$cssclass.'s" class="checkallactions"></div>';
8833  }
8834  $out .= '<script>
8835  $(document).ready(function() {
8836  $("#' . $cssclass.'s").click(function() {
8837  if($(this).is(\':checked\')){
8838  console.log("We check all '.$cssclass.' and trigger the change method");
8839  $(".'.$cssclass.'").prop(\'checked\', true).trigger(\'change\');
8840  }
8841  else
8842  {
8843  console.log("We uncheck all");
8844  $(".'.$cssclass.'").prop(\'checked\', false).trigger(\'change\');
8845  }'."\n";
8846  if ($calljsfunction) {
8847  $out .= 'if (typeof initCheckForSelect == \'function\') { initCheckForSelect(0, "'.$massactionname.'", "'.$cssclass.'"); } else { console.log("No function initCheckForSelect found. Call won\'t be done."); }';
8848  }
8849  $out .= ' });
8850  $(".' . $cssclass.'").change(function() {
8851  $(this).closest("tr").toggleClass("highlight", this.checked);
8852  });
8853  });
8854  </script>';
8855 
8856  return $out;
8857  }
8858 
8868  public function showFilterAndCheckAddButtons($addcheckuncheckall = 0, $cssclass = 'checkforaction', $calljsfunction = 0, $massactionname = "massaction")
8869  {
8870  $out = $this->showFilterButtons();
8871  if ($addcheckuncheckall) {
8872  $out .= $this->showCheckAddButtons($cssclass, $calljsfunction, $massactionname);
8873  }
8874  return $out;
8875  }
8876 
8890  public function selectExpenseCategories($selected = '', $htmlname = 'fk_c_exp_tax_cat', $useempty = 0, $excludeid = array(), $target = '', $default_selected = 0, $params = array(), $info_admin = 1)
8891  {
8892  global $db, $langs, $user;
8893 
8894  $out = '';
8895  $sql = 'SELECT rowid, label FROM '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'c_exp_tax_cat WHERE active = 1';
8896  $sql .= ' AND entity IN (0,'.getEntity('exp_tax_cat').')';
8897  if (!empty($excludeid)) {
8898  $sql .= ' AND rowid NOT IN ('.$this->db->sanitize(implode(',', $excludeid)).')';
8899  }
8900  $sql .= ' ORDER BY label';
8901 
8902  $resql = $db->query($sql);
8903  if ($resql) {
8904  $out = '<select id="select_'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'" class="'.$htmlname.' flat minwidth75imp maxwidth200">';
8905  if ($useempty) {
8906  $out .= '<option value="0">&nbsp;</option>';
8907  }
8908 
8909  while ($obj = $db->fetch_object($resql)) {
8910  $out .= '<option '.($selected == $obj->rowid ? 'selected="selected"' : '').' value="'.$obj->rowid.'">'.$langs->trans($obj->label).'</option>';
8911  }
8912  $out .= '</select>';
8913  $out .= ajax_combobox('select_'.$htmlname);
8914 
8915  if (!empty($htmlname) && $user->admin && $info_admin) {
8916  $out .= ' '.info_admin($langs->trans("YouCanChangeValuesForThisListFromDictionarySetup"), 1);
8917  }
8918 
8919  if (!empty($target)) {
8920  $sql = "SELECT c.id FROM ".MAIN_DB_PREFIX."c_type_fees as c WHERE c.code = 'EX_KME' AND c.active = 1";
8921  $resql = $db->query($sql);
8922  if ($resql) {
8923  if ($db->num_rows($resql) > 0) {
8924  $obj = $db->fetch_object($resql);
8925  $out .= '<script>
8926  $(function() {
8927  $("select[name='.$target.']").on("change", function() {
8928  var current_val = $(this).val();
8929  if (current_val == '.$obj->id.') {';
8930  if (!empty($default_selected) || !empty($selected)) {
8931  $out .= '$("select[name='.$htmlname.']").val("'.($default_selected > 0 ? $default_selected : $selected).'");';
8932  }
8933 
8934  $out .= '
8935  $("select[name='.$htmlname.']").change();
8936  }
8937  });
8938 
8939  $("select[name='.$htmlname.']").change(function() {
8940 
8941  if ($("select[name='.$target.']").val() == '.$obj->id.') {
8942  // get price of kilometer to fill the unit price
8943  $.ajax({
8944  method: "POST",
8945  dataType: "json",
8946  data: { fk_c_exp_tax_cat: $(this).val(), token: \''.currentToken().'\' },
8947  url: "'.(DOL_URL_ROOT.'/expensereport/ajax/ajaxik.php?'.$params).'",
8948  }).done(function( data, textStatus, jqXHR ) {
8949  console.log(data);
8950  if (typeof data.up != "undefined") {
8951  $("input[name=value_unit]").val(data.up);
8952  $("select[name='.$htmlname.']").attr("title", data.title);
8953  } else {
8954  $("input[name=value_unit]").val("");
8955  $("select[name='.$htmlname.']").attr("title", "");
8956  }
8957  });
8958  }
8959  });
8960  });
8961  </script>';
8962  }
8963  }
8964  }
8965  } else {
8966  dol_print_error($db);
8967  }
8968 
8969  return $out;
8970  }
8971 
8980  public function selectExpenseRanges($selected = '', $htmlname = 'fk_range', $useempty = 0)
8981  {
8982  global $db, $conf, $langs;
8983 
8984  $out = '';
8985  $sql = 'SELECT rowid, range_ik FROM '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'c_exp_tax_range';
8986  $sql .= ' WHERE entity = '.$conf->entity.' AND active = 1';
8987 
8988  $resql = $db->query($sql);
8989  if ($resql) {
8990  $out = '<select id="select_'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'" class="'.$htmlname.' flat minwidth75imp">';
8991  if ($useempty) {
8992  $out .= '<option value="0"></option>';
8993  }
8994 
8995  while ($obj = $db->fetch_object($resql)) {
8996  $out .= '<option '.($selected == $obj->rowid ? 'selected="selected"' : '').' value="'.$obj->rowid.'">'.price($obj->range_ik, 0, $langs, 1, 0).'</option>';
8997  }
8998  $out .= '</select>';
8999  } else {
9000  dol_print_error($db);
9001  }
9002 
9003  return $out;
9004  }
9005 
9016  public function selectExpense($selected = '', $htmlname = 'fk_c_type_fees', $useempty = 0, $allchoice = 1, $useid = 0)
9017  {
9018  global $db, $langs;
9019 
9020  $out = '';
9021  $sql = 'SELECT id, code, label FROM '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'c_type_fees';
9022  $sql .= ' WHERE active = 1';
9023 
9024  $resql = $db->query($sql);
9025  if ($resql) {
9026  $out = '<select id="select_'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'" class="'.$htmlname.' flat minwidth75imp">';
9027  if ($useempty) {
