9028  $out .= '<option value="0"></option>';
9029  }
9030  if ($allchoice) {
9031  $out .= '<option value="-1">'.$langs->trans('AllExpenseReport').'</option>';
9032  }
9033 
9034  $field = 'code';
9035  if ($useid) {
9036  $field = 'id';
9037  }
9038 
9039  while ($obj = $db->fetch_object($resql)) {
9040  $key = $langs->trans($obj->code);
9041  $out .= '<option '.($selected == $obj->{$field} ? 'selected="selected"' : '').' value="'.$obj->{$field}.'">'.($key != $obj->code ? $key : $obj->label).'</option>';
9042  }
9043  $out .= '</select>';
9044  } else {
9045  dol_print_error($db);
9046  }
9047 
9048  return $out;
9049  }
9050 
9069  public function selectInvoice($socid = -1, $selected = '', $htmlname = 'invoiceid', $maxlength = 24, $option_only = 0, $show_empty = '1', $discard_closed = 0, $forcefocus = 0, $disabled = 0, $morecss = 'maxwidth500', $projectsListId = '', $showproject = 'all', $usertofilter = null)
9070  {
9071  global $user, $conf, $langs;
9072 
9073  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/projet/class/project.class.php';
9074 
9075  if (is_null($usertofilter)) {
9076  $usertofilter = $user;
9077  }
9078 
9079  $out = '';
9080 
9081  $hideunselectables = false;
9082  if (!empty($conf->global->PROJECT_HIDE_UNSELECTABLES)) {
9083  $hideunselectables = true;
9084  }
9085 
9086  if (empty($projectsListId)) {
9087  if (empty($usertofilter->rights->projet->all->lire)) {
9088  $projectstatic = new Project($this->db);
9089  $projectsListId = $projectstatic->getProjectsAuthorizedForUser($usertofilter, 0, 1);
9090  }
9091  }
9092 
9093  // Search all projects
9094  $sql = "SELECT f.rowid, f.ref as fref, 'nolabel' as flabel, p.rowid as pid, f.ref,
9095  p.title, p.fk_soc, p.fk_statut, p.public,";
9096  $sql .= ' s.nom as name';
9097  $sql .= ' FROM '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'projet as p';
9098  $sql .= ' LEFT JOIN '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'societe as s ON s.rowid = p.fk_soc,';
9099  $sql .= ' '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.'facture as f';
9100  $sql .= " WHERE p.entity IN (".getEntity('project').")";
9101  $sql .= " AND f.fk_projet = p.rowid AND f.fk_statut=0"; //Brouillons seulement
9102  //if ($projectsListId) $sql.= " AND p.rowid IN (".$this->db->sanitize($projectsListId).")";
9103  //if ($socid == 0) $sql.= " AND (p.fk_soc=0 OR p.fk_soc IS NULL)";
9104  //if ($socid > 0) $sql.= " AND (p.fk_soc=".((int) $socid)." OR p.fk_soc IS NULL)";
9105  $sql .= " ORDER BY p.ref, f.ref ASC";
9106 
9107  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
9108  if ($resql) {
9109  // Use select2 selector
9110  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax)) {
9111  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/ajax.lib.php';
9112  $comboenhancement = ajax_combobox($htmlname, '', 0, $forcefocus);
9113  $out .= $comboenhancement;
9114  $morecss = 'minwidth200imp maxwidth500';
9115  }
9116 
9117  if (empty($option_only)) {
9118  $out .= '<select class="valignmiddle flat'.($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').'"'.($disabled ? ' disabled="disabled"' : '').' id="'.$htmlname.'" name="'.$htmlname.'">';
9119  }
9120  if (!empty($show_empty)) {
9121  $out .= '<option value="0" class="optiongrey">';
9122  if (!is_numeric($show_empty)) {
9123  $out .= $show_empty;
9124  } else {
9125  $out .= '&nbsp;';
9126  }
9127  $out .= '</option>';
9128  }
9129  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
9130  $i = 0;
9131  if ($num) {
9132  while ($i < $num) {
9133  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
9134  // If we ask to filter on a company and user has no permission to see all companies and project is linked to another company, we hide project.
9135  if ($socid > 0 && (empty($obj->fk_soc) || $obj->fk_soc == $socid) && empty($usertofilter->rights->societe->lire)) {
9136  // Do nothing
9137  } else {
9138  if ($discard_closed == 1 && $obj->fk_statut == Project::STATUS_CLOSED) {
9139  $i++;
9140  continue;
9141  }
9142 
9143  $labeltoshow = '';
9144 
9145  if ($showproject == 'all') {
9146  $labeltoshow .= dol_trunc($obj->ref, 18); // Invoice ref
9147  if ($obj->name) {
9148  $labeltoshow .= ' - '.$obj->name; // Soc name
9149  }
9150 
9151  $disabled = 0;
9152  if ($obj->fk_statut == Project::STATUS_DRAFT) {
9153  $disabled = 1;
9154  $labeltoshow .= ' - '.$langs->trans("Draft");
9155  } elseif ($obj->fk_statut == Project::STATUS_CLOSED) {
9156  if ($discard_closed == 2) {
9157  $disabled = 1;
9158  }
9159  $labeltoshow .= ' - '.$langs->trans("Closed");
9160  } elseif ($socid > 0 && (!empty($obj->fk_soc) && $obj->fk_soc != $socid)) {
9161  $disabled = 1;
9162  $labeltoshow .= ' - '.$langs->trans("LinkedToAnotherCompany");
9163  }
9164  }
9165 
9166  if (!empty($selected) && $selected == $obj->rowid) {
9167  $out .= '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'" selected';
9168  //if ($disabled) $out.=' disabled'; // with select2, field can't be preselected if disabled
9169  $out .= '>'.$labeltoshow.'</option>';
9170  } else {
9171  if ($hideunselectables && $disabled && ($selected != $obj->rowid)) {
9172  $resultat = '';
9173  } else {
9174  $resultat = '<option value="'.$obj->rowid.'"';
9175  if ($disabled) {
9176  $resultat .= ' disabled';
9177  }
9178  //if ($obj->public) $labeltoshow.=' ('.$langs->trans("Public").')';
9179  //else $labeltoshow.=' ('.$langs->trans("Private").')';
9180  $resultat .= '>';
9181  $resultat .= $labeltoshow;
9182  $resultat .= '</option>';
9183  }
9184  $out .= $resultat;
9185  }
9186  }
9187  $i++;
9188  }
9189  }
9190  if (empty($option_only)) {
9191  $out .= '</select>';
9192  }
9193 
9194  print $out;
9195 
9196  $this->db->free($resql);
9197  return $num;
9198  } else {
9199  dol_print_error($this->db);
9200  return -1;
9201  }
9202  }
9203 
9212  public function searchComponent($arrayofcriterias, $search_component_params, $arrayofinputfieldsalreadyoutput = array())
9213  {
9214  global $langs;
9215 
9216  $ret = '';
9217 
9218  $ret .= '<div class="nowrap centpercent">';
9219  //$ret .= '<button type="submit" class="liste_titre button_removefilter" name="button_removefilter_x" value="x"><span class="fa fa-remove"></span></button>';
9220  $ret .= '<a href="#" class="dropdownsearch-toggle unsetcolor paddingright">';
9221  $ret .= '<span class="fas fa-filter linkobject boxfilter" title="Filter" id="idsubimgproductdistribution"></span>';
9222  $ret .= $langs->trans("Filters");
9223  $ret .= '</a>';
9224  //$ret .= '<button type="submit" class="liste_titre button_search paddingleftonly" name="button_search_x" value="x"><span class="fa fa-search"></span></button>';
9225  $ret .= '<div name="search_component_params" class="search_component_params inline-block minwidth500 maxwidth300onsmartphone valignmiddle">';
9226  $texttoshow = '<div class="opacitymedium inline-block search_component_searchtext">'.$langs->trans("Search").'</div>';
9227 
9228  $ret .= '<div class="search_component inline-block valignmiddle">'.$texttoshow.'</div>';
9229  $ret .= '</div>';
9230  $ret .= '<input type="hidden" name="search_component_params_hidden" class="search_component_params_hidden" value="'.GETPOST("search_component_params_hidden").'">';
9231  // For compatibility with forms that show themself the search criteria in addition of this component, we output the fields
9232  foreach ($arrayofcriterias as $criterias) {
9233  foreach ($criterias as $criteriafamilykey => $criteriafamilyval) {
9234  if (in_array('search_'.$criteriafamilykey, $arrayofinputfieldsalreadyoutput)) {
9235  continue;
9236  }
9237  if (in_array($criteriafamilykey, array('rowid', 'ref_ext', 'entity', 'extraparams'))) {
9238  continue;
9239  }
9240  if (in_array($criteriafamilyval['type'], array('date', 'datetime', 'timestamp'))) {
9241  $ret .= '<input type="hidden" name="search_'.$criteriafamilykey.'_start">';
9242  $ret .= '<input type="hidden" name="search_'.$criteriafamilykey.'_startyear">';
9243  $ret .= '<input type="hidden" name="search_'.$criteriafamilykey.'_startmonth">';
9244  $ret .= '<input type="hidden" name="search_'.$criteriafamilykey.'_startday">';
9245  $ret .= '<input type="hidden" name="search_'.$criteriafamilykey.'_end">';
9246  $ret .= '<input type="hidden" name="search_'.$criteriafamilykey.'_endyear">';
9247  $ret .= '<input type="hidden" name="search_'.$criteriafamilykey.'_endmonth">';
9248  $ret .= '<input type="hidden" name="search_'.$criteriafamilykey.'_endday">';
9249  } else {
9250  $ret .= '<input type="hidden" name="search_'.$criteriafamilykey.'">';
9251  }
9252  }
9253  }
9254  $ret .= '</div>';
9255 
9256 
9257  return $ret;
9258  }
9259 
9269  public function selectModelMail($prefix, $modelType = '', $default = 0, $addjscombo = 0)
9270  {
9271  global $langs, $db, $user;
9272 
9273  $retstring = '';
9274 
9275  $TModels = array();
9276 
9277  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/html.formmail.class.php';
9278  $formmail = new FormMail($db);
9279  $result = $formmail->fetchAllEMailTemplate($modelType, $user, $langs);
9280 
9281  if ($default) {
9282  $TModels[0] = $langs->trans('DefaultMailModel');
9283  }
9284  if ($result > 0) {
9285  foreach ($formmail->lines_model as $model) {
9286  $TModels[$model->id] = $model->label;
9287  }
9288  }
9289 
9290  $retstring .= '<select class="flat" id="select_'.$prefix.'model_mail" name="'.$prefix.'model_mail">';
9291 
9292  foreach ($TModels as $id_model => $label_model) {
9293  $retstring .= '<option value="'.$id_model.'"';
9294  $retstring .= ">".$label_model."</option>";
9295  }
9296 
9297  $retstring .= "</select>";
9298 
9299  if ($addjscombo) {
9300  $retstring .= ajax_combobox('select_'.$prefix.'model_mail');
9301  }
9302 
9303  return $retstring;
9304  }
9305 
9316  public function buttonsSaveCancel($save_label = 'Save', $cancel_label = 'Cancel', $morebuttons = array(), $withoutdiv = 0, $morecss = '')
9317  {
9318  global $langs;
9319 
9320  $buttons = array();
9321 
9322  $save = array(
9323  'name' => 'save',
9324  'label_key' => $save_label,
9325  );
9326 
9327  if ($save_label == 'Create' || $save_label == 'Add' ) {
9328  $save['name'] = 'add';
9329  } elseif ($save_label == 'Modify') {
9330  $save['name'] = 'edit';
9331  }
9332 
9333  $cancel = array(
9334  'name' => 'cancel',
9335  'label_key' => 'Cancel',
9336  );
9337 
9338  !empty($save_label) ? $buttons[] = $save : '';
9339 
9340  if (!empty($morebuttons)) {
9341  $buttons[] = $morebuttons;
9342  }
9343 
9344  !empty($cancel_label) ? $buttons[] = $cancel : '';
9345 
9346  $retstring = $withoutdiv ? '': '<div class="center">';
9347 
9348  foreach ($buttons as $button) {
9349  $addclass = empty($button['addclass']) ? '' : $button['addclass'];
9350  $retstring .= '<input type="submit" class="button button-'.$button['name'].($morecss ? ' '.$morecss : '').' '.$addclass.'" name="'.$button['name'].'" value="'.dol_escape_htmltag($langs->trans($button['label_key'])).'">';
9351  }
9352  $retstring .= $withoutdiv ? '': '</div>';
9353 
9354  return $retstring;
9355  }
9356 }
